H2517.f: A priest during the time of Joiakim.
H2517.significance: Minor figure; name: from H2505 (חָלַק); apportioned Chelkai, an Israelite

H2497.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H2497.s: A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.1.9; only referred to as Helon (חֵלֹן);  father of Eliab.
H2497.f: Father of Eliab, a leader from the tribe of Zebulun.
H2497.significance: Father of Eliab. Name (from H2428 (חַיִל); strong Chelon, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H1950.d: Edomite living at the time of the Patriarchs
H1950.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.22; referred to as Hemam (הוֹמָ֑ם), or Hemam (הֵימָם);  son of Lotan; a brother of Hori.
H1950.f: A descendant of Seir the Horite.
H1950.meaning: from H2000 (הָמַם); raging Homam, an Edomitish chieftain
H1950.significance: Son of Lotan. Name (from H2000 (הָמַם); raging Homam, an Edomitish chieftain). Name in lineage or family context.

H1968.d: Singer living at the time of United Monarchy
H1968.s: A musician from the tribe of Levi living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.6.33; only referred to as Heman (הֵימָן); a son of Joel;  father of Bukkiah, Mattaniah, Uzziel, Shebuel, Jerimoth, Hananiah, Hanani, Eliathah, Giddalti, Romamti-ezer, Joshbekashah, Mallothi, Hothir, Mahazioth, Jehuel, Shimei.
H1968.f: A Levite and chief musician in David's time.
H1968.meaning: Hitchcock: their trouble; tumult; much; in great number
H1968.significance: A Singer. Name (probably from H539 (אָמַן); faithful Heman, the name of at least two I...). Name in lineage or family context.

H2533.d: Edomite living at the time of the Patriarchs
H2533.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.26; referred to as Hemdan (חֶמְדָּן), or Hemdan (KJV= Amram)  (חַמְרָן);  son of Dishon; a brother of Eshban, Ithran and Cheran.
H2533.f: A descendant of Seir the Horite.
H2533.meaning: from H2531 (חֶמֶד); pleasant Chemdan, an Idumaean
H2533.significance: Son of Dishon. Name (from H2531 (חֶמֶד); pleasant Chemdan, an Idumaean). Name in lineage or family context.

H2582.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H2582.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.3.18; only referred to as Henadad (חֵנָדָד);  father of Bavvai.
H2582.f: Son of Binnui, a Levite who repaired the wall.
H2582.significance: Returned builder. Name meaning: probably from H2580 (חֵן) and H1908 (הֲדַד); favor of Hadad Chenadad, ...

H2660.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H2660.s: A man from the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.26.32; referred to as Hepher (חֵ֫פֶר), or Hepherite (חֶפְרִי);  son of Gilead; a brother of Abiezer, Helek, Asriel, Shechem and Shemida;  father of Zelophehad.
H2660.f: Son of Gilead, ancestor of the Hepherites.
H2660.significance: Son of Gilead. Name (from H2658 (חָפַר) or H2659 (חָפֵר); a pit of shame Chepher, a place i...). Name in lineage or family context.

H2657.d: Woman living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2657.s: A woman living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ki.21.1; only referred to as Hephzibah (חֶפְצִי־בָהּ); wife of Hezekiah;  mother of Manasseh.
H2657.f: The mother of King Manasseh of Judah.
H2657.meaning: Hitchcock: my delight is in her
H2657.significance: Minor figure; name: from H2656 (חֵפֶץ) with suffixes; my delight (is) in her Cheptsi-bah, a fanciful name for Palestine

H2792.d: Levite living at the time of Exile and Return
H2792.s: A man from the tribe of Levi  living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at 1Ch.9.15; only referred to as Heresh (חֶ֫רֶשׁ).
H2792.f: A Levite who lived in Jerusalem.
H2792.significance: Minor figure; name: the same as H2791 (חֶרֶשׁ) Cheresh, a Levite

G2057.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G2057.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Rom.16.14; referred to as Hermas (Ἑρμᾶς), or Hermes (=Var, KJV) (Ἑρμῆς).
G2057.f: A Christian in Rome greeted by Paul.
G2057.significance: man living at the time of the new testament. Name meaning: probably from G2060 (Ἑρμῆς) Hermas, a Christian

G2060.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G2060.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Rom.16.14; referred to as Hermes or Hermas (=Var, KJV) (Ἑρμῆς).
G2060.f: A Christian in Rome greeted by Paul.
G2060.meaning: perhaps from G2046 (ἐρέω) Hermes, the name of the messenger of the Greek deities; also of a...
G2060.significance: man living at the time of the new testament. Name meaning: perhaps from G2046 (ἐρέω) Hermes, the name of the messenger of the Gre...

G2061.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G2061.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at 2Ti.1.15; only referred to as Hermogenes (Ἑρμογένης).
G2061.f: A believer who deserted Paul in Asia.
G2061.significance: Minor figure; name: from G2060 (Ἑρμῆς) and G1096 (γίνομαι) born of Hermes; Hermogenes, an apostate Christian

G2264.d: Tetrarch living at the time of the New Testament
G2264.s: Tetrarch Herod Antipas I living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.14.1; only referred to as Herod (Ἡρώδης);  son of Herod 'the Great'; a brother of Ethnarch Herod Archelaus, Herod Philip I and Herod Philip II; husband of Herodias.
G2264.f: Tetrarch of Galilee during Jesus' ministry.
G2264.meaning: Greek Ἡρῴδης (Herodes); from Greek hero. Herod = heroic. Dynasty of Idumean kings (Matt 2; Luke 23; Acts 12). Hitchcock: son of a hero
G2264.significance: Herod the Great: slew infants (Matt 2:16). Herod Antipas: beheaded John (Mark 6). Herod Agrippa: persecuted the church (Acts 12). Name (heroic) vs. tyranny—the world’s “hero” against the true King.

G2266.d: Woman living at the time of the New Testament
G2266.s: A woman living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.14.3; only referred to as Herodias (Ἡρωδιάς); wife of Herod Antipas I and Herod Philip I;  mother of Salome; a sister of Tetrarch Herod Agrippa.
G2266.f: Wife of Herod Antipas who had John beheaded.
G2266.meaning: Greek Ἡρωδιάς (Herodias); from Herod. Herodias = wife of Herod Antipas (Matt 14:3).
G2266.significance: Had John the Baptist beheaded (Mark 6:24–28). Name (from Herod) as the one who used the world’s power to silence the voice.

G2267.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G2267.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Rom.16.11; only referred to as Herodion (Ἡρωδίων).
G2267.f: A relative of Paul in Rome.
G2267.significance: Minor figure; name: from G2264 (Ἡρώδης) Herodion, a Christian

H2618.d: Man living at the time of United Monarchy
H2618.s: A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.4.10; only referred to as Hesed (חֶ֫סֶד);  father of Ben-hesed.
H2618.meaning: the same as H2617 (חֵסֵד); favor Chesed, an Israelite
H2618.significance: Father of Ben-hesed. Name (the same as H2617 (חֵסֵד); favor Chesed, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H2845.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H2845.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.15; referred to as Heth or Hittite (KJV= "of Heth")  (חֵת), or Hittite (חִתִּי);  son of Canaan; a brother of Sidon, Jebusites, Amorites, Girgashites, Hivites, Arkites, Sinites, Arvadites, Zemarites and Hamathites.
H2845.significance: Son of Canaan. Name (from H2865 (חָתַת); terror Cheth, an aboriginal Canaanite). Name in lineage or family context.

H2396.d: King living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2396.s: A king of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.16.20; referred to as Hezekiah (חִזְקִיָּהוּ), or Hezekiah (KJV= Ezekias)  (יְחִזְקִיָּה), or Hezekiah (Ἐζεκίας);  son of Ahaz and Abi; a brother of Maaseiah; husband of Hephzibah;  father of Manasseh.
H2396.meaning: Hitchcock: strength of the Lord. BehindTheName: From Hebrew חִזְקִיָּהוּ meaning 'Yahweh strengthens'.
H2396.significance: King of Judah. Name (or חִזְקִיָּהוּ; also יְחִזְקִיָּה; or יְחִזְקִיָּהוּ; from H2388 (חָז...). Name in royal or ruling context.

H2383.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2383.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.15.18; only referred to as Hezion (חֶזְיוֹן);  father of Tabrimmon.
H2383.f: Grandfather of Ben-Hadad, king of Aram.
H2383.meaning: from H2372 (חָזָה); vision Chezjon, a Syrian
H2383.significance: Father of Tabrimmon. Name (from H2372 (חָזָה); vision Chezjon, a Syrian). Name in lineage or family context.

H2387.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H2387.s: A priest living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.10.20; only referred to as Hezir (חֵזִיר).
H2387.f: A priest who sealed the covenant.
H2387.meaning: from the same as H2386 (חֲזִיר); perhaps protected Chezir, the name of two Israelites
H2387.significance: Minor figure; name: from the same as H2386 (חֲזִיר); perhaps protected Chezir, the name of two Israelites

H2695.d: Warrior living at the time of United Monarchy
H2695.s: A warrior living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.23.35; only referred to as Hezro (חֶצְרוֹ).
H2695.meaning: by an orthographical variation for H2696 (חֶצְרוֹן); enclosure Chetsro, an Israelite
H2695.significance: David's warrior. Name (by an orthographical variation for H2696 (חֶצְרוֹן); enclosure Chetsro...). Name fits martial or military role.

H2696.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H2696.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.12; referred to as Hezron (חֶצְרוֹן), or Hezronites (חֶצְרוֹנִי), or Hezron (KJV= Esrom)  (Ἐσρώμ);  son of Perez; a brother of Hamul; husband of daughter of Machir and Abiah;  father of Ram, Jerahmeel, Caleb, Segub and Ashhur.
H2696.meaning: Hitchcock: the dart of joy; the division of the song
H2696.significance: Son of Perez. Name (from H2691 (חָצֵר); court-yard Chetsron, the name of a place in Palest...). Name in lineage or family context.

H1914.d: Warrior living at the time of United Monarchy
H1914.s: A warrior living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.23.30; referred to as Hiddai (הִדַּי), or Hurai (חוּרַי).
H1914.f: One of David's mighty men from Gaash.
H1914.significance: David's warrior. Name (of uncertain derivation Hiddai, an Israelite). Name fits martial or military role.

H2419.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2419.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.16.34; only referred to as Hiel (חִיאֵל);  father of Abiram, Segub.
H2419.meaning: Hitchcock: God lives; the life of God
H2419.significance: Father of Abiram. Name (from H2416 (חַי) and H410 (אֵל); living of God Chiel, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H1985.s: A man living before Israel's Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.12.13; only referred to as Hillel (הִלֵּל);  father of Abdon.
H1985.significance: Father of Abdon. Name (from H1984 (הָלַל); praising (namely God) Hillel, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H2437.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H2437.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.38.1; only referred to as Hirah (חִירָה).
H2437.significance: man living at the time of the patriarchs. Name meaning: from H2357 (חָוַר) in the sense of splendor Chirah, an Adullamite

H2438.d: Syrian living at the time of United Monarchy
H2438.s: A king of Syria living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ki.7.13; referred to as Hiram (חִירָם), or Hiram (KJV= Huram) or Hiram (=Ketiv. Qere, KJV= Huram)  (חוּרָם), or Huram/-abi (KJV= Huram my father's)  (אָב חוּרָם).
H2438.meaning: Hitchcock: exaltation of life; a destroyer. BehindTheName: From Hebrew חִירָם possibly meaning 'exalted brother'.
H2438.significance: syrian living at the time of united monarchy. Name meaning: or חִירוֹםlemma חִירֹם missing vav, corrected to חִירוֹם; another form...

H2340.s: People from Hiv(?) of the Canaanites, first mentioned at Gen.10.17; only referred to as Hivites (חִוִּי); descended from Canaan along with Sidon, Heth, Jebusites, Amorites, Girgashites, Arkites, Sinites, Arvadites, Zemarites and Hamathites.
H2340.significance: Canaanites. Name meaning: perhaps from H2333 (חַוָּה); a villager a Chivvite, one of the aborigi...

H2395.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2395.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.17; only referred to as Hizki (חִזְקִי);  son of Elpaal; a brother of Eber, Misham, Shemed, Beriah, Shema, Zebadiah, Meshullam, Heber, Ishmerai, Izliah and Jobab.
H2395.meaning: from H2388 (חָזַק); strong Chizki, an Israelite
H2395.significance: Minor figure; name: from H2388 (חָזַק); strong Chizki, an Israelite

H2246.d: Midianite living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H2246.s: A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.10.29; only referred to as Hobab (חֹבָב);  son of Jethro; a brother of Zipporah.
H2246.significance: Son of Jethro. Name (from H2245 (חָבַב); cherished Chobab, father-in-law of Moses). Name in lineage or family context.

H1936.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H1936.s: A man from the tribe of Asher living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.37; only referred to as Hod (הוֹד);  son of Zophah; a brother of Suah, Harnepher, Shual, Beri, Imrah, Bezer, Shamma, Shilshah, Ithran and Beera.
H1936.significance: Minor figure; name: the same as H1935 (הוֹד) Hod, an Israelite

H1938.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H1938.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.3.24; referred to as Hodaviah (הוֹדַוְיָה), or Hodaiah (=Ketiv) (הוֹדַיְוָהוּ);  son of Elioenai; a brother of Eliashib, Pelaiah, Akkub, Johanan, Delaiah and Anani.
H1938.f: A descendant of David through Jeconiah.
H1938.meaning: Hitchcock: Hodiah, Hodijah, same as Hodaiah
H1938.significance: Son of Elioenai. Name (from H1935 (הוֹד) and H3050 (יָהּ); majesty of Jah Hodavjah, the name ...). Name in lineage or family context.

H2321.d: Woman living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2321.s: A woman from the tribe of Benjamin  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.9; only referred to as Hodesh (חֹ֫דֶשׁ); wife of Shaharaim;  mother of Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malcam, Jeuz, Sachia and Mirmah.
H2321.significance: Minor figure; name: the same as H2320 (חֹדֶשׁ) Chodesh, an Israelitess

H1941.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H1941.s: A priest living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.10.18; only referred to as Hodiah (הוֹדִיָּה).
H1941.f: A priest who signed Nehemiah's covenant.
H1941.meaning: a form of H1938 (הוֹדַוְיָה) Hodijah, the name of three Israelites
H1941.significance: Minor figure; name: a form of H1938 (הוֹדַוְיָה) Hodijah, the name of three Israelites

H2295.d: Woman living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H2295.s: A woman from the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.26.33; only referred to as Hoglah (חׇגְלָה);  daughter of Zelophehad; a sister of Mahlah, Noah, Milcah and Tirzah.
H2295.f: Daughter of Zelophehad, of the tribe of Manasseh.
H2295.significance: Sister of Mahlah. Name meaning: of uncertain derivation; probably a partridge Choglah, an Israelitess

H1944.s: A king in Canaan living before Israel's Monarchy, only mentioned at Jos.10.3; only referred to as Hoham (הוֹהָם).
H1944.f: King of Hebron, defeated by Joshua.
H1944.significance: Minor figure; name: of uncertain derivation Hoham, a Canaanitish king

H2652.d: Priest living at the time of United Monarchy
H2652.s: A priest living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.1.3;  son of Eli (H5941);  brother of Phinehas (H6372H); called Hophni (חׇפְנִי)
H2652.f: A corrupt priest, son of Eli.
H2652.meaning: from H2651 (חֹפֶן); perhaps pugilist Chophni, an Israelite
H2652.significance: A priest. Name (from H2651 (חֹפֶן); perhaps pugilist Chophni, an Israelite). Name fits cultic or priestly role.

H2036.s: A king in Canaan living before Israel's Monarchy, only mentioned at Jos.10.33; only referred to as Horam (הֹרָם).
H2036.f: King of Gezer, defeated by Joshua.
H2036.significance: Minor figure; name: from an unused root (meaning to tower up); high Horam, a Canaanitish king

H2753.d: Edomite living at the time of the Patriarchs
H2753.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.22; referred to as Hori or Horite (KJV= Hori)  (חֹרִי), or Horite (חֹרִי);  son of Lotan; a brother of Hemam.
H2753.significance: Son of Lotan. Name (or חוֹרִי; the same as H2752 (חֹרִי) Chori, the name of two men). Name in lineage or family context.

H2772.s: People from Horon(?), first mentioned at Neh.2.10; only referred to as Horonites (חֹרֹנִי).
H2772.f: A people group opposed to Nehemiah's work.
H2772.meaning: Hitchcock: men of anger, or of fury, or of liberty
H2772.significance: Nehemiah's opponents. Name meaning: patrial from H2773 (חֹרֹנַיִם) a Choronite or inhabitant of Choronaim

H2621.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2621.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.16.38; only referred to as Hosah (חֹסָה);  father of Shimri, Hilkiah, Tebaliah, Zechariah.
H2621.f: A Levite gatekeeper during David's reign.
H2621.significance: Father of Shimri. Name (from H2620 (חָסָה); hopeful Chosah, an Israelite; also a place in Pale...). Name in lineage or family context.

H1954.d: Prophet living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H1954.s: A prophet living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at Hos.1.1; referred to as Hosea (הוֹשֵׁעַ), or Hosea (Ὡσηέ); a son of Beeri; husband of Gomer;  father of Jezreel, Lo-ruhamah, Lo-ammi H3818).
H1954.f: A prophet to the northern kingdom of Israel.
H1954.meaning: From יָשַׁע (yasha), save. Hosea = salvation. Prophet (Hos 1:1). Hitchcock: Hoshea, savior; safety. BehindTheName: From Hebrew הוֹשֵׁעַ meaning 'salvation'.
H1954.significance: Married Gomer as a sign (Hos 1:2); “name him Lo-ammi [not my people]” (Hos 1:9). Yet “in the place where it was said Not my people, it shall be said Sons of the living God” (Hos 1:10; Rom 9:26). Name (salvation) as the prophet of the covenant and the bride.

H1955.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H1955.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at Jer.42.1; only referred to as Hoshaiah (הוֹשַׁעֲיָה);  father of Jezaniah.
H1955.f: A military leader during Jeremiah's time.
H1955.meaning: Hitchcock: the salvation of the Lord
H1955.significance: Father of Jezaniah. Name (from H3467 (יָשַׁע) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah has saved Hoshajah, the name...). Name in lineage or family context.

H1953.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H1953.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.3.18; only referred to as Hoshama (יְהוֹשָׁמָע);  son of Shealtiel(?); a brother of Malchiram, Pedaiah, Shenazzar, Jekamiah and Nedabiah.
H1953.f: A descendant of King Jeconiah of Judah.
H1953.significance: Minor figure; name: from H3068 (יְהֹוָה) and H8085 (שָׁמַע); Jehovah has heard Hoshama, an Israelite

H2369.s: A man from the tribe of Asher living before Israel's Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.7.32; referred to as Hotham (חוֹתָם), or Helem (הֶ֫לֶם);  son of Heber; a brother of Japhlet, Shomer and Shua;  father of Zophah, Imna, Shelesh and Amal.
H2369.significance: Son of Heber. Name (the same as H2368 (חוֹתָם); seal Chotham, the name of two Israelites). Name in lineage or family context.

H1956.d: Levite living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H1956.s: A musician from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.25.4; only referred to as Hothir (הוֹתִיר);  son of Heman; a brother of Bukkiah, Mattaniah, Uzziel, Shebuel, Jerimoth, Hananiah, Hanani, Eliathah, Giddalti, Romamti-ezer, Joshbekashah, Mallothi, Mahazioth.
H1956.f: A son of Heman, a musician in David's court.
H1956.significance: Son of Heman. Name (from H3498 (יָתַר); he has caused to remain Hothir, an Israelite). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H4060.d: Giant living at the time of United Monarchy
H4060.s: A gigantic man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.21.20; only referred to as huge man (מִדָּה);  son of Rapha; a brother of Goliath, Ishbi-benob, Saph, Lahmi.
H4060.f: A huge man from Gath, killed by David's warriors.
H4060.meaning: feminine of H4055 (מַד) properly, extension, i.e. height or breadth; also a measure (including...
H4060.significance: A gigantic man. Name (feminine of H4055 (מַד) properly, extension, i.e. height or breadth; a...). Name in lineage or family context.

H2343.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H2343.s: A man of the Syrians living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.23; only referred to as Hul (חוּל);  son of Aram; a brother of Uz, Gether and Mash.
H2343.f: A son of Aram, grandson of Shem.
H2343.significance: Early Patriarch. Name (from H2342 (חוּל); a circle Chul, a son of Aram; also the region settl...). Name in lineage or family context.

H2468.d: Prophetess living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2468.s: A prophetess living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.22.14; only referred to as Huldah (חֻלְדָּה); wife of Shallum.
H2468.f: A prophetess during the reign of King Josiah.
H2468.meaning: Hitchcock: the world. BehindTheName: Means 'weasel' in Hebrew.
H2468.significance: A prophetess. Name (feminine of H2467 (חֹלֶד) Chuldah, an Israelitess). Name fits prophetic or messenger role.

H2647.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2647.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.24.13; only referred to as Huppah (חֻפָּה).
H2647.meaning: the same as H2646 (חֻפָּה) Chuppah, an Israelite
H2647.significance: Minor figure; name: the same as H2646 (חֻפָּה) Chuppah, an Israelite

H2650.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H2650.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.21; referred to as Huppim (חֻפִּים), or Hupham (חוּפָם), or Huram (חוּרָם), or Huphamite (חוּפָמִי);  son of Benjamin; a brother of Bela, Becher, Ashbel, Gera, Naaman, Ahiram, Rosh, Muppim, Ard, Ahiram and Jediael.
H2650.meaning: Hitchcock: a chamber covered; the sea-shore
H2650.significance: man living at the time of egypt and wilderness. Name (plural of H2646 (חֻפָּה) (compare H2349 (חוּפָם)) Chuppim, an Israelit...). Name in lineage or family context.

H2354.d: Aaron's compatriot living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H2354.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Exo.17.10; only referred to as Hur (חוּר); a son of Caleb and Ephrathah;  half-brother of: Jesher, Shobab, Ardon, Mesha, Haran, Moza, Gazez, Sheber, Tirhanah, Regem(?), Jotham(?), Geshan(?), Pelet(?), Ephah(?), Shaaph(?), Shaaph, Sheva and Achsah;  father of Uri, Shobal, Salma, Hareph, Jezreel, Ishma, Idba
H2354.f: A companion of Moses and grandfather of Bezalel.
H2354.significance: Aaron's compatriot. Name (the same as H2353 (חוּר) or H2352 (חוּר) Chur, the name of four Israel...). Name in lineage or family context.

H2359.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2359.s: A man from the tribe of Gad  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.5.14; only referred to as Huri (חוּרִי); a son of Jaroah;  father of Abihail.
H2359.meaning: Hitchcock: being angry; or same as Huram
H2359.significance: Son of Jaroah. Name (probably from H2353 (חוּר); linen-worker Churi, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

G3137.d: Jesus' mother living at the time of the New Testament
G3137.s: A woman from the tribe of Judah living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.1.16; only referred to as Mary (Μαρία);  daughter of Heli; a sister of Salome (?); wife of Joseph;  mother of Jesus, James, Joses, Simon and Jude.
G3137.f: Mother of Jesus; wife of Joseph.
G3137.meaning: Greek Μαρία (Maria); from Hebrew מִרְיָם (Miriam). Mary = bitterness or rebellion; possibly “beloved.” Mother of Jesus (Luke 1:30). Hitchcock: same as Miriam. BehindTheName: From Greek Μαρία (Maria), from Hebrew מִרְיָם (Miryam), meaning uncertain, possibly 'sea of bitterness' or 'rebelliousness'.
G3137.significance: The Lord’s handmaid (Luke 1:38); virgin mother of the Son. At the cross (John 19:25); name and role—the one who bore the Savior.

H4308.d: Edomite living at the time of the Patriarchs - unnamed husband of Matred
H4308.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, inferred at Gen.36.39; only referred to as husband of Matred;  unnamed husband of: Matred.
H4308.f: Husband of Matred - Mezahab, grandfather of Mehetabel
H4308.meaning: from H2956 (טָרַד); propulsive Matred, an Edomitess
H4308.significance: From Edom. Name meaning: from H2956 (טָרַד); propulsive Matred, an Edomitess

H8100.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy - unnamed husband of Shimeath
H8100.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, inferred at 2Ki.12.21; only referred to as husband of Shimeath;  unnamed husband of: Shimeath.
H8100.f: Husband of Shimeath - Father of King Joash's assassins
H8100.meaning: feminine of H8088 (שֵׁמַע); annunciation Shimath, an Ammonitess
H8100.significance: man living at the time of divided monarchy - unnamed husband. Name meaning: feminine of H8088 (שֵׁמַע); annunciation Shimath, an Ammonitess

H6870.d: Woman living at the time of United Monarchy
H6870.s: A woman living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.26.6; only referred to as Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה);  daughter of Jesse and Nahash; a sister of David, Eliab, Abinadab, Nethanel, Raddai, Ozem, Abigail(?) and Elihu, Shimeah.
H6870.f: Sister of David; mother of Joab, Abishai, and Asahel
H6870.meaning: Hitchcock: pain or tribulation of the Lord
H6870.significance: Sister of David. Name meaning: feminine passive participle from the same as H6875 (צְרִי); wounded Ts...

H2364.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2364.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.4; only referred to as Hushah (חוּשָׁה); a son of Ezer.
H2364.f: A son or town founded by Ezer.
H2364.significance: Minor figure; name: from H2363 (חוּשׁ); haste Chushah, an Israelite

H2365.d: David's compatriot living at the time of United Monarchy
H2365.s: A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.15.32; only referred to as Hushai (חוּשַׁי);  father of Baana.
H2365.f: David's friend and advisor who helped him during Absalom's rebellion.
H2365.meaning: Hitchcock: their haste; their sensuality; their silence
H2365.significance: David's compatriot. Name meaning: from H2363 (חוּשׁ); hasty Chushai, an Israelite

H2367.d: King living at the time of the Patriarchs
H2367.s: A king of Edom living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.34; only referred to as Husham (חֻשָׁם).
H2367.meaning: or חֻשָׁם; from H2363 (חוּשׁ); hastily Chusham, an Idumaean
H2367.significance: Edomite king. Name (or חֻשָׁם; from H2363 (חוּשׁ); hastily Chusham, an Idumaean). Name in royal or ruling context.

H2843.s: A group of warriors from Hushath(?), first mentioned at 2Sa.21.18; only referred to as Hushathites (חֻשָׁתִי).
H2843.f: A clan or family known for their warriors.
H2843.meaning: patronymically from H2364 (חוּשָׁה) a Chushathite or descendant of Chushah
H2843.significance: Family of warrior. Name (patronymically from H2364 (חוּשָׁה) a Chushathite or descendant of Chu...). Name fits martial or military role.

H2366.d: Woman living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2366.s: A woman from the tribe of Benjamin  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.8.8; only referred to as Hushim (חוּשִׁים); wife of Shaharaim;  mother of Abitub and Elpaal.
H2366.f: A son of Shaharaim, a Benjamite.
H2366.meaning: or חֻשִׁים; or חֻשִׁם; plural from H2363 (חוּשׁ); hasters Chushim, the name of three Israelites
H2366.significance: From  Benjamin. Name meaning: or חֻשִׁים; or חֻשִׁם; plural from H2363 (חוּשׁ); hasters Chushim, the...

G5211.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G5211.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at 1Ti.1.20; only referred to as Hymenaeus (Ὑμεναῖος).
G5211.f: A man who rejected faith and good conscience.
G5211.meaning: from (the god of weddings) "hymenæal"; Hymenæus, an opponent of Christianity
G5211.significance: man living at the time of the new testament. Name meaning: from (the god of weddings) "hymenæal"; Hymenæus, an opponent of Christ...

H2984.d: David's son living at the time of United Monarchy
H2984.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.5.15; only referred to as Ibhar (יִבְחָר);  son of David; a brother of Amnon, Chileab, Absalom, Adonijah, Shephatiah, Ithream, Shammua, Shobab, Nathan, Solomon, Elishua, Nepheg, Japhia, Elishama, Eliada, Eliphelet, Tamar, Elpelet, Nogah and Jerimoth.
H2984.f: One of King David's sons born in Jerusalem.
H2984.meaning: Hitchcock: election; he that is chosen
H2984.significance: David's son. Name (from H977 (בָּחַר); choice Jibchar, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H2997.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H2997.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at 1Ch.9.8; only referred to as Ibneiah (יִבְנְיָה); a son of Jeroham.
H2997.f: A Benjamite who lived in Jerusalem.
H2997.meaning: Hitchcock: Ibniah, the building of the Lord; the understanding of the Lord; son by adoption
H2997.significance: Minor figure; name: from H1129 (בָּנָה) and H3050 (יָהּ); built of Jah Jibnejah, an Israelite

H2998.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H2998.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at 1Ch.9.8; only referred to as Ibnijah (יִבְנִיָּה);  father of Reuel.
H2998.f: A Benjamite who lived in Jerusalem.
H2998.meaning: from H1129 (בָּנָה) and H3050 (יָהּ); building of Jah Jibnijah, an Israelite
H2998.significance: Father of Reuel. Name (from H1129 (בָּנָה) and H3050 (יָהּ); building of Jah Jibnijah, an Isr...). Name in lineage or family context.

H5681.d: Levite living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H5681.s: A man from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.24.27; only referred to as Ibri (עִבְרִי);  son of Jaaziah; a brother of Beno, Shoham and Zaccur.
H5681.f: A Levite of the family of Merari.
H5681.meaning: Hitchcock: passing over; being angry; being with young
H5681.significance: Minor figure; name: the same as H5680 (עִבְרִי) Ibri, an Israelite

H3005.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3005.s: A warrior from the tribe of Issachar living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.2; only referred to as Ibsam (יִבְשָׂם);  son of Tola; a brother of Uzzi, Rephaiah, Jeriel, Jahmai and Shemuel.
H3005.meaning: from the same as H1314 (בֶּשֶׂם); fragrant Jibsam, an Israelite
H3005.significance: Minor figure; name: from the same as H1314 (בֶּשֶׂם); fragrant Jibsam, an Israelite

H0078.s: A Judge living before Israel's Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.12.8; only referred to as Ibzan (אִבְצָן).
H0078.f: A judge of Israel from Bethlehem.
H0078.meaning: From בָּצַן (batsan) or similar; Ibzan = judge. Judge of Israel (Judg 12:8–10); had 30 sons, 30 daughters. Hitchcock: father of a target; father of coldness
H0078.significance: Minor judge; gave his daughters in marriage outside his clan. Name in the line of judges between Jephthah and Elon.

H0350.d: Levite living at the time of United Monarchy
H0350.s: A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.4.21; only referred to as Ichabod (אִי־כָבוֹד);  son of Phinehas; a brother of Ahitub.
H0350.f: Son of Phinehas, born when the ark was captured.
H0350.meaning: Hitchcock: where is the glory? or, no glory. BehindTheName: From Hebrew אִיכָבוֹד meaning 'where is the glory?'.
H0350.significance: Son of Phinehas. Name (from H336 (אִי)lemma אי missing vowel, corrected to אִי and H3519 (כָּ...). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H3031.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3031.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.3; only referred to as Idbash (יִדְבָּשׁ);  son of Hur; a brother of Uri, Shobal, Salma, Hareph, Jezreel, Ishma, Hazzelelponi, Penuel and Ezer.
H3031.meaning: Hitchcock: flowing with honey; the land of destruction
H3031.significance: Minor figure; name: from the same as H1706 (דְּבַשׁ); perhaps honeyed Jidbash, an Israelite

H3035.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3035.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.27.21; only referred to as Iddo (יִדּוֹ); a son of Zechariah.
H3035.f: Zechariah's son, a leader of Manasseh
H3035.significance: Minor figure; name: from H3034 (יָדָה); praised Jiddo, an Israelite

H5714.d: Levite living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H5714.s: A musician from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.6.21; referred to as Iddo (עִדּוֹ), or Adaiah (עֲדָיָ֫הוּ); a son of Joah;  father of Zerah.
H5714.f: A Levite in the genealogy of temple singers
H5714.significance: Son of Joah. Name (or עִדּוֹא; or עִדִּיא; from H5710 (עָדָה); timely Iddo (or Iddi), the...). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H0112.d: Prophet living at the time of Exile and Return
H0112.s: A prophet living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.8.17; only referred to as Iddo (אִדּוֹ).
H0112.f: A prophet in Casiphia during Ezra's time.
H0112.significance: Returned prophet. Name (of uncertain derivation Iddo, an Israelite). Name fits prophetic or messenger role.

H3008.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3008.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.3.22; only referred to as Igal (יִגְאָל);  son of Shemaiah; a brother of Hattush, Bariah, Neariah and Shaphat.
H3008.significance: Minor figure; name: from H1350 (גָּאַל); avenger Jigal, the name of three Israelites

H3012.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3012.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Jer.35.4; only referred to as Igdaliah (יִגְדַּלְיָ֫הוּ);  father of Hanan.
H3012.f: A man of God during Jeremiah's time.
H3012.meaning: Hitchcock: the greatness of the Lord
H3012.significance: Father of Hanan. Name (from H1431 (גָּדַל) and H3050 (יָהּ); magnified of Jah Jigdaljah, an I...). Name in lineage or family context.

H6142.d: Warrior living at the time of United Monarchy
H6142.s: A warrior living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.23.26; only referred to as Ikkesh (עִקֵּשׁ);  father of Ira.
H6142.f: Father of Ira, one of David's mighty warriors.
H6142.significance: Father of warrior. Name (the same as H6141 (עִקֵּשׁ); perverse Ikkesh, an Israelite). Name fits martial or military role.

H3229.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3229.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ki.22.8; only referred to as Imlah (יִמְלָה);  father of Micaiah.
H3229.significance: Father of Micaiah. Name (or יִמְלָה; from H4390 (מָלֵא); full Jimla or Jimlah, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H0564.d: Levite living at the time of Exile and Return
H0564.s: A priest from the tribe of Levi  living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at 1Ch.9.12; only referred to as Immer (אִמֵּר);  father of Meshillemith.
H0564.f: A priestly family in post-exilic Jerusalem.
H0564.significance: Returned priest. Name (from H559 (אָמַר); talkative Immer, the name of five Israelites). Name fits cultic or priestly role.

H3234.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3234.s: A man from the tribe of Asher living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.35; only referred to as Imna (יִמְנָע);  son of Hotham; a brother of Zophah, Shelesh and Amal.
H3234.meaning: from H4513 (מָנַע); he will restrain Jimna, an Israelite
H3234.significance: Minor figure; name: from H4513 (מָנַע); he will restrain Jimna, an Israelite

H3232.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3232.s: A man from the tribe of Asher living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.17; referred to as Imnah or Imnite (יִמְנָה);  son of Asher; a brother of Ishvah, Ishvi, Beriah and Serah.
H3232.f: A son of Asher and ancestor of the Imnites.
H3232.significance: Son of Asher. Name (from H3231 (יָמַן); prosperity (as betokened by the right hand) Jimnah...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3236.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3236.s: A man from the tribe of Asher living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.36; only referred to as Imrah (יִמְרָה);  son of Zophah; a brother of Suah, Harnepher, Shual, Beri, Bezer, Hod, Shamma, Shilshah, Ithran and Beera.
H3236.meaning: Hitchcock: a rebel; waxing bitter; changing
H3236.significance: Minor figure; name: probably from H3235 (יָמַר); interchange Jimrah, an Israelite

H0566.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H0566.s: A man from the tribe of Judah  living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at 1Ch.9.4; only referred to as Imri (אִמְרִי); a son of Bani;  father of Omri.
H0566.f: A descendant of Judah who lived in Jerusalem.
H0566.meaning: Hitchcock: speaking; exalting; bitter; a lamb
H0566.significance: Returned from exile. Name (from H564 (אִמֵּר) Imri, the name of two Israelites). Name in lineage or family context.

H3301.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3301.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.25; only referred to as Iphdeiah (יִפְדְּיָה);  son of Shashak; a brother of Ishpan, Eber, Eliel, Abdon, Zichri, Hanan, Hananiah, Elam, Anthothijah and Penuel.
H3301.meaning: from H6299 (פָּדָה) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah will liberate Jiphdejah, an Israelite
H3301.significance: Minor figure; name: from H6299 (פָּדָה) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah will liberate Jiphdejah, an Israelite

H5893.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H5893.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin  living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.12; only referred to as Ir (עִיר);  father of Shuppim, Huppim, Maacah.
H5893.f: Son of Bela, descendant of Benjamin.
H5893.significance: Father of Shuppim. Name (the same as H5892 (עִיר) Ir, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H5896.d: Warrior living at the time of United Monarchy
H5896.s: A warrior living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.23.26; only referred to as Ira (עִירָא); a son of Ikkesh.
H5896.f: One of David's Thirty warriors, from Tekoa.
H5896.meaning: Hitchcock: watchman; making bare; pouring out
H5896.significance: David's warrior. Name (from H5782 (עוּר); wakefulness Ira, the name of three Israelites). Name fits martial or military role.

H5897.d: Man living at the time before the Flood
H5897.s: A man living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.4.18; only referred to as Irad (עִירָד); a son of Enoch;  father of Mehujael.
H5897.f: Descendant of Cain; father of Mehujael.
H5897.meaning: Hitchcock: wild ass; heap of empire; dragon
H5897.significance: Son of Enoch. Name (from the same as H6166 (עֲרָד); fugitive Irad, an antediluvian). Name in lineage or family context.

H5902.d: Edomite living at the time of the Patriarchs
H5902.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.43; only referred to as Iram (עִירָם).
H5902.meaning: Hitchcock: the effusion of them; a high heap
H5902.significance: From Edom. Name meaning: from H5892 (עִיר); city-wise Iram, an Idumaean

H5901.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H5901.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.7; only referred to as Iri (עִירִי);  son of Bela; a brother of Ard, Naaman, Ezbon, Uzzi, Uzziel, Jerimoth, Addar, Gera, Abihud, Abishua and Ahoah.
H5901.f: Son of Bela, grandson of Benjamin.
H5901.significance: Minor figure; name: from H5892 (עִיר); urbane Iri, an Israelite

H3376.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3376.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at Jer.37.13; only referred to as Irijah (יִרְאִיָּיה); a son of Shelemiah.
H3376.f: Captain who arrested Jeremiah for desertion.
H3376.meaning: Hitchcock: the fear of the Lord
H3376.significance: Son of Shelemiah. Name (from H3373 (יָרֵא) and H3050 (יָהּ); fearful of Jah Jirijah, an Israel...). Name in lineage or family context.

H5900.s: A man from the tribe of Judah  living before Israel's Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.15; only referred to as Iru (עִירוּ);  son of Caleb; a brother of Achsah, Elah and Naam.
H5900.f: Son of Caleb, brother of Elah and Naam.
H5900.meaning: from H5892 (עִיר); a citizen Iru, an Israelite
H5900.significance: Minor figure; name: from H5892 (עִיר); a citizen Iru, an Israelite

H3327.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H3327.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.17.19; referred to as Isaac (יִצְחָק), or Isaac (יִשְׂחָק), or Isaac (Ἰσαάκ); a son of Abraham and Sarah;  half-brother of: Ishmael, Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak and Shuah; husband of Rebekah;  father of Esau and Israel.
H3327.meaning: From צָחַק (tsachaq), laugh. Isaac = he laughs (Gen 21:3, 6). Son of Abraham and Sarah. Hitchcock: laughter. BehindTheName: From Hebrew יִצְחָק (Yiṣḥaq) meaning 'he will laugh', from צָחַק (ṣaḥaq) 'to laugh'.
H3327.significance: Son of promise; type of Christ as the offered son (Gen 22; Heb 11:17–19). Laughter of disbelief (Sarah) becomes laughter of joy. The seed through whom the covenant runs.

H3470.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3470.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.3.21; only referred to as Jeshaiah (יְשַׁעְיָה);  son of Hananiah; a brother of Pelatiah, Rephaiah, Arnan, Obadiah and Shecaniah.
H3470.f: A descendant of Shecaniah from the line of David.
H3470.meaning: or יְשַׁעְיָהוּ; from H3467 (יָשַׁע) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah has saved Jeshajah, the name of seven...
H3470.significance: Minor figure; name: or יְשַׁעְיָהוּ; from H3467 (יָשַׁע) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah has saved Jeshajah, the name of seven...

H3252.d: Woman living at the time of the Patriarchs
H3252.s: A woman living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.11.29; only referred to as Iscah (יִסְכָּה);  daughter of Haran; a sister of Lot and Milcah.
H3252.f: Daughter of Haran, Milcah's sister, Lot's sister.
H3252.significance: Minor figure; name: from an unused root meaning to watch; observant Jiskah, sister of Lot

H3431.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3431.s: A man from the tribe of Judah(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.17; only referred to as Ishbah (יִשְׁבַּח);  son of Mered and Bithiah; a brother of Miriam and Shammai;  half-brother of: Jered(?), Heber(?) and Jekuthiel(?); husband of Hodiah(?);  father of Maacathites(?) and Garmites(?).
H3431.f: Son of Mered in the genealogy of Judah
H3431.meaning: from H7623 (שָׁבַח); he will praise Jishbach, an Israelite
H3431.significance: Son of Mered. Name (from H7623 (שָׁבַח); he will praise Jishbach, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H3435.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H3435.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.25.2; only referred to as Ishbak (יִשְׁבָּק);  son of Abraham and Keturah; a brother of Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian and Shuah;  half-brother of: Ishmael and Isaac.
H3435.meaning: Hitchcock: who is empty or exhausted
H3435.significance: Son of Abraham. Name (from an unused root corresponding to H7662 (שְׁבַק); he will leave Jis...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3430.d: Giant living at the time of United Monarchy
H3430.s: A gigantic man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.21.16; only referred to as Ishbi-benob (יִשְׁבּוֹ בְּנֹב);  son of Rapha; a brother of Goliath, Saph, Lahmi and huge man.
H3430.f: Philistine giant who fought against David's men.
H3430.significance: Minor figure; name: from H3427 (יָשַׁב) and H5011 (נֹב), with a pronominal suffix and a preposition interposed; his...

H0378.d: Saul's son living at the time of United Monarchy
H0378.s: A king of Israel from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.2.8; referred to as Ish-bosheth (אִישׁ־בֹ֫שֶׁת), or Eshbaal (אֶשְׁבַּעַל);  son of Saul; a brother of Jonathan, Abinadab, Malchi-shua, Merab, Michal, Armoni, Mephibosheth.
H0378.f: Son of Saul, king over Israel.
H0378.meaning: from H376 (אִישׁ) and H1322 (בֹּשֶׁת); man of shame Ish-Bosheth, a son of King Saul
H0378.significance: Saul's son. Name (from H376 (אִישׁ) and H1322 (בֹּשֶׁת); man of shame Ish-Bosheth, a son...). Name in lineage or family context.

H0379.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H0379.s: A man from the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.18; only referred to as Ishhod (אִישְׁהוֹד); his mother was Hammolecheth; a brother of Abiezer and Mahlah.
H0379.meaning: from H376 (אִישׁ) and H1935 (הוֹד); man of renown Ishod, an Israelite
H0379.significance: Minor figure; name: from H376 (אִישׁ) and H1935 (הוֹד); man of renown Ishod, an Israelite

H3469.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3469.s: A man from the tribe of Simeon(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.42; only referred to as Ishi (יִשְׁעִי);  father of Pelatiah, Neariah, Rephaiah and Uzziel.
H3469.f: Leader of Simeonites who attacked Hamites in Gedor.
H3469.significance: Father of Pelatiah. Name (from H3467 (יָשַׁע); saving Jishi, the name of four Israelites). Name in lineage or family context.

H3457.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3457.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.3; only referred to as Ishma (יִשְׁמָא);  son of Hur; a brother of Uri, Shobal, Salma, Hareph, Jezreel, Idbash, Hazzelelponi, Penuel and Ezer.
H3457.f: Son of Hur, descendant of Judah.
H3457.significance: Minor figure; name: from H3456 (יָשַׁם); desolate Jishma, an Israelite

H3458.d: Abraham's son living at the time of the Patriarchs
H3458.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.16.11; referred to as Ishmael (יִשְׁמָעֵאל), or Ishmaelite (KJV= Ishmeelite) or Ishmaelite (יִשְׁמְעֵאלִי), or Ishmaelite (יִשְׂרְאֵלִי); a son of Abraham and Hagar;  half-brother of: Isaac, Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak and Shuah;  father of Nebaioth, Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam, Mishma, Dumah, Massa, Hadad, Tema, Jetur, Naphis
H3458.meaning: Hitchcock: God that hears. BehindTheName: From Hebrew יִשְׁמָעֵאל meaning 'God will hear'.
H3458.significance: abraham's son living at the time of the patriarchs. Name (from H8085 (שָׁמַע) and H410 (אֵל); God will hear Jishmael, the name o...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3460.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3460.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.27.19; only referred to as Ishmaiah (יִשְׁמַעְיָ֫הוּ); a son of Obadiah.
H3460.f: Leader of the tribe of Zebulun under David.
H3460.meaning: Hitchcock: hearing or obeying the Lord
H3460.significance: Minor figure; name: or יִשְׁמַעְיָהוּlemma יְשְׁמַעְיָהוּ first vowel, corrected to יִשְׁמַעְיָהוּ; from H8085...

H3461.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3461.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.18; only referred to as Ishmerai (יִשְׁמְרַי);  son of Elpaal; a brother of Eber, Misham, Shemed, Beriah, Shema, Zebadiah, Meshullam, Hizki, Heber, Izliah and Jobab.
H3461.significance: Minor figure; name: from H8104 (שָׁמַר); preservative Jishmerai, an Israelite

H3472.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3472.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin  living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.16; only referred to as Ishpah (יִשְׁפָּה);  son of Beriah; a brother of Arad, Ahio, Shashak, Jeremoth, Zebadiah, Eder, Michael and Joha.
H3472.meaning: perhaps from H8192 (שָׁפָה); he will scratch Jishpah, an Israelite
H3472.significance: Minor figure; name: perhaps from H8192 (שָׁפָה); he will scratch Jishpah, an Israelite

H3473.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3473.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.22; only referred to as Ishpan (יִשְׁפָּן);  son of Shashak; a brother of Eber, Eliel, Abdon, Zichri, Hanan, Hananiah, Elam, Anthothijah, Iphdeiah and Penuel.
H3473.meaning: probably from the same as H8227 (שָׁפָן); he will hide Jishpan, an Israelite
H3473.significance: Minor figure; name: probably from the same as H8227 (שָׁפָן); he will hide Jishpan, an Israelite

H3438.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3438.s: A man from the tribe of Asher living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.17; referred to as Ishvah (KJV= Isuah)  (יִשְׁוָה);  son of Asher; a brother of Imnah, Ishvi, Beriah and Serah.
H3438.f: Son of Asher, grandson of Jacob.
H3438.meaning: from H7737 (שָׁוָה); he will level Jishvah, an Israelite
H3438.significance: Son of Asher. Name (from H7737 (שָׁוָה); he will level Jishvah, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H3440.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3440.s: A man from the tribe of Asher living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.17; referred to as Ishvi (KJV= Ishuai)  (יִשְׁוִי), or Ishvite (KJV= Jesui)  (יִשְׁוִי);  son of Asher; a brother of Imnah, Ishvah, Beriah and Serah.
H3440.meaning: from H7737 (שָׁוָה); level Jishvi, the name of two Israelites
H3440.significance: Son of Asher. Name (from H7737 (שָׁוָה); level Jishvi, the name of two Israelites). Name in lineage or family context.

H3253.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3253.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.31.13; only referred to as Ismachiah (יִסְמַכְיָהוּ).
H3253.f: Overseer under King Hezekiah during temple restoration.
H3253.meaning: from H5564 (סָמַךְ) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah will sustain Jismakjah, an Israelite
H3253.significance: Minor figure; name: from H5564 (סָמַךְ) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah will sustain Jismakjah, an Israelite

H3478.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H3478.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.25.26; referred to as Israel (Aramiac יִשְׂרָאֵל), or Jacob (KJV= Jacob)  (יַעֲקֹב), or Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן), or Israelite (יִשְׂרְאֵלִי), or Israelitess (יִשְׂרְאֵלִית), or Israel or Israelite (Ἰσραήλ), or Jacob (Ἰακώβ), or Israelite or Israel (Ἰσραηλίτης);  son of Isaac and Rebekah; a brother of Esau; husband of Rachel and Leah,
H3478.meaning: From שָׂרָה (sarah), strive, + אֵל (el), God. Israel = he strives with God (Gen 32:28). New name for Jacob after wrestling at Peniel. Hitchcock: who prevails with God. BehindTheName: From Hebrew יִשְׂרָאֵל possibly meaning 'God contends' or 'he who strives with God'.
H3478.significance: Covenant name of the people; prince with God. The one who strove and prevailed becomes the nation that bears the promise. Type of the church as the true Israel (Rom 9:6).

H3485.d: Jacob's son living at the time of the Patriarchs
H3485.s: A man who founded the tribe of Issachar  living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.30.18; referred to as Issachar (יִשָּׂשכָר), or Issachar (Ἰσαχάρ);  son of Israel and Leah; a brother of Reuben, Simeon, Levi, Judah, Zebulun and Dinah;  half-brother of: Dan, Naphtali, Gad, Asher, Joseph and Benjamin;  father of Tola, Puah, Jashub and Shimron.
H3485.f: Son of Jacob and Leah, forefather of tribe
H3485.significance: Son of Israel. Name ((strictly yis-saws-kawr'); from H5375 (נָשָׂא) and H7939 (שָׂכָר); he ...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3449.d: Levite living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3449.s: A man from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at 1Ch.23.20; referred to as Isshiah (KJV= Jesiah, NIV= Ishiah)  (יִשִּׁיָּהוּ);  son of Uzziel; a brother of Mishael, Elizaphan, Sithri and Micah;  father of Zechariah.
H3449.f: Levite, grandson of Rehabiah during David's reign.
H3449.meaning: or יִשִּׁיָּהוּ; from H5383 (נָשָׁה) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah will lend Jishshijah, the name of...
H3449.significance: Son of Uzziel. Name (or יִשִּׁיָּהוּ; from H5383 (נָשָׁה) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah will lend J...). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H0385.d: Priest living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H0385.f: Youngest son of Aaron; served as priest.
H0385.significance: A priest. Name (from H339 (אִי) and H8558 (תָּמָר); coast of the palm-tree Ithamar, a ...). Name fits cultic or priestly role.

H0384.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H0384.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.11.7; only referred to as Ithiel (אִיתִיאֵל); a son of Jeshaiah;  father of Maaseiah.
H0384.f: Descendant of Benjamin living in Jerusalem.
H0384.meaning: Hitchcock: sign, or coming of God
H0384.significance: Returned from exile. Name (perhaps from H837 (אֹשֶׁר) and H410 (אֵל); God has arrived Ithiel, the...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3495.d: Moabite warrior living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3495.s: A warrior of the Moabites living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.11.46; only referred to as Ithmah (יִתְמָה).
H3495.significance: Minor figure; name: from the same as H3490 (יָתוֹם); orphanage Jithmah, an Israelite

H3506.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3506.s: A man from the tribe of Asher living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.7.37; referred to as Ithran (יִתְרָן), or Jether (יֶ֫תֶר);  son of Zophah; a brother of Suah, Harnepher, Shual, Beri, Imrah, Bezer, Hod, Shamma, Shilshah and Beera;  father of Jephunneh, Pispa and Ara.
H3506.f: Descendant of Asher, son of Zophah.
H3506.significance: Son of Zophah. Name (from H3498 (יָתַר); excellent Jithran, the name of an Edomite and of a...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3507.d: David's son living at the time of United Monarchy
H3507.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.3.5; only referred to as Ithream (יִתְרְעָם); a son of David and Eglah;  half-brother of: Amnon, Chileab, Absalom, Adonijah, Shephatiah, Shammua, Shobab, Nathan, Solomon, Ibhar, Elishua, Nepheg, Japhia, Elishama, Eliada, Eliphelet, Tamar, Elpelet, Nogah and Jerimoth.
H3507.f: Son of David, born in Hebron to Eglah.
H3507.significance: David's son. Name (from H3499 (יֶתֶר) and H5971 (עַם); excellence of people Jithream, a s...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3505.s: A group of warriors from Ithar(?), first mentioned at 2Sa.23.38; only referred to as Ithrites (יִתְרִי).
H3505.f: Clan descended from Kiriath-jearim; two of David's warriors.
H3505.meaning: patronymically from H3500 (יֶתֶר) a Jithrite or descendant of Jether
H3505.significance: Family of warrior. Name (patronymically from H3500 (יֶתֶר) a Jithrite or descendant of Jether). Name fits martial or military role.

H0863.d: David's compatriot living at the time of United Monarchy
H0863.s: A warrior living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.15.19; only referred to as Ittai (אִתַּי).
H0863.f: Gittite commander who remained loyal to David.
H0863.meaning: or אִיתַי; from H854 (אֵת); near Ittai or Ithai, the name of a Gittite and of an Israelite
H0863.significance: David's compatriot. Name meaning: or אִיתַי; from H854 (אֵת); near Ittai or Ithai, the name of a Gittite...

H3328.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3328.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.7; only referred to as Izhar (יִצְחַר);  son of Ashhur and Helah; a brother of Haahashtari, Zereth, Ethnan and Koz;  half-brother of: Ahuzzam, Hepher and Temeni.
H3328.f: Son of Asher listed in the genealogy in Chronicles
H3328.meaning: from the same as H6713 (צַחַר); he will shine Jitschar, an Israelite
H3328.significance: Minor figure; name: from the same as H6713 (צַחַר); he will shine Jitschar, an Israelite

H3324.d: Levite living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3324.s: A man from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Exo.6.18; referred to as Izhar (KJV= Izehar)  (יִצְהָר), or Izharite (יִצְהָרִי), or Izhar (עַמִּינָדָב);  son of Kohath; a brother of Amram, Hebron and Uzziel;  father of Korah, Nepheg, Zichri and Shelomith.
H3324.meaning: the same as H3323 (יִצְהָר) Jitshar, an Israelite
H3324.significance: levite living at the time of egypt and wilderness. Name (the same as H3323 (יִצְהָר) Jitshar, an Israelite). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H3152.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3152.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.18; only referred to as Izliah (יִזְלִיאָה);  son of Elpaal; a brother of Eber, Misham, Shemed, Beriah, Shema, Zebadiah, Meshullam, Hizki, Heber, Ishmerai and Jobab.
H3152.meaning: perhaps from an unused root (meaning to draw up); he will draw out Jizliah, an Israelite
H3152.significance: Minor figure; name: perhaps from an unused root (meaning to draw up); he will draw out Jizliah, an Israelite

H3156.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3156.s: A man from the tribe of Issachar living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.7.3; only referred to as Izrahiah (יִזְרַחְיָה); a son of Uzzi;  father of Michael, Obadiah, Joel and Isshiah.
H3156.meaning: Hitchcock: the Lord ariseth; the clearness of the Lord
H3156.significance: Issachar leader. Name (from H2224 (זָרַח) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah will shine Jizrachjah, the na...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3150.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H3150.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.10.25; only referred to as Izziah (יִזִּיָּה).
H3150.f: Descendant of Parosh; agreed to put away foreign wife.
H3150.meaning: from the same as the first part of H3149 (יְזַוְאֵל) and H3050 (יָהּ); sprinkled of Jah...

H3291.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3291.s: A man from the tribe of Simeon(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.36; only referred to as Jaakobah (יַעֲקֹ֫בָה).
H3291.significance: Minor figure; name: from H3290 (יַעֲקֹב) Jaakobah, an Israelite

H3279.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H3279.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.56; referred to as Jaalah or Jaala (יַעֲלָא).
H3279.f: Returned exile; descendant of Solomon's servants.
H3279.meaning: or יַעֲלָה; the same as H3280 (יַעֲלָה) or direct from H3276 (יַעַל) Jaala or Jaalah, one of the...
H3279.significance: Returned from exile. Name meaning: or יַעֲלָה; the same as H3280 (יַעֲלָה) or direct from H3276 (יַעַל) J...

H3296.d: Warrior living at the time of United Monarchy
H3296.s: A warrior living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.21.19; referred to as Jaare-oregim (יַעֲרֵי אֹרְגִים), or Jair (=Qere. Ketiv= Jaur) (יָעִיר);  father of Elhanan.
H3296.f: Father of Elhanan, who killed Goliath's brother.
H3296.meaning: from the plural of H3293 (יַעַר) and the masculine plural active participle of H707 (אָרַג);...
H3296.significance: David's warrior. Name (from the plural of H3293 (יַעַר) and the masculine plural active parti...). Name fits martial or military role.

H3298.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3298.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.27; only referred to as Jaareshiah (יַעֲרֶשְׁיָה);  son of Jeroham; a brother of Shamsherai, Shehariah, Athaliah, Elijah and Zichri.
H3298.meaning: from an unused root of uncertain signification and H3050 (יָהּ) Jaareshjah, an Israelite
H3298.significance: Minor figure; name: from an unused root of uncertain signification and H3050 (יָהּ) Jaareshjah, an Israelite

H3300.d: Man living at the time of United Monarchy
H3300.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.27.21; only referred to as Jaasiel (יַעֲשִׂיאֵל); a son of Abner.
H3300.f: Leader of the half-tribe of Manasseh during David's reign.
H3300.significance: Minor figure; name: from H6213 (עָשָׂה) and H410 (אֵל); made of God Jaasiel, an Israelite

H3299.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H3299.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.10.37; only referred to as Jaasu (וְיַעֲשׂוֹ).
H3299.f: Descendant of Bani; agreed to put away foreign wife.

H2970.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
