H2970.f: Israelite elder; participated in idolatry in the temple.
H2970.meaning: Hitchcock: whom the Lord will hear
H2970.significance: Minor figure; name: or יַאֲזַנְיָהוּ; from H238 (אָזַן) and H3050 (יָהּ); heard of Jah Jaazanjah, the name of four...

H3269.d: Levite living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3269.s: A man from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at 1Ch.24.26; only referred to as Jaaziah (יַעֲזִיָּ֫הוּ);  son of Merari; a brother of Mahli and Mushi;  father of Beno, Shoham, Zaccur and Ibri.
H3269.f: Levite, descendant of Merari during David's reign.
H3269.meaning: Hitchcock: Jaaziel, the strength of the Lord
H3269.significance: Son of Merari. Name (from H3267 (יָעַז) and H3050 (יָהּ); emboldened of Jah Jaazijah, an Is...). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H3268.d: Singer living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3268.s: A musician living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.15.18; referred to as Jaaziel (יַעֲזִיאֵל), or Aziel (עֲזִיאֵל).
H3268.meaning: from H3267 (יָעַז) and H410 (אֵל); emboldened of God Jaaziel, an Israelite
H3268.significance: A singer. Name meaning: from H3267 (יָעַז) and H410 (אֵל); emboldened of God Jaaziel, an Israe...

H2989.d: Man living at the time before the Flood
H2989.s: A man living at the time before the Flood, only mentioned at Gen.4.20; only referred to as Jabal (יָבָל);  son of Lamech and Adah; a brother of Jubal, Tubal-cain, Naamah.
H2989.f: Son of Lamech; father of nomadic herdsmen.
H2989.significance: Minor figure; name: the same as H2988 (יָבָל) Jabal, an antediluvian

H3003.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3003.s: A man of the Kingdom of Israel, living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.15.10; only referred to as Jabesh (יָבֵשׁ);  father of Shallum.
H3003.f: Assassinated Zechariah; reigned as king of Israel for a month.
H3003.significance: Father of Shallum. Name (the same as H3002 (יָבֵשׁ) (also יָבֵישׁ; often with the addition of H...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3258.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3258.s: A man from the tribe of Judah  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.4.9; only referred to as Jabez (יַעְבֵּץ);  son of Koz(?); a brother of Anub(?), Zobebah(?) and Harum(?).
H3258.f: More honorable than his brothers; God granted his prayer.
H3258.meaning: Hitchcock: sorrow; trouble. BehindTheName: Possibly means 'sorrow' in Hebrew.
H3258.significance: Son of Koz. Name (from an unused root probably meaning to grieve; sorrowful Jabets, the ...). Name in lineage or family context.

H2985.s: A king in Canaan living before Israel's Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.4.2; only referred to as Jabin (יָבִין).
H2985.f: Canaanite king who oppressed Israel; defeated by Deborah and Barak.
H2985.meaning: Hitchcock: Jabneh, he that understands; building
H2985.significance: Canaanite king. Name (from H995 (בִּין); intelligent Jabin, the name of two Canaanitish king...). Name in royal or ruling context.

H3275.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3275.s: A man from the tribe of Gad  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.5.13; only referred to as Jacan (יַעְכָּן);  son of Abihail; a brother of Michael, Meshullam, Sheba, Jorai, Zia and Eber.
H3275.f: Gadite leader during the reign of Jotham.
H3275.meaning: from the same as H5912 (עָכָן); troublesome Jakan, an Israelite
H3275.significance: Minor figure; name: from the same as H5912 (עָכָן); troublesome Jakan, an Israelite

H3199.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3199.s: A man from the tribe of Simeon living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.10; referred to as Jachin (יָכִין), or Jachinite (יָכִינִי), or Jarib (יָרִיב);  son of Simeon; a brother of Jemuel, Jamin, Ohad, Zerah  and Shaul.
H3199.meaning: Hitchcock: he that strengthens and makes steadfast
H3199.significance: Son of Simeon. Name (from H3559 (כּוּן); he (or it) will establish Jakin, the name of three...). Name in lineage or family context.

G2384.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
G2384.f: Father of Joseph, the husband of Mary.
G2384.meaning: Greek Ἰακώβ (Iakob); from Hebrew Jacob. Jacob = supplanter. Hitchcock: that supplants, undermines; the heel. BehindTheName: From Hebrew יַעֲקֹב (Yaʿaqov) possibly meaning 'holder of the heel' or 'supplanter', from עָקַב (ʿaqav) 'heel'.
G2384.significance: Patriarch; father of the twelve tribes. NT references to Israel and the covenant promises (Rom 9:13; Heb 11:21).

H3047.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3047.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.2.28; only referred to as Jada (יָדָע);  son of Onam; a brother of Shammai;  father of Jether and Jonathan.
H3047.f: Son of Onam and brother of Shammai.
H3047.significance: Son of Onam. Name (from H3045 (יָדַע); knowing Jada, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H3037.d: Priest living at the time of Exile and Return
H3037.s: A High Priest from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Neh.12.11; only referred to as Jaddua (יַדּוּעַ); a son of Johanan.
H3037.f: High priest during the time of Alexander the Great.
H3037.significance: High Priest. Name (from H3045 (יָדַע); knowing Jaddua, the name of two Israelites). Name fits cultic or priestly role.

H3036.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H3036.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.3.7; only referred to as Jadon (יָדוֹן).
H3036.f: Meronothite who helped repair Jerusalem's walls under Nehemiah.
H3036.meaning: from H3034 (יָדָה); thankful Jadon, an Israelite
H3036.significance: Minor figure; name: from H3034 (יָדָה); thankful Jadon, an Israelite

H3278.s: A woman living before Israel's Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.4.17; only referred to as Jael (יָעֵל); wife of Heber.
H3278.f: Wife of Heber; killed Sisera, the Canaanite commander.
H3278.meaning: Hitchcock: he that ascends; a kid. BehindTheName: Means 'mountain goat' in Hebrew.
H3278.significance: woman living before israel's monarchy. Name meaning: the same as H3277 (יָעֵל) Jael, a Canaanite

H3189.d: Levite living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3189.s: A man from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at 1Ch.23.10; only referred to as Jahath (יַ֫חַת);  son of Shimei; a brother of Zizah, Jeush, and Beriah.
H3189.f: Levite, descendant of Shimei, son of Gershon.
H3189.significance: Son of Shimei. Name (from H3161 (יָחַד); unity Jachath, the name of four Israelites). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H3166.d: Levite living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3166.s: A man from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at 1Ch.23.19; only referred to as Jahaziel (יַחֲזִיאֵל);  son of Hebron; a brother of Jeriah, Amariah and Jekameam.
H3166.f: Levite, son of Hebron, during David's reign.
H3166.significance: Son of Hebron. Name (from H2372 (חָזָה) and H410 (אֵל); beheld of God Jachaziel, the name o...). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H3056.d: Woman living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3056.s: A woman from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.47; only referred to as Jahdai (יַהְדַּי);  wife of Caleb;  mother of Regem, Jotham, Geshan, Pelet, Ephah and Shaaph.
H3056.f: Descendant of Caleb, son of Jephunneh.
H3056.meaning: perhaps from a form corresponding to H3061 (יְהוּד)lemma יְהיּד yod, corrected to יְהוּד;...
H3056.significance: Minor figure; name: perhaps from a form corresponding to H3061 (יְהוּד)lemma יְהיּד yod, corrected to יְהוּד;...

H3164.d: Warrior living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3164.s: A warrior from the tribe of Manasseh  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.5.24; only referred to as Jahdiel (יַחְדִּיאֵל).
H3164.f: Mighty warrior and head of a father's house in Manasseh.
H3164.meaning: Hitchcock: the unity, or sharpness, or revenge, of God
H3164.significance: Minor figure; name: from H3162 (יַחַד) and H410 (אֵל); unity of God Jachdiel, an Israelite

H3163.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3163.s: A man from the tribe of Gad  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.5.14; only referred to as Jahdo (יַחְדּוֹ); a son of Buz;  father of Jeshishai.
H3163.meaning: Hitchcock: I alone; his joy; his sharpness of wit; his newness
H3163.significance: Son of Buz. Name (from H3162 (יַחַד) with pronominal suffix; his unity, i.e. (adverb) to...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3177.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3177.s: A man from the tribe of Zebulun living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.14; referred to as Jahleel (יַחְלְאֵל), or Jahleelite (יַחְלְאֵלִי);  son of Zebulun; a brother of Sered and Elon.
H3177.f: Son of Zebulun, grandson of Jacob, and a clan leader.
H3177.meaning: Hitchcock: waiting for, or beseeching, or hope in, God
H3177.significance: Son of Zebulun. Name (from H3176 (יָחַל) and H410 (אֵל); expectant of God Jachleel, an Israe...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3181.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3181.s: A warrior from the tribe of Issachar living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.2; only referred to as Jahmai (יַחְמַי);  son of Tola; a brother of Uzzi, Rephaiah, Jeriel, Ibsam and Shemuel.
H3181.significance: Minor figure; name: probably from H3179 (יָחַם); hot Jachmai, an Israelite

H3183.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3183.s: A man from the tribe of Naphtali living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.24; referred to as Jahzeel (יַחְצְאֵל), or Jahzeelite (יַחְצְאֵלִי), or Jahziel (יַחְצִיאֵל);  son of Naphtali; a brother of Guni, Jezer and Shillem.
H3183.significance: Son of Naphtali. Name (from H2673 (חָצָה)lemma חָעָה ayin, corrected to חָצָה and H410 (אֵל);...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3167.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H3167.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.10.15; only referred to as Jahzeiah (יַחְזְיָה); a son of Tikvah.
H3167.f: Opposed Ezra's command for Israelites to divorce foreign wives.
H3167.meaning: from H2372 (חָזָה) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah will behold Jachzejah, an Israelite
H3167.significance: Minor figure; name: from H2372 (חָזָה) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah will behold Jachzejah, an Israelite

H3170.d: Levite living at the time of Exile and Return
H3170.s: A man from the tribe of Levi  living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at 1Ch.9.12; only referred to as Jahzerah (יַחְזֵרָה); a son of Meshullam;  father of Adiel.
H3170.meaning: from the same as H2386 (חֲזִיר); perhaps protection Jachzerah, an Israelite
H3170.significance: Son of Meshullam. Name (from the same as H2386 (חֲזִיר); perhaps protection Jachzerah, an Isra...). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H2971.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H2971.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.32.41; referred to as Jair (יָאִיר), or Jairite (יָאִרִי); a son of Segub.
H2971.meaning: Hitchcock: Jairus, my light; who diffuses light
H2971.significance: Son of Segub. Name (from H215 (אוֹר); enlightener Jair, the name of four Israelites). Name in lineage or family context.

G2383.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G2383.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mrk.5.22; only referred to as Jairus (Ἰάειρος).
G2383.f: Synagogue leader whose daughter Jesus healed
G2383.meaning: Greek Ἰάειρος (Iaeiros); from Hebrew יָאִיר (Yair), he will enlighten. Jairus = he will enlighten. Ruler of the synagogue (Mark 5:22). BehindTheName: From Hebrew יָאִיר meaning 'he shines'.
G2383.significance: Begged Jesus to heal his daughter (Mark 5:23); daughter raised (Mark 5:42). Name (he will enlighten) as the one whose house was enlightened by the resurrection.

H3348.d: Man living at the time of United Monarchy
H3348.s: A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at Pro.30.1; only referred to as Jakeh (יָקֶה);  father of Agur.
H3348.f: Father of Agur, the author of Proverbs 30
H3348.meaning: from an unused root probably meaning to obey; obedient Jakeh, a symbolical name (for Solomon)
H3348.significance: Father of Agur. Name (from an unused root probably meaning to obey; obedient Jakeh, a symbol...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3356.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3356.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.19; only referred to as Jakim (יָקִים);  son of Shimei; a brother of Zichri, Zabdi, Elienai, Zillethai, Eliel, Adaiah, Beraiah and Shimrath.
H3356.significance: Minor figure; name: from H6965 (קוּם); he will raise Jakim, the name of two Israelites

H3281.d: Edomite living at the time of the Patriarchs
H3281.s: A man of the Edomites living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.5; only referred to as Jalam (יַעְלָם);  son of Esau and Oholibamah; a brother of Jeush and Korah;  half-brother of: Eliphaz and Reuel.
H3281.meaning: from H5956 (עָלַם); occult Jalam, an Edomite
H3281.significance: Son of Esau. Name (from H5956 (עָלַם); occult Jalam, an Edomite). Name in lineage or family context.

H3210.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3210.s: A man from the tribe of Judah(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.17; only referred to as Jalon (יָלוֹן);  son of Ezrah; a brother of Jether, Mered and Epher.
H3210.f: Son of Ezrah, from the tribe of Judah
H3210.significance: Minor figure; name: from H3885 (לוּן); lodging Jalon, an Israelite

G2387.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G2387.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at 2Ti.3.8; only referred to as Jambres (Ἰαμβρῆς).
G2387.meaning: Greek Ἰαμβρῆς (Iambres); Egyptian name. Jambres = one of Pharaoh’s magicians (2 Tim 3:8). Hitchcock: poverty; bitter; a rebel
G2387.significance: With Jannes, opposed Moses (2 Tim 3:8). “Foolish and unfit for the faith.” Name as the type of the opposition that cannot stand before the truth.

G2385.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G2385.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.13.55; only referred to as James (Ἰάκωβος);  son of Joseph and Mary; a brother of Jesus, Joses, Simon and Jude.
G2385.f: Jesus' brother, leader in the Jerusalem church
G2385.meaning: Greek Ἰάκωβος (Iakobos); from Hebrew Jacob. James = supplanter. Multiple: son of Zebedee, son of Alphaeus, brother of the Lord. Hitchcock: same as Jacob. BehindTheName: English form of Iacomus (Latin), from Jacob.
G2385.significance: James son of Zebedee: apostle, martyr (Acts 12:2). James brother of the Lord: leader in Jerusalem (Acts 15), author of James. Name in the circle of the Twelve and the family of Jesus.

H3226.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3226.s: A man from the tribe of Simeon living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.10; referred to as Jamin (יָמִין), or Jaminite (יָֽמִינִי);  son of Simeon; a brother of Jemuel, Ohad, Jachin, Zerah and Shaul.
H3226.f: Son of Simeon, grandson of Jacob
H3226.significance: Son of Simeon. Name (the same as H3225 (יָמִין) Jamin, the name of three Israelites). Name in lineage or family context.

H3230.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3230.s: A man from the tribe of Simeon(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.34; only referred to as Jamlech (יַמְלֵךְ).
H3230.significance: Minor figure; name: from H4427 (מָלַךְ); he will make king Jamlek, an Israelite

H3285.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3285.s: A man from the tribe of Gad  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.5.12; only referred to as Janai (יַעֲנַי).
H3285.f: Gadite leader who settled in Bashan
H3285.meaning: from the same as H3283 (יָעֵן); responsive Jaanai, an Israelite
H3285.significance: Minor figure; name: from the same as H3283 (יָעֵן); responsive Jaanai, an Israelite

G2388.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
G2388.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Luk.3.24; only referred to as Jannai (Ἰαννά); a son of Joseph;  father of Melchi.
G2388.f: Ancestor of Jesus in Luke's genealogy
G2388.meaning: probably of Hebrew origin (compare H03238) Janna, an Israelite
G2388.significance: Son of Joseph. Name (probably of Hebrew origin (compare H03238) Janna, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

G2389.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G2389.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at 2Ti.3.8; only referred to as Jannes (Ἰαννῆς).
G2389.meaning: Greek Ἰαννῆς (Iannes); Egyptian name. Jannes = one of Pharaoh’s magicians (2 Tim 3:8).
G2389.significance: With Jambres, opposed Moses (2 Tim 3:8). Name as the type of the wisdom of the world—which is folly before the word of God.

H3315.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H3315.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.5.32; only referred to as Japheth (יֶ֫פֶת);  son of Noah; a brother of Shem and Ham;  father of Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshech and Tiras. See ambiguities hereonly referred to as Japheth (יֶ֫פֶת);  son of Noah; a brother of Shem and Ham;  father of Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshech and Tiras.
H3315.f: Son of Noah, ancestor of Indo-European peoples
H3315.meaning: BehindTheName: From Hebrew יֶפֶת possibly meaning 'opened' or 'enlarged'.
H3315.significance: Son of Noah. Name (from H6601 (פָּתָה); expansion Jepheth, a son of Noah; also his poster...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3309.d: David's son living at the time of United Monarchy
H3309.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.5.15; only referred to as Japhia (יָפִיעַ);  son of David; a brother of Amnon, Chileab, Absalom, Adonijah, Shephatiah, Ithream, Shammua, Shobab, Nathan, Solomon, Ibhar, Elishua, Nepheg, Elishama, Eliada, Eliphelet, Tamar, Elpelet, Nogah and Jerimoth.
H3309.f: Son of David, born in Jerusalem
H3309.significance: David's son. Name (from H3313 (יָפַע); bright Japhia, the name of a Canaanite, an Israeli...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3310.s: A man from the tribe of Asher living before Israel's Monarchy, first mentioned at Jos.16.3; referred to as Japhlet (יַפְלֵט), or Japhletite (יַפְלֵטִי);  son of Heber; a brother of Shomer, Hotham and Shua;  father of Pasach, Bimhal and Ashvath.
H3310.f: Descendant of Asher, son of Heber
H3310.significance: Son of Heber. Name (from H6403 (פָּלַט); he will deliver Japhlet, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H3382.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3382.s: A man from the tribe of Judah(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.18; only referred to as Jered (יֶ֫רֶד);  son of Mered and Jehudijah; a brother of Heber and Jekuthiel;  half-brother of: Miriam(?), Shammai(?) and Ishbah(?); founder of Gedor.
H3382.f: Son of Mered, founder of Gedor.
H3382.significance: Minor figure; name: from H3381 (יָרַד); a descent Jered, the name of an antediluvian, and of an Israelite

H3398.d: Egyptian living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3398.s: A man of Egypt living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.2.34; only referred to as Jarha (יַרְחָע); husband of Ahlai;  father of Attai.
H3398.f: Egyptian servant who married Sheshan's daughter
H3398.meaning: probably of Egyptian origin Jarcha, an Egyptian
H3398.significance: An Egyptian. Name meaning: probably of Egyptian origin Jarcha, an Egyptian

H3402.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H3402.s: A priest living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.10.18; only referred to as Jarib (יָרִיב).
H3402.f: Priest who married a foreign woman
H3402.significance: Minor figure; name: the same as H3401 (יָרִיב) Jarib, the name of three Israelites

H3386.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3386.s: A man from the tribe of Gad  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.5.14; only referred to as Jaroah (יָרוֹחַ); a son of Gilead;  father of Huri.
H3386.meaning: perhaps denominative from H3394 (יָרֵחַ); (born at the) new moon Jaroach, an Israelite
H3386.significance: Son of Gilead. Name (perhaps denominative from H3394 (יָרֵחַ); (born at the) new moon Jaroa...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3477.s: A man living before Israel's Monarchy, first mentioned at Jos.10.13; only referred to as Jashar (יָשָׁר).
H3477.f: Ancient Hebrew book mentioned in the Old Testament
H3477.significance: Author of book. Name meaning: from H3474 (יָשַׁר) straight (literally or figuratively)

H3464.d: Warrior living at the time of United Monarchy
H3464.s: A warrior living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.23.32; only referred to as son of Jashen;  unnamed son of: Jashen.
H3464.f: Son of Jashen - One of David's mighty men
H3464.meaning: the same as H3463 (יָשֵׁן) Jashen, an Israelite
H3464.significance: Minor figure; name: the same as H3463 (יָשֵׁן) Jashen, an Israelite

H3434.d: Warrior living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3434.s: A warrior living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.23.8; referred to as Jashobeam (יָשׇׁבְעָם), or Josheb-basshebeth (KJV= "that sat in the seat")  (יֹשֵׁב בַּשֶּׁ֫בֶת); a son of Zabdiel.
H3434.f: Chief of David's mighty men, Hachmoni's son
H3434.meaning: Hitchcock: the people sitting; or captivity of the people
H3434.significance: David's warrior. Name (from H7725 (שׁוּב) and H5971 (עַם); people will return Jashobam, the n...). Name fits martial or military role.

H3437.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3437.s: A man from the tribe of Issachar living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.13; referred to as Jashub (=Qere. Ketiv= Jashib) (יָשׁוּב), or Jashubite (יָשֻׁבִי), or Yob (KJV= Job, NIV= Jashub)  (יוֹב);  son of Issachar; a brother of Tola, Puah and Shimron.
H3437.meaning: Hitchcock: a returning; a controversy; a dwelling place
H3437.significance: man living at the time of egypt and wilderness. Name (or יָשִׁיב; from H7725 (שׁוּב); he will return Jashub, the name of two...). Name in lineage or family context.

G2394.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G2394.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.17.5; only referred to as Jason (Ἰάσων).
G2394.f: Paul's host in Thessalonica; relative of Paul
G2394.meaning: Greek Ἰάσων (Iason); from Greek ἰάομαι (iaomai), heal. Jason = healer. Host of Paul in Thessalonica (Acts 17:5). Hitchcock: he that cures. BehindTheName: From Greek Ἰάσων possibly meaning 'healer'.
G2394.significance: Paul and Silas stayed with him (Acts 17:7); dragged before the authorities (Acts 17:6). Name (healer) as the one who received the apostles—and bore the cost.

H3496.d: Levite living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3496.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.26.2; only referred to as Jathniel (יַתְנִיאֵל);  son of Meshelemiah; a brother of Zechariah, Jediael, Zebadiah, Elam, Jehohanan and Eliehoenai.
H3496.significance: Minor figure; name: from an unused root meaning to endure, and H410 (אֵל); continued of God Jathniel, an Israelite

H3120.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H3120.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.2; referred to as Javan (יָוָן), or Greek (יְוָנִי=יְוָנִי), Gentile or Greek (NIV= Gentile)  (Ἕλλην=Ἕλλην), or Gentile (KJV, NIV= Greek)  (Ἑλληνίς=Ἑλληνίς);  son of Japheth; a brother of Gomer, Magog, Madai, Tubal, Meshech and Tiras;  father of Elishah, Tarshish, Kittim and Dodanim.

H3120.significance: man living at the time of the patriarchs. Name (probably from the same as H3196 (יַיִן); effervescing (i.e. hot and ac...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3151.significance: Minor figure; name: from the same as H2123 (זִיז); he will make prominent Jaziz, an Israelite

H2979.d: Levite living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2979.s: A man from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.6.21; referred to as Jeatherai (יְאָֽתְרַי), or Ethni (אֶתְנִי); a son of Zerah;  father of Malchijah.

H3000.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy

H3000.significance: Father of Zechariah. Name (from H1288 (בָרַךְ) and H3050 (יָהּ); blessed of Jah Jeberekjah, an Is...). Name in lineage or family context.

H2983.s: People from Jebus(?) of the Canaanites, first mentioned at Gen.10.16; only referred to as Jebusites (יְבוּסִי); descended from Canaan along with Sidon, Heth, Amorites, Girgashites, Hivites, Arkites, Sinites, Arvadites, Zemarites and Hamathites.

H3042.significance: Son of Shimri. Name (from H3034 (יָדָה) and H3050 (יָהּ); praised of Jah Jedajah, the name ...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3038.significance: A Singer. Name (or יְדֻתוּן; or יְדִיתוּן; probably from H3034 (יָדָה); laudatory Jedu...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3083.meaning: From יָהּ (Yah) + נָתַן (natan), give. Jonathan = Yah has given. Son of Saul (1 Sam 14:1). Hitchcock: given of God. BehindTheName: From Hebrew יוֹנָתָן (Yonatan) meaning 'Yahweh has given'.
H3083.significance: Friend of David; covenant with him (1 Sam 18:3). Died with Saul at Gilboa (1 Sam 31:2). Name (Yah has given) as the gift of friendship—and the one who yielded the kingdom to David.

H3088.significance: King of Judah. Name (from H3068 (יְהֹוָה) and H7311 (רוּם); Jehovah-raised Jehoram, the nam...). Name in royal or ruling context.

H3087.significance: A High Priest. Name (from H3068 (יְהֹוָה) and H6663 (צָדַק); Jehovah-righted Jehotsadak, an...). Name fits cultic or priestly role.

H3058.significance: King of N. Israel. Name (from H3068 (יְהֹוָה) and H1931 (הוּא); Jehovah (is) He Jehu, the name ...). Name in royal or ruling context.

H3065.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy

H3273.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy

H3224.f: One of Job's daughters born after his restoration.
H3224.meaning: perhaps from the same as H3117 (יוֹם); properly, warm, i.e. affectionate; hence, dove (compare...
H3224.significance: Minor figure; name: perhaps from the same as H3117 (יוֹם); properly, warm, i.e. affectionate; hence, dove (compare...

H3223.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3223.s: A man from the tribe of Simeon living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.10; referred to as Jemuel (יְמוּאֵל), or Nemuel (נְמוּאֵל), or Nemuelite (נְמוּאֵלִי);  son of Simeon; a brother of Jamin, Ohad, Jachin, Zerah and Shaul.
H3223.meaning: Hitchcock: God's day; son of God
H3223.significance: Son of Simeon. Name (from H3117 (יוֹם) and H410 (אֵל); day of God Jemuel, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H3316.s: A Judge living before Israel's Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.11.1; referred to as Jephthah (יִפְתָּח), or Jephthah (KJV= Jephthae)  (Ἰεφθάε); a son of Gilead.
H3316.f: A judge of Israel, known for his tragic vow.
H3316.meaning: BehindTheName: From Hebrew יִפְתָּח meaning 'he opens'.
H3316.significance: A Judge. Name (from H6605 (פָּתַח); he will open Jiphtach, an Israelite; also a place...). Name in judicial or deliverer context.

H3312.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3312.s: A man from the tribe of Asher living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.38; only referred to as Jephunneh (יְפֻנֶּה);  son of Ithran; a brother of Pispa and Ara.
H3312.significance: Minor figure; name: from H6437 (פָּנָה); he will be prepared Jephunneh, the name of two Israelites

H3392.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H3392.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.26; only referred to as Jerah (יֶ֫רַח);  son of Joktan; a brother of Almodad, Sheleph, Hazarmaveth, Hadoram, Uzal, Diklah, Obal, Abimael, Sheba, Ophir, Havilah and Jobab.
H3392.f: A son of Joktan, descendant of Shem.
H3392.meaning: Hitchcock: the moon; month; smelling sweet
H3392.significance: Son of Joktan. Name (the same as H3391 (יֶרַח) Jerach, an Arabian patriarch). Name in lineage or family context.

H3396.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living before Israel's Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.27.10; referred to as Jerahmeel (יְרַחְמְאֵל), or Jerahmeelite (יְרַחְמְאֵלִי);  son of Hezron; a brother of Ram, Caleb, Segub and Ashhur; husband of Atarah;  father of Ram, Bunah, Oren, Ozem, Ahijah and Onam.
H3396.f: Son of Hezron, a descendant of Judah.
H3396.meaning: Hitchcock: the mercy, or the beloved, of God
H3396.significance: Son of Hezron. Name (from H7355 (רָחַם) and H410 (אֵל); God will compassionate Jerachmeel, ...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3413.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H3413.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.10.33; only referred to as Jeremai (יְרֵמַי).
H3413.f: A descendant of Hashum who married a foreign wife.
H3413.meaning: Hitchcock: my height; throwing forth waters
H3413.significance: Minor figure; name: from H7311 (רוּם); elevated Jeremai, an Israelite

H3414.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3414.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Jer.35.3; only referred to as Jeremiah (יִרְמְיָ֫הוּ); a son of Habazziniah;  father of Jaazaniah.
H3414.meaning: From רָם (ram), exalt, + יָהּ (Yah). Jeremiah = Yah exalts, or Yah loosens (womb). Prophet (Jer 1:1). Hitchcock: exaltation of the Lord. BehindTheName: From Hebrew יִרְמְיָהוּ meaning 'Yahweh will exalt'.
H3414.significance: Prophet of the fall of Jerusalem; weeping prophet (Jer 9:1). Name (Yah exalts) as the one who spoke the word of judgment—and of the new covenant (Jer 31:31).

H3406.d: David's son living at the time of United Monarchy
H3406.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.11.18; only referred to as Jerimoth (יְרֵמוֹת, יְרִימוֹת);  son of David; a brother of Amnon, Chileab, Absalom, Adonijah, Shephatiah, Ithream, Shammua, Shobab, Nathan, Solomon, Ibhar, Elishua, Nepheg, Japhia, Elishama, Eliada, Eliphelet, Tamar, Elpelet and Nogah;  father of Mahalath.
H3406.meaning: Hitchcock: he that fears or rejects death
H3406.significance: David's son. Name (or יְרֵימוֹת; or יְרֵמוֹת; feminine plural from H7311 (רוּם); elevatio...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3404.d: Levite living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3404.s: A man from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at 1Ch.23.19; only referred to as Jeriah (יְרִיָּהוּ);  son of Hebron; a brother of Amariah, Jahaziel and Jekameam.
H3404.f: A Levite, the firstborn son of Hebron.
H3404.meaning: Hitchcock: fear, or throwing down, of the Lord
H3404.significance: Son of Hebron. Name (or יְרִיָּהוּ; from H3384 (יָרָה) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah will throw Jer...). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H3403.d: Warrior living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3403.s: A warrior living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.11.46; only referred to as Jeribai (יְרִיבַי);  son of Elnaam; a brother of Joshaviah.
H3403.meaning: from H3401 (יָרִיב); contentious Jeribai, an Israelite
H3403.significance: Minor figure; name: from H3401 (יָרִיב); contentious Jeribai, an Israelite

H3400.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3400.s: A warrior from the tribe of Issachar living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.2; only referred to as Jeriel (יְרִיאֵל);  son of Tola; a brother of Uzzi, Rephaiah, Jahmai, Ibsam and Shemuel.
H3400.f: A son of Tola, from the tribe of Issachar.
H3400.meaning: Hitchcock: fear, or vision of God
H3400.significance: Minor figure; name: from H3384 (יָרָה) and H410 (אֵל); thrown of God Jeriel, an Israelite

H3408.d: Woman living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3408.s: A woman from the tribe of Judah  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.18; only referred to as Jerioth (יְרִיעוֹת); wife of Caleb; mother of Mesha(?).
H3408.f: Wife of Caleb; mother of unnamed children.
H3408.significance: Minor figure; name: plural of H3407 (יְרִיעָה); curtains Jerioth, an Israelitess

H3379.d: King living at the time of United Monarchyand Divided Monarchy
H3379.s: A king of Northern Israel, living at the time of United Monarchyand Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ki.11.26; only referred to as Jeroboam (יָֽרָבְעָם); a son of Nebat and Zeruah;  father of Abijah, Nadab.
H3379.f: First king of the northern kingdom of Israel.
H3379.meaning: Hitchcock: he that opposes the people
H3379.significance: King of N. Israel. Name (from H7378 (רִיב) and H5971 (עַם); (the) people will contend Jarobam, ...). Name in royal or ruling context.

H3395.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3395.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.27; only referred to as Jeroham (יְרֹחָם);  father of Shamsherai, Shehariah, Athaliah, Jaareshiah, Elijah and Zichri.
H3395.significance: Father of Shamsherai. Name (from H7355 (רָחַם); compassionate Jerocham, the name of seven or eight...). Name in lineage or family context.

H0802.d: Woman living at the time of United Monarchy
H0802.s: A woman living at the time of United Monarchy, implied at 2Sa.5.13 ; only referred to as Jerusalem_wives (.);   wife of David;  mother of Eliada, Eliphelet, Elpelet, Elishama, Elishua, Ibhar, Japhia, Jerimoth(?), Nepheg, Nogah.
H0802.meaning: feminine of H376 (אִישׁ) or H582 (אֱנוֹשׁ); irregular plural, נָשִׁים;(used in the same wide...
H0802.significance: From  Judah. Name meaning: feminine of H376 (אִישׁ) or H582 (אֱנוֹשׁ); irregular plural, נָשִׁים;...

H3388.d: Woman living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3388.s: A woman living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.15.33; referred to as Jerusha or Jerushah (NIV= Jerusha)  (יְרוּשָׁא, יְרוּשָׁה); a daughter of Zadok; wife of Uzziah;  mother of Jotham.
H3388.f: Mother of King Jotham of Judah.
H3388.significance: Daughter of Zadok. Name meaning: or יְרוּשָׁה feminine passive participle of H3423 (יָרַשׁ); possessed ...

H3428.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3428.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.24.13; only referred to as Jeshebeab (יֶֽשֶׁבְאָב).
H3428.f: Head of the fourteenth priestly division.
H3428.meaning: Hitchcock: sitting, or captivity, of the father
H3428.significance: Minor figure; name: from H3427 (יָשַׁב) and H1 (אָב); seat of (his) father Jeshebab, an Israelite

H3475.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3475.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.18; only referred to as Jesher (יֶ֫שֶׁר);  son of Caleb and Azubah(?); a brother of Hur, Shobab, Ardon, Mesha, Haran, Moza, Gazez, Sheber, Tirhanah, Regem(?), Jotham(?), Geshan(?), Pelet(?), Ephah(?), Shaaph(?), Shaaph, Sheva and Achsah.
H3475.f: A son of Caleb and Azubah.
H3475.significance: Minor figure; name: from H3474 (יָשַׁר); the right Jesher, an Israelite

H3454.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3454.s: A man from the tribe of Gad  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.5.14; only referred to as Jeshishai (יְשִׁישַׁי); a son of Jahdo;  father of Michael.
H3454.significance: Son of Jahdo. Name (from H3453 (יָשִׁישׁ); aged Jeshishai, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H3439.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3439.s: A man from the tribe of Simeon(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.36; only referred to as Jeshohaiah (יְשׁוֹחָיָה).
H3439.f: A leader from the tribe of Simeon.
H3439.meaning: from the same as H3445 (יֶשַׁח) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah will empty Jeshochajah, an Israelite
H3439.significance: Minor figure; name: from the same as H3445 (יֶשַׁח) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah will empty Jeshochajah, an Israelite

H3442.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H3442.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.6; only referred to as Jeshua (יֵשׁוּעַ);  son of Pahath-moab ; a brother of Joab.
H3442.f: Leader of a group that returned from Babylonian exile.
H3442.significance: Returned leader. Name (for H3091 (יְהוֹשׁוּעַ); he will save Jeshua, the name of ten Israelit...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3450.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3450.s: A man from the tribe of Simeon(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.36; only referred to as Jesimiel (יְשִׁימִאֵל).
H3450.f: A leader from the tribe of Simeon.
H3450.meaning: Hitchcock: naming, or astonishment, of God
H3450.significance: Minor figure; name: from H7760 (שׂוּם) and H410 (אֵל); God will place Jesimael, an Israelite

H3448.d: David's father living at the time of United Monarchy
H3448.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at Rut.4.17; referred to as Jesse (יִשַׁי), or Jesse (Ἰεσσαί); a son of Obed;  father of David, Eliab, Abinadab, Shimeah, Nethanel, Raddai, Ozem, Zeruiah, Abigail(?) and Elihu.
H3448.meaning: Hitchcock: gift; oblation; one who is. BehindTheName: From Hebrew יִשַׁי (Yishay), meaning uncertain, possibly 'gift'.
H3448.significance: David's father. Name (by Aramaic אִישַׁי; from the same as H3426 (יֵשׁ); extant Jishai, Davi...). Name in lineage or family context.

G2424.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G2424.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.1.1; referred to as Jesus (Ἰησοῦς), or Christ (Χριστός), or Christian (Χριστιανός), or Immanuel (KJV= Emmanuel) (עִמָּנוּאֵל), or Immanuel (Ἐμμανουήλ);  son of Joseph and Mary; a brother of James, Joses, Simon and Jude.
G2424.meaning: Greek Ἰησοῦς (Iesous); from Hebrew יְהוֹשֻׁעַ (Yehoshua). Jesus = YHWH saves. Hitchcock: savior; deliverer. BehindTheName: From Greek Ἰησοῦς (Iesous), from Hebrew יֵשׁוּעַ (Yeshuaʿ), short form of יְהוֹשֻׁעַ (Yehoshuaʿ) meaning 'Yahweh is salvation'.
G2424.significance: The name given by the angel (Matt 1:21); the name above every name (Phil 2:9). Covenant salvation in person—God with us. No other name under heaven (Acts 4:12).

H3500.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3500.s: A man from the tribe of Judah(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.17; only referred to as Jether (יֶ֫תֶר);  son of Ezrah; a brother of Mered, Epher and Jalon.
H3500.f: Son of Ezrah; brother of Mered, Epher and Jalon
H3500.significance: Minor figure; name: the same as H3499 (יֶתֶר) Jether, the name of five or six Israelites and of one Midianite

H3509.d: Edomite living at the time of the Patriarchs
H3509.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.40; only referred to as Jetheth (יְתֵת).
H3509.significance: From Edom. Name meaning: of uncertain derivation Jetheth, an Edomite

H3503.d: Midianite living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3503.s: A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Exo.2.18; referred to as Jethro (יִתְרוֹ), or Jethro (יֶ֫תֶר), or Jothor (LXX) (Ιωθώρ), or Reuel (KJV= Raguel) or Reuel (רְעוּאֵל);  father of Zipporah and Hobab.
H3503.meaning: Hitchcock: his excellence; his posterity. BehindTheName: From Hebrew יִתְרוֹ meaning 'his excellence'.
H3503.significance: midianite living at the time of egypt and wilderness. Name meaning: from H3499 (יֶתֶר) with pron. suffix; his excellence Jethro, Moses' fa...

H3195.d: Arabian living at the time of the Patriarchs
H3195.s: A man of the Arabs living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.25.15; only referred to as Jetur (יְטוּר);  son of Ishmael; a brother of Nebaioth, Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam, Mishma, Dumah, Massa, Hadad, Tema, Naphish, Kedemah and Mahalath.
H3195.significance: Son of Ishmael. Name (probably from the same as H2905 (טוּר); encircled (i.e. inclosed) Jetu...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3262.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H3262.s: A man from the tribe of Judah  living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at 1Ch.9.6; only referred to as Jeuel (יְעוּאֵל).
H3262.meaning: Hitchcock: God hath taken away; God heaping up
H3262.significance: Minor figure; name: from H3261 (יָעָה) and H410 (אֵל); carried away of God Jeuel, the name of four Israelites

H3266.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3266.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.11.19; only referred to as Jeush (יְעוּשׁ);  son of Rehoboam and Mahalath; a brother of Shemariah, Zaham;  half-brother of: Abijah, Attai, Ziza and Shelomith.
H3266.f: Son of King Rehoboam and Mahalath
H3266.meaning: Hitchcock: Jeuz, he that is devoured
H3266.significance: Minor figure; name: from H5789 (עוּשׁ); hasty Jeush, the name of an Edomite and of four Israelites

H3263.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3263.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.10; only referred to as Jeuz (יְעוּץ);  son of Shaharaim and Hodesh; a brother of Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malcam, Sachia, Mirmah, Abitub and Elpaal.
H3263.f: A descendant of Shaharaim from the tribe of Benjamin
H3263.meaning: from H5779 (עוּץ); counsellor Jeuts, an Israelite
H3263.significance: Minor figure; name: from H5779 (עוּץ); counsellor Jeuts, an Israelite

H3153.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3153.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.25.23; referred to as Jezaniah (יְזַנְיָה), or Jezaniah or Jaazaniah (יַאֲזַנְיָ֫הוּ), or Azariah (עֲזַרְיָה); a son of Hoshaiah.
H3153.meaning: Hitchcock: nourishment, or weapons, of the Lord
H3153.significance: man living at the time of divided monarchy. Name (or יְזַנְיָהוּ; probably for H2970 (יַאֲזַנְיָה) Jezanjah, an Israelit...). Name in lineage or family context.

H0348.d: Queen living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H0348.s: A queen of the Kingdom of Israel, living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ki.16.31; referred to as Jezebel (אִיזֶבֶל), or Jezebel (Ἰεζαβήλ); a daughter of Ethbaal; wife of Ahab;  mother of Athaliah, Joash, Ahaziah and Joram.
H0348.f: Queen of Israel; wife of King Ahab
H0348.meaning: Hitchcock: chaste. BehindTheName: From Hebrew אִיזֶבֶל (ʾIzevel), meaning uncertain, possibly 'where is the prince?'.
H0348.significance: Daughter of Ethbaal. Name meaning: from H336 (אִי)lemma אי missing vowel, corrected to אִי and H2083 (זְב...

H3337.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3337.s: A man from the tribe of Naphtali living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.24; referred to as Jezer (יֵ֫צֶר), or Jezerite (יִצְרִי);  son of Naphtali; a brother of Jahzeel, Guni and Shillem.
H3337.f: Son of Naphtali, founder of the Jezerite clan
H3337.significance: Son of Naphtali. Name (the same as H3336 (יֵצֶר) Jetser, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H3149.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3149.s: A warrior living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.12.3; only referred to as Jeziel (יְזִיאֵל);  son of Azmaveth; a brother of Pelet.
H3149.f: A Benjamite warrior who joined David at Ziklag
H3149.meaning: from an unused root (meaning to sprinkle) and H410 (אֵל); sprinkled of God Jezavel, an Israelite
H3149.significance: Minor figure; name: from an unused root (meaning to sprinkle) and H410 (אֵל); sprinkled of God Jezavel, an Israelite

H3157.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3157.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.3; only referred to as Jezreel (יִזְרְעֶאל);  son of Hur; a brother of Uri, Shobal, Salma, Hareph, Ishma, Idbash, Hazzelelponi, Penuel and Ezer.
H3157.f: A son of Hur in the genealogy of Judah
H3157.meaning: from H2232 (זָרַע) and H410 (אֵל); God will sow Jizreel, the name of two places in Palestine and...
H3157.significance: Minor figure; name: from H2232 (זָרַע) and H410 (אֵל); God will sow Jizreel, the name of two places in Palestine and...

H3044.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H3044.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.22.22; only referred to as Jidlaph (יִדְלָ֑ף);  son of Nahor and Milcah; a brother of Uz, Buz, Kemuel, Chesed, Hazo, Pildash and Bethuel;  half-brother of: Tebah, Gaham, Tahash and Maacah.
H3044.significance: Minor figure; name: from H1811 (דָּלַף); tearful Jidlaph, a Mesopotamian

H3097.d: David's compatriot living at the time of United Monarchy
H3097.s: A warrior living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.26.6; only referred to as Joab (יוֹאָב); his mother was Zeruiah; a brother of Abishai and Asahel.
H3097.f: Son of Zeruiah, commander of David's army
H3097.meaning: Hitchcock: paternity; voluntary. BehindTheName: From Hebrew יוֹאָב meaning 'Yahweh is father'.
H3097.significance: David's compatriot. Name meaning: from H3068 (יְהֹוָה) and H1 (אָב); Jehovah-fathered Joab, the name of ...

H3098.d: Levite living at the time of United Monarchy
H3098.s: A man from the tribe of Levi living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.26.4; only referred to as Joah (יוֹאָח);  son of Obed-edom; a brother of Shemaiah, Jehozabad, Sachar, Nethanel, Ammiel, Issachar and Peullethai.
H3098.f: A son of Obed-edom, a gatekeeper of the temple
H3098.meaning: Hitchcock: fraternity; brother of the Lord
H3098.significance: Minor figure; name: from H3068 (יְהֹוָה) and H251 (אָח); Jehovahbrothered Joach, the name of four Israelites

H3099.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3099.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.34.8; only referred to as Joahaz (יוֹאָחָז);  father of Joah.
H3099.f: Father of Joah, King Josiah's secretary
H3099.significance: Father of Joah. Name (a form of H3059 (יְהוֹאָחָז) Joachaz, the name of two Israelites). Name in lineage or family context.

G2490.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
G2490.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Luk.3.27; only referred to as Joanan (Ἰωαννᾶς); a son of Rhesa;  father of Joda.
G2490.meaning: a form of G2491 (Ἰωάννης) Joannas, an Israelite
G2490.significance: Son of Rhesa. Name (a form of G2491 (Ἰωάννης) Joannas, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

G2489.d: Woman living at the time of the New Testament
G2489.s: A woman living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Luk.8.3; only referred to as Joanna (Ἰωάννα, Ἰωανάν); wife of Chuza.
G2489.f: A follower of Jesus who supported His ministry
G2489.meaning: Greek Ἰωάννα (Ioanna); from Hebrew יוֹחָנָן (Yochanan). Joanna = Yah is gracious. Wife of Chuza (Luke 8:3). Hitchcock: grace or gift of the Lord
G2489.significance: Among the women who supported Jesus and the Twelve (Luke 8:3); at the empty tomb (Luke 24:10). Name (gracious) as the one who received and proclaimed grace.

H3101.d: King living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3101.s: A king of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.11.2; referred to as Joash (יוֹאָשׁ), or Jehoash (NIV= Joash)  (יְהוֹאָשׁ); a son of Ahaziah and Zibiah; husband of Jehoaddan;  father of Amaziah.
H3101.f: King of Judah, son of Ahaziah
H3101.significance: King of Judah. Name (or יֹאָשׁ; (2 Chronicles 24:1), a form of H3060 (יְהוֹאָשׁ) Joash, the...). Name in royal or ruling context.

H3135.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3135.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.8; only referred to as Joash (יוֹעָשׁ);  son of Becher; a brother of Zemirah, Eliezer, Elioenai, Omri, Jeremoth, Abijah, Anathoth and Alemeth.
H3135.f: A descendant of Benjamin through Becher
H3135.significance: Minor figure; name: from H3068 (יְהֹוָה) and H5789 (עוּשׁ); Jehovahhastened Joash, the name of two Israelites

H0347.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H0347.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Job.1.1; referred to as Job (אִיּוֹב), or Job (Ἰώβ);  father of Jemimah, Keziah, Keren-happuch.
H0347.f: A righteous man who endured great suffering
H0347.meaning: Hitchcock: he that weeps or cries. BehindTheName: From Hebrew אִיּוֹב (ʾIyyov) possibly meaning 'persecuted' or 'hated'.
H0347.significance: Father of Jemimah. Name (from H340 (אָיַב); hated (i.e. persecuted) Ijob, the patriarch famous ...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3103.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3103.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.18; only referred to as Jobab (יוֹבָב);  son of Elpaal; a brother of Eber, Misham, Shemed, Beriah, Shema, Zebadiah, Meshullam, Hizki, Heber, Ishmerai and Izliah.
H3103.f: A son of Elpaal, descendant of Benjamin
H3103.significance: Minor figure; name: from H2980 (יָבַב); howler Jobab, the name of two Israelites and of three foreigners

H3115.d: Woman living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3115.s: A woman from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Exo.6.20; only referred to as Jochebed (יוֹכֶ֫בֶד);  daughter of Levi; a sister of Gershon, Kohath and Merari; wife of Amram;  mother of Moses, Aaron and Miriam.
H3115.f: Mother of Moses, Aaron, and Miriam
H3115.significance: Sister of Gershon. Name meaning: from H3068 (יְהֹוָה) contracted and H3513 (כָּבַד); Jehovah-gloried Jo...

G6043.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
G6043.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Luk.3.26; only referred to as Joda (Ἰωδά); a son of Joanan;  father of Josech.
G6043.significance: Son of Joanan. Name (name). Name in lineage or family context.

H3133.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H3133.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.11.7; only referred to as Joed (יוֹעֵד); a son of Pedaiah;  father of Meshullam.
H3133.f: A Benjaminite who resettled in Jerusalem
H3133.significance: Son of Pedaiah. Name (apparently the active participle of H3259 (יָעַד); appointer Joed, an ...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3100.d: Levite living at the time of United Monarchy
H3100.s: A Judge from the tribe of Levi living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.8.2; referred to as Joel (יוֹאֵל), or "second" (KJV= Vashni)  (וַשְׁנִי);  son of Samuel; a brother of Abijah;  father of Heman.
H3100.f: Samuel's firstborn son who judged Israel
H3100.meaning: Hitchcock: he that wills or commands. BehindTheName: From Hebrew יוֹאֵל meaning 'Yahweh is God'.
H3100.significance: A Judge. Name (from H3068 (יְהֹוָה) and H410 (אֵל); Jehovah (is his) God Joel, the na...). Name in judicial or deliverer context.

H3132.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3132.s: A warrior living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.12.7; only referred to as Joelah (יוֹעֵאלָה);  son of Jeroham; a brother of Zebadiah.
H3132.f: A Benjaminite warrior who joined David at Ziklag
H3132.meaning: Hitchcock: lifting up; profiting; taking away slander
H3132.significance: Minor figure; name: perhaps feminine active participle of H3276 (יַעַל); furthermore Joelah, an Israelite

H3134.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3134.s: A warrior living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.12.6; only referred to as Joezer (יוֹעֶ֫זֶר).
H3134.f: A Benjaminite warrior who joined David at Ziklag
H3134.significance: Minor figure; name: from H3068 (יְהֹוָה) and H5828 (עֵזֶר); Jehovah (is his) help Joezer, an Israelite

H3020.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3020.s: A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.34.22; only referred to as Jogli (יׇגְלִי);  father of Bukki.
H3020.f: A leader from the tribe of Dan
H3020.meaning: Hitchcock: passing over; turning back; rejoicing
H3020.significance: Father of Bukki. Name (from H1540 (גָּלָה); exiled Jogli, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H3109.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3109.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin  living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.16; only referred to as Joha (יוֹחָא);  son of Beriah; a brother of Arad, Ahio, Shashak, Jeremoth, Zebadiah, Eder, Michael and Ishpah.
H3109.meaning: Hitchcock: who enlivens or gives life
H3109.significance: Minor figure; name: probably from H3068 (יְהֹוָה) and a variation of H2421 (חָיָה); Jehovah-revived Jocha, the name...

H3110.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3110.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.3.24; only referred to as Johanan (יוֹחָנָן);  son of Elioenai; a brother of Hodaviah, Eliashib, Pelaiah, Akkub, Delaiah and Anani.
H3110.f: A descendant of David through the line of Jehoiachin
H3110.meaning: Hitchcock: who is liberal or merciful
H3110.significance: Minor figure; name: a form of H3076 (יְהוֹחָנָן) Jochanan, the name of nine Israelites

G2491.d: Prophet living at the time of the New Testament
G2491.s: A prophet living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.3.1; only referred to as John (Ἰωάννης); a son of Zechariah and Elizabeth.
G2491.f: The Baptist, a prophet who prepared the way for Jesus
G2491.meaning: Greek Ἰωάννης (Ioannes); from Hebrew יוֹחָנָן (Yochanan), Yah is gracious. John = Yah is gracious. Hitchcock: the grace or mercy of the Lord. BehindTheName: From Hebrew יוֹחָנָן (Yoḥanan) meaning 'Yahweh is gracious'.
G2491.significance: Baptist and apostle; forerunner who points to the Lamb (John 1:29). “He must increase, I must decrease.” Name (gracious) fits the one who announces grace.

H3111.d: Priest living at the time of Exile and Return
H3111.s: A priest from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.13.28; only referred to as son of Joiada;  unnamed son of: Joiada; a brother of Johanan; husband of daughter of Sanballat.
H3111.f: Grandson of Eliashib, married Sanballat's daughter
H3111.meaning: a form of H3077 (יְהוֹיָדָע) Jojada, the name of two Israelites
H3111.significance: Minor figure; name: a form of H3077 (יְהוֹיָדָע) Jojada, the name of two Israelites

H3113.d: Priest living at the time of Exile and Return
H3113.s: A High Priest from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Neh.12.10; only referred to as Joiakim (יוֹיָקִים); a son of Joshua;  father of Eliashib.
H3113.f: A high priest, son of Jeshua
H3113.meaning: a form of H3079 (יְהוֹיָקִים) Jojakim, an Israelite
H3113.significance: High Priest. Name (a form of H3079 (יְהוֹיָקִים) Jojakim, an Israelite). Name fits cultic or priestly role.

H3114.d: Levite living at the time of Exile and Return
H3114.s: A priest from the tribe of Levi  living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at 1Ch.9.10; referred to as Joiarib (יוֹיָרִיב), or Jehoiarib (יְהוֹיָרִיב);  father of Jedaiah.
H3114.f: A priestly family that returned from Babylonian exile
H3114.meaning: Hitchcock: chiding, or multiplying, of the Lord
H3114.significance: Returned priest. Name (a form of H3080 (יְהוֹיָרִיב) Jojarib, the name of four Israelites). Name fits cultic or priestly role.

H3137.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H3137.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.22; only referred to as Jokim (יוֹקִים);  son of Shelah; a brother of Er, Laadah, Joash and Saraph.
H3137.f: A descendant of Judah through Shelah
H3137.meaning: Hitchcock: that made the sun stand still
H3137.significance: Minor figure; name: a form of H3113 (יוֹיָקִים) Jokim, an Israelite

H3370.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H3370.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.25.2; only referred to as Jokshan (יׇקְשָׁן);  son of Abraham and Keturah; a brother of Zimran, Medan, Midian, Ishbak and Shuah;  father of Sheba and Dedan;  half-brother of: Ishmael and Isaac.
H3370.f: A son of Abraham and Keturah
H3370.meaning: Hitchcock: an offense; hardness; a knocking
H3370.significance: Son of Abraham. Name (from H3369 (יָקֹשׁ); insidious Jokshan, an Arabian patriarch). Name in lineage or family context.

H3355.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H3355.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.25; only referred to as Joktan (יׇקְטָן);  son of Eber; a brother of Peleg;  father of Almodad, Sheleph, Hazarmaveth, Jerah, Hadoram, Uzal, Diklah, Obal, Abimael, Sheba, Ophir, Havilah and Jobab.
H3355.f: Son of Eber and ancestor of Arabian tribes
H3355.significance: Son of Eber. Name (from H6994 (קָטֹן); he will be made little Joktan, an Arabian patriarc...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3082.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3082.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.10.15; referred to as Jonadab or Jehonadab (יְהוֹנָדָב), or Jonadab (יוֹנָדָב); a son of Rechab.
H3082.significance: Son of Rechab. Name (from H3068 (יְהֹוָה) and H5068 (נָדַב); Jehovah-largessed Jehonadab, t...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3122.d: David's nephew living at the time of United Monarchy
H3122.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.13.3; referred to as Jonadab (יוֹנָדָב), or Jonadab (יְהוֹנָדָב), or Jonathan (יְהוֹנָתָן); a son of Shimeah.
H3122.significance: David's nephew. Name (a form of H3082 (יְהוֹנָדָב) Jonadab, the name of an Israelite and of ...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3124.d: Prophet living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3124.s: A prophet living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.14.25; referred to as Jonah (יוֹנָה), or Jonah (KJV= Jonas)  (Ἰωνᾶς); a son of Amittai.
H3124.f: Prophet swallowed by fish, preached to Nineveh
H3124.meaning: From יוֹנָה (yonah), dove. Jonah = dove. Prophet (Jon 1:1). Hitchcock: or Jonas, a dove; he that oppresses; destroyer. BehindTheName: From Hebrew יוֹנָה (Yona) meaning 'dove'.
H3124.significance: Sent to Nineveh; fled, swallowed, delivered (Jon 1–2). Name (dove) as the one who bore the word—and was cast out and restored. Type of death and resurrection (Matt 12:40).

G2494.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
G2494.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Luk.3.30; only referred to as Jonam (Ἰωνάν); a son of Eliakim;  father of Joseph.
G2494.meaning: probably for G2491 (Ἰωάννης) or G2495 (Ἰωνᾶς) Jonan, an Israelite
G2494.significance: Son of Eliakim. Name (probably for G2491 (Ἰωάννης) or G2495 (Ἰωνᾶς) Jonan, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H3129.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H3129.s: A musician living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.12.35; only referred to as Jonathan (יוֹנָתָן); a son of Shemaiah;  father of Zechariah, Shemaiah, Azarel, Milalai, Gilalai, Maai, Nethanel, Judah, Hanani.
H3129.f: Priest who participated in dedication of Jerusalem's wall
H3129.meaning: Hitchcock: given of God. BehindTheName: From Hebrew יוֹנָתָן (Yonatan) meaning 'Yahweh has given'.
H3129.significance: Returned priest. Name (a form of H3083 (יְהוֹנָתָן) Jonathan, the name of ten Israelites). Name fits cultic or priestly role.

H3139.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H3139.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.18; referred to as Jorah (יוֹרָה), or Hariph (חָרִיף).
H3139.f: Ancestor of exiles who returned to Jerusalem
H3139.meaning: Hitchcock: Jorai, showing; casting forth; a cauldron
H3139.significance: Returned from exile. Name meaning: from H3384 (יָרָה); rainy Jorah, an Israelite

H3140.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3140.s: A man from the tribe of Gad  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.5.13; only referred to as Jorai (יוֹרַי);  son of Abihail; a brother of Michael, Meshullam, Sheba, Jacan, Zia and Eber.
H3140.f: A chief of the half-tribe of Manasseh
H3140.meaning: from H3384 (יָרָה); rainy Jorai, an Israelite
H3140.significance: Minor figure; name: from H3384 (יָרָה); rainy Jorai, an Israelite

H3141.d: King living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3141.s: A king of Northern Israel, living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.1.17; referred to as Joram (יוֹרָם), or Joram or Jehoram (יְהוֹרָם);  son of Ahab and Jezebel; a brother of Joash, Ahaziah and Athaliah.
H3141.significance: King of N. Israel. Name (a form of H3088 (יְהוֹרָם) Joram, the name of three Israelites and one...). Name in royal or ruling context.

G2497.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
G2497.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Luk.3.29; only referred to as Jorim (Ἰωρείμ); a son of Matthat;  father of Eliezer.
G2497.meaning: Hitchcock: he that exalts the Lord
G2497.significance: Son of Matthat. Name (perhaps for G2496 (Ἰωράμ) Jorim, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H3421.d: Man or town at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3421.s: A man or town of the tribe of Judah at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.44; only referred to as Jorkeam (יׇרְקְעָ֑ם); a son of Raham.
H3421.f: A son or town founded by Raham
H3421.meaning: from H7324 (רוּק) and H5971 (עַם); people will be poured forth Jorkeam, a place in Palestine
H3421.significance: Minor figure; name: from H7324 (רוּק) and H5971 (עַם); people will be poured forth Jorkeam, a place in Palestine

G6044.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
G6044.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Luk.3.26; referred to as Josech (Ἰωσήφ), or Josech (NIV= Josek, KJV= Joseph) (Ἰωσήχ); a son of Joda;  father of Semein.
G6044.significance: Son of Joda. Name (name). Name in lineage or family context.

H3130.d: Jacob's son living at the time of the Patriarchs
H3130.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.30.24; referred to as Joseph (KJV= Joseph)  (יוֹסֵף), or Joseph (יְהוֹסֵף), or Zaphenath-paneah (צָֽפְנַת פַּעְנֵחַ), or Joseph (KJV= Joseph)  (Ἰωσήφ);  son of Israel and Rachel; a brother of Benjamin;  half-brother of: Reuben, Simeon, Levi, Judah, Dan, Naphtali, Gad, Asher, Issachar, Zebulun and Dinah; husband of Asenath;  father
H3130.meaning: From יָסַף (yasaf), add, increase. Joseph = may he add. Son of Jacob; sold into Egypt (Gen 37:28). Hitchcock: increase; addition. BehindTheName: From Hebrew יוֹסֵף (Yosef) meaning 'he will add', from יָסַף (yasaf) 'to add'.
H3130.significance: Type of Christ in suffering and exaltation (Gen 37–50). Rejected by brothers, exalted to the right hand of Pharaoh; saves the nations. “God has made me forget” (Gen 41:51)—sorrow turned to fruitfulness.

G2501.d: Mary's husband living at the time of the New Testament
G2501.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Mat.1.16; referred to as Joseph or "father" (KJV= Joseph) or "parents" (KJV= Joseph) (Ἰωσήφ);  son of Jacob; a brother of: Alphaeus (?); husband of Mary;  father of Jesus, James, Joses, Simon and Jude.
G2501.meaning: Greek Ἰωσήφ (Ioseph); from Hebrew Joseph. Joseph = may he add. Hitchcock: increase; addition. BehindTheName: From Hebrew יוֹסֵף (Yosef) meaning 'he will add', from יָסַף (yasaf) 'to add'.
G2501.significance: Husband of Mary; earthly father of Jesus (Matt 1:16). Righteous man; obeyed the angel (Matt 2:13–14). Name (add) as the one who did not subtract from the law but fulfilled it.

G2500.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G2500.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.27.56; referred to as Joses (Ἰωσῆς), or Joseph (KJV= Joses) (Ἰωσήφ); a son of  Mary and probably Alphaeus ; brother of James and possibly Matthew.
G2500.f: Brother of James "the Less" and son of the "other" Mary
G2500.significance: Son of the "other" Mary. Name (perhaps for G2501 (Ἰωσήφ) Joses, the name of two Israelites). Name in lineage or family context.

H3144.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3144.s: A man from the tribe of Simeon(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.34; only referred to as Joshah (יוֹשָׁה); a son of Amaziah.
H3144.f: A Simeonite leader during Hezekiah's reign
H3144.significance: Minor figure; name: probably a form of H3145 (יוֹשַׁוְיָה) Joshah, an Israelite

H3146.d: Warrior living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3146.s: A warrior living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.11.43; only referred to as Joshaphat (יוֹשָׁפָט).
H3146.f: One of David's mighty warriors from Mithan
H3146.meaning: a form of H3092 (יְהוֹשָׁפָט) Joshaphat, an Israelite
H3146.significance: Minor figure; name: a form of H3092 (יְהוֹשָׁפָט) Joshaphat, an Israelite

H3145.d: Warrior living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3145.s: A warrior living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.11.46; only referred to as Joshaviah (יוֹשַׁוְיָה);  son of Elnaam; a brother of Jeribai.
H3145.f: One of David's mighty warriors from Eliahba's sons
H3145.meaning: Hitchcock: the seat, alteration, or captivity of the Lord
H3145.significance: Minor figure; name: from H3068 (יְהֹוָה) and H7737 (שָׁוָה); Jehovah-set Joshavjah, an Israelite

H3436.d: Levite living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3436.s: A musician from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.25.4; only referred to as Joshbekashah (יׇשְׁבְּקָ֫שָׁה);  son of Heman; a brother of Bukkiah, Mattaniah, Uzziel, Shebuel, Jerimoth, Hananiah, Hanani, Eliathah, Giddalti, Romamti-ezer, Mallothi, Hothir, Mahazioth.
H3436.f: A son of Heman, a musician in David's time
H3436.meaning: from H3427 (יָשַׁב) and H7186 (קָשֶׁה); a hard seat Joshbekashah, an Israelite
H3436.significance: Son of Heman. Name (from H3427 (יָשַׁב) and H7186 (קָשֶׁה); a hard seat Joshbekashah, an I...). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H3143.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H3143.s: A man from the tribe of Simeon(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.35; only referred to as Joshibiah (יוֹשִׁבְיָה); a son of Seraiah;  father of Jehu.
H3143.f: A Simeonite leader during Hezekiah's reign
H3143.meaning: from H3427 (יָשַׁב) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jehovah will cause to dwell Josibjah, an Israelite
H3143.significance: Son of Seraiah. Name (from H3427 (יָשַׁב) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jehovah will cause to dwell Josi...). Name in lineage or family context.

H3091.d: Judge living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness and Conquest
H3091.s: A Judge from the tribe of Ephraim living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness and Conquest, first mentioned at Exo.17.9; referred to as Joshua (KJV= Jehoshua) (יְהוֹשׁוּעַ), or Hoshea (KJV= Oshea) or Joshua (KJV= Jehoshua) (הוֹשֵׁעַ), or Jeshua (NIV= Joshua) (יֵשׁוּעַ), or Joshua (KJV= Jesus) (Ἰησοῦς); a son of Nun.
H3091.meaning: From יְהוֹשֻׁעַ (Yehoshua); יָהּ (Yah) + יָשַׁע (yasha), save. Joshua = YHWH saves. Successor of Moses (Num 27:18). Hitchcock: a savior; a deliverer. BehindTheName: From Hebrew יְהוֹשֻׁעַ (Yehoshuaʿ) meaning 'Yahweh is salvation'.
H3091.significance: Leads Israel into the land; type of Christ as captain of salvation (Heb 2:10). Same name as Jesus (Greek form). The Lord saves—in conquest and in gospel.

H2977.d: King living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2977.s: A king of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ki.13.2; referred to as Josiah (יֹאשִׁיָּ֫הוּ), or Josiah (KJV= Josias)  (Ἰωσίας); a son of Amon and Jedidah; husband of Hamutal and Zebidah;  father of Jehoahaz, Jehoiakim, Zedekiah and Shallum.
H2977.f: King of Judah known for his religious reforms
H2977.meaning: Hitchcock: the Lord burns; the fire of the Lord. BehindTheName: From Hebrew יֹאשִׁיָּהוּ meaning 'Yahweh supports'.
H2977.significance: King of Judah. Name (or יֹאשִׁיָּהוּ; from the same root as H803 (אֲשׁוּיָה) and H3050 (יָה...). Name in royal or ruling context.

H3131.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return

H3812.meaning: From לָאָה (laah), weary. Leah = weary. Wife of Jacob (Gen 29:16). Hitchcock: weary; tired. BehindTheName: From Hebrew לֵאָה (Leʾa) possibly meaning 'weary'.
H3812.significance: Unloved yet mother of six tribes (Gen 29:31); “Yah has seen my affliction” (Gen 29:32). Name (weary) as the one who bore the burden—and bore Judah, the line of the King.

H3838.significance: man living at the time of exile and return. Name meaning: or לְבָנָה; the same as H3842 (לְבָנָה) Lebana or Lebanah, one of the ...

H3922.d: Man or town at the time of Divided Monarchy

H3853.significance: Early nation. Name meaning: plural of H3851 (לַהַב); flames Lehabim, a son of Mizraim, and his des...

H3927.significance: A king. Name (or לְמוֹאֵל; from H3926 (לְמוֹ) and H410 (אֵל); (belonging) to God Lem...). Name in royal or ruling context.

H3912.s: People from Letush(?) of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.25.3; only referred to as Letushim (לְטוּשִׁם); descended from Dedan along with Asshurim and Leummim.

H3912.significance: Minor figure; name: masculine plural of passive participle of H3913 (לָטַשׁ); hammered (i.e. oppressed) ones...

H3817.significance: Minor figure; name: plural of H3816 (לְאֹם); communities Leum mim, an Arabian

H3878.d: Jacob's son living at the time of the Patriarchs
H3878.s: A man who founded the tribe of Levi  living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.29.34; referred to as Levi or Levite (לֵוִי), or Levite (Aramiac לֵוָי), or Levi or Levite or Levitical (לֵוִי), or Levi (Λευΐ), or Levite (Λευΐτης), or Levitical (Λευϊτικός);  son of Israel and Leah; a brother of Reuben, Simeon, Judah, Issachar, Zebulun and Dinah;  half-brother of: Dan, Naphtali, Gad
H3878.meaning: From לָוָה (lavah), join, attach. Levi = joined. Third son of Jacob (Gen 29:34). Hitchcock: associated with him. BehindTheName: From Hebrew לֵוִי (Levi) possibly meaning 'joined, attached'.
H3878.significance: Tribe of the priesthood; “now my husband will be joined to me” (Gen 29:34). Scattered in Israel (Gen 49:7); yet the Levites are joined to the Lord (Num 18:2).

G3017.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return

G3017.f: Son of Melchi, an ancestor of Jesus
G3017.meaning: Hitchcock: associated with him. BehindTheName: From Hebrew לֵוִי (Levi) possibly meaning 'joined, attached'.
G3017.significance: Son of Melchi. Name (of Hebrew origin (H03878) Levi, the name of three Israelites). Name in lineage or family context.

H3845.d: Levite living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness

H3845.significance: Son of Gershon. Name (from H3835 (לָבַן); white Libni, an Israelite). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H3949.meaning: from H3947 (לָקַח); learned Likchi, an Israelite
H3949.significance: Minor figure; name: from H3947 (לָקַח); learned Likchi, an Israelite

G3044.significance: Minor figure; name: perhaps from G3043 (λίνον) Linus, a Christian

H3818.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy

H3818.significance: Minor figure; name: from H3808 (לֹא) and H5971 (עַם) with pronominal suffix; not my people Lo-Ammi, the symbolic...

G3090.significance: Faith that dwelt in Lois and Eunice (2 Tim 1:5). Name in the line of faith—grandmother to Timothy, servant of the gospel.

H3819.significance: Sister of Jezreel. Name meaning: from H3808 (לֹא) and H7355 (רָחַם); not pitied Lo-Ruchamah, the symbol...

H3877.d: Edomite living at the time of the Patriarchs

H3877.significance: Son of Seir. Name (from H3875 (לוֹט); covering Lotan, an Idumaean). Name in lineage or family context.

H3865.significance: man living at the time of the patriarchs. Name (probably of foreign derivation Lud, the name of two nations). Name in lineage or family context.

H3866.s: People from Lud, first mentioned at Gen.10.13; only referred to as Ludim (לוּדִי); descended from Egypt along with Anamim, Lehabim, Naphtuhim, Pathrusim, Casluhim and Caphtorim.
H3866.f: Son of Mizraim; progenitor of a people group
H3866.meaning: or לוּדִיִּי; patrial from H3865 (לוּד) a Ludite or inhabitants of Lud (only in plural)
H3866.significance: Early nation. Name meaning: or לוּדִיִּי; patrial from H3865 (לוּד) a Ludite or inhabitants of Lud...

G3065.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament

G3065.meaning: Greek Λουκᾶς (Loukas); from Latin Lucius. Luke = light. Physician; companion of Paul (Col 4:14). Hitchcock: luminous; white. BehindTheName: From Greek Λουκᾶς (Loukas), from Latin Lucius 'light'.
G3065.significance: Author of Luke and Acts; historian of the gospel and the church. “Orderly account” (Luke 1:3); name (light) as the one who brings the light of the narrative.

G3070.significance: First European convert (Acts 16:14); “Lord opened her heart.” Hostess at Philippi. Name (from Lydia) as the one through whom the gospel entered Europe.

H4641.meaning: Hitchcock: the work of the Lord
H4641.significance: Minor figure; name: or מַעֲשֵׂיָהוּ; from H4639 (מַעֲשֶׂה) and H3050 (יָהּ); work of Jah Maasejah, the name of...

H4590.meaning: or מַעַזְיָהוּ; probably from H5756 (עוּז) (in the sense of protection) and H3050 (יָהּ); rescue...
H4590.significance: Returned priest. Name (or מַעַזְיָהוּ; probably from H5756 (עוּז) (in the sense of protection...). Name fits cultic or priestly role.

H4344.significance: Minor figure; name: patrial from H4343 (מַכְבֵּנָא) a Macbannite or native of Macbena

H4352.significance: Father of Geuel. Name (probably from H4134 (מוּךְ); pining Maki, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H4367.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return

H4367.significance: Minor figure; name: from H4100 (מָה) and H5068 (נָדַב) with a particle interposed; what (is) like (a) liberal (man)...

H4089.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy

H4025.d: Edomite living at the time of the Patriarchs
H4025.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.43; only referred to as Magdiel (מַגְדִּיאֵל).

H4025.significance: From Edom. Name meaning: from H4022 (מֶגֶד) and H410 (אֵל); preciousness of God Magdiel, an Idu...

H4031.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs

H4031.significance: Son of Japheth. Name (from H1463 (גּוֹג) Magog, a son of Japheth; also a barbarous northern ...). Name in lineage or family context.

H4047.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return

H4047.f: One who sealed the covenant during Nehemiah's time

H4047.significance: Minor figure; name: apparently from H1479 (גּוּף) or H5062 (נָגַף) and H6211 (עָשׁ); exterminator of (the) moth...

H4111.d: Man living at the time before the Flood
H4111.s: A man living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.5.12; referred to as Mahalalel (מַהֲלַלְאֵל), or Mahalaleel (NIV= Mahalel)  (Μαλελεήλ); a son of Kenan;  father of Jared.
H4111.f: Descendant of Seth; ancestor of Noah
H4111.meaning: from H4110 (מַהֲלָל) and H410 (אֵל); praise of God Mahalalel, the name of an antediluvian...
H4111.significance: Son of Kenan. Name (from H4110 (מַהֲלָל) and H410 (אֵל); praise of God Mahalalel, the name...). Name in lineage or family context.

H4258.d: Woman living at the time of the Patriarchs
H4258.s: A woman of the Arabs living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.28.9; referred to as Mahalath (מַחֲלַת), or Basemath (KJV= Bashemath)  (בָּֽשְׂמַת);  daughter of Ishmael; a sister of Nebaioth, Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam, Mishma, Dumah, Massa, Hadad, Tema, Jetur, Naphish and Kedemah; wife of Esau;  mother of Reuel.
H4258.meaning: the same as H4257 (מַחֲלַת); sickness Machalath, the name of an Ishmaelitess and of an Israelitess
H4258.significance: Esau's wife. Name meaning: the same as H4257 (מַחֲלַת); sickness Machalath, the name of an Ishmae...

H4121.d: Warrior living at the time of United Monarchy
H4121.s: A warrior living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.23.28; only referred to as Maharai (מַהֲרַי).
H4121.f: One of David's mighty warriors from Netophah
H4121.meaning: Hitchcock: hasting; a hill; from a hill
H4121.significance: David's warrior. Name (from H4116 (מָהַר); hasty Maharai, an Israelite). Name fits martial or military role.

H4287.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H4287.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.29.12; only referred to as Mahath (מַ֫חַת); a son of Amasai.
H4287.f: Levite who helped purify the temple under Hezekiah
H4287.significance: Minor figure; name: probably from H4229 (מָחָה); erasure Machath, the name of two Israelites

H4233.s: A group of warriors from Mahav(?), only mentioned at 1Ch.11.46; only referred to as Mahavites (מַחֲוִים).
H4233.f: Some of David's mighty men, possibly from Mahavim.
H4233.significance: Minor figure; name: apparently a patrial, but from an unknown place (in the plural only for a singular) a Machavite...

H4238.d: Levite living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H4238.s: A musician from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.25.4; only referred to as Mahazioth (מַחֲזִיאֹת);  son of Heman; a brother of Bukkiah, Mattaniah, Uzziel, Shebuel, Jerimoth, Hananiah, Hanani, Eliathah, Giddalti, Romamti-ezer, Joshbekashah, Mallothi, Hothir.
