H4238.meaning: Hitchcock: seeing a sign; seeing a letter
H4238.significance: Son of Heman. Name (feminine plural from H2372 (חָזָה); visions Machazioth, an Israelite). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H4122.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H4122.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at Isa.8.1; only referred to as Maher-shalal-hash-baz (מַהֵר שָׁלָל חָשׁ בַּז);  son of Isaiah; a brother of Shear-jashub.
H4122.f: Symbolic name given to Isaiah's son, meaning "swift is booty, speedy is prey."
H4122.meaning: Hitchcock: making speed to the spoil; he hastens to the prey
H4122.significance: Son of Isaiah. Name (from H4118 (מַהֵר) and H7998 (שָׁלָל) and H2363 (חוּשׁ) and H957 (בַּז...). Name in lineage or family context.

H4244.d: Woman living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H4244.s: A woman from the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.26.33; only referred to as Mahlah (מַחְלָה);  daughter of Zelophehad; a sister of Noah, Hoglah, Milcah and Tirzah.
H4244.f: Daughter of Zelophehad, who received an inheritance among her brothers.
H4244.meaning: Hitchcock: Mahli, Mahlon, same as Mahali
H4244.significance: Sister of Noah. Name meaning: from H2470 (חָלָה); sickness Machlah, the name apparently of two Israe...

H4249.d: Levite living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H4249.s: A man from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Exo.6.19; referred to as Mahli (מַחְלִי), or Mahlite (מַחְלִי);  son of Merari; a brother of Mushi and Jaaziah;  father of Libni, Eleazar and Kish.
H4249.f: Son of Merari, grandson of Levi.
H4249.meaning: from H2470 (חָלָה); sick Machli, the name of two Israelites
H4249.significance: Son of Merari. Name (from H2470 (חָלָה); sick Machli, the name of two Israelites). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H4248.s: A man living before Israel's Monarchy, first mentioned at Rut.1.2; only referred to as Mahlon (מַחְלוֹן);  son of Elimelech and Naomi; a brother of Chilion; husband of Ruth.
H4248.f: Husband of Ruth, son of Elimelech and Naomi.
H4248.meaning: from H2470 (חָלָה); sick Machlon, an Israelite
H4248.significance: Son of Elimelech. Name (from H2470 (חָלָה); sick Machlon, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H4235.d: Man living at the time of United Monarchy
H4235.s: A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.4.31; only referred to as Mahol (מָחוֹל);  father of Ethan, Heman, Calcol, Darda.
H4235.f: Father of wise men surpassed in wisdom by Solomon.
H4235.meaning: the same as H4234 (מָחוֹל); dancing Machol, an Israelite
H4235.significance: Father of Ethan. Name (the same as H4234 (מָחוֹל); dancing Machol, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H4271.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H4271.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at Jer.32.12; only referred to as Mahseiah (מַחְסֵיָה);  father of Neriah.
H4271.meaning: from H4268 (מַחֲסֶה) and H3050 (יָהּ); refuge of (i.e. in) Jah Machsejah, an Israelite
H4271.significance: Father of Neriah. Name (from H4268 (מַחֲסֶה) and H3050 (יָהּ); refuge of (i.e. in) Jah Machsej...). Name in lineage or family context.

H4401.d: Prophet living at the time of Exile and Return
H4401.s: A prophet living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Mal.1.1; only referred to as Malachi (מַלְאָכִי).
H4401.f: Prophet who wrote the book bearing his name.
H4401.meaning: From מַלְאָכִי (Malachi), my messenger. Malachi = my messenger. Prophet (Mal 1:1). Hitchcock: my messenger; my angel. BehindTheName: From Hebrew מַלְאָכִי meaning 'my messenger'.
H4401.significance: Last of the Twelve; “behold, I send my messenger” (Mal 3:1). “Elijah” before the great day (Mal 4:5). Name (my messenger) as the one who points to the Messenger of the covenant.

H4445.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H4445.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.9; only referred to as Malcam (מַלְכָּם);  son of Shaharaim and Hodesh; a brother of Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Jeuz, Sachia, Mirmah, Abitub and Elpaal.
H4445.meaning: or מִלְכּוֹם; from H4428 (מֶלֶךְ) for H4432 (מֹלֶךְ) Malcam or Milcom, the national idol of the...
H4445.significance: Minor figure; name: or מִלְכּוֹם; from H4428 (מֶלֶךְ) for H4432 (מֹלֶךְ) Malcam or Milcom, the national idol of the...

H4441.d: Levite living at the time of Exile and Return
H4441.s: A priest from the tribe of Levi  living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at 1Ch.9.12; only referred to as Malchijah (מַלְכִּיָּהוּ); a brother of Jerahmeel;  a son of Hammelech;  father of Pashhur.
H4441.f: Priest during the time of Nehemiah.
H4441.meaning: or מַלְכִּיָּהוּlemma מַלְכִּיָהוּ missing dagesh, corrected to מַלְכִּיָּהוּ; (Jeremiah [38:6),...
H4441.significance: Returned priest. Name (or מַלְכִּיָּהוּlemma מַלְכִּיָהוּ missing dagesh, corrected to מַלְכּ...). Name fits cultic or priestly role.

H4439.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H4439.s: A man from the tribe of Asher living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.17; referred to as Malchiel (מַלְכִּיאֵל), or Malchielite (מַלְכִּיאֵלִי);  son of Beriah; a brother of Heber;  father or founder of Birzaith.
H4439.f: Son of Beriah, grandson of Asher.
H4439.meaning: Hitchcock: God is my king, or counselor
H4439.significance: Son of Beriah. Name (from H4428 (מֶלֶךְ) and H410 (אֵל); king of (i.e. appointed by) God Ma...). Name in lineage or family context.

H4443.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H4443.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.3.18; only referred to as Malchiram (מַלְכִּירָם);  son of Shealtiel(?); a brother of Pedaiah, Shenazzar, Jekamiah, Hoshama and Nedabiah.
H4443.f: Descendant of King Jeconiah (Jehoiachin) of Judah.
H4443.meaning: from H4428 (מֶלֶךְ) and H7311 (רוּם); king of a high one (i.e. of exaltation) Malkiram, an Israelite
H4443.significance: Minor figure; name: from H4428 (מֶלֶךְ) and H7311 (רוּם); king of a high one (i.e. of exaltation) Malkiram, an Israelite

H4444.d: Man living at the time of United Monarchy
H4444.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.14.49; only referred to as Malchi-shua (מַלְכִּישׁוּעַ);  son of Saul and Ahinoam; a brother of Jonathan, Abinadab, Merab and Michal;  half-brother of: Ish-bosheth, Armoni and Mephibosheth.
H4444.f: Son of King Saul, killed in battle against the Philistines.
H4444.meaning: from H4428 (מֶלֶךְ) and H7769 (שׁוּעַ); king of wealth Malkishua, an Israelite
H4444.significance: Son of Saul. Name (from H4428 (מֶלֶךְ) and H7769 (שׁוּעַ); king of wealth Malkishua, an I...). Name in lineage or family context.

G3124.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G3124.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Jhn.18.10; only referred to as Malchus (Μάλχος).
G3124.f: High priest's servant whose ear was cut off by Peter.
G3124.meaning: Greek Μάλχος (Malchos); from Hebrew מֶלֶךְ (melek), king. Malchus = king. Servant of the high priest (John 18:10). Hitchcock: my king, kingdom, or counselor
G3124.significance: Ear cut off by Peter; healed by Jesus (Luke 22:51). Name (king) as the servant of the high priest—and the one who received mercy from the true King.

H4413.d: Levite living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H4413.s: A musician from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.25.4; only referred to as Mallothi (מַלּוֹתִי);  son of Heman; a brother of Bukkiah, Mattaniah, Uzziel, Shebuel, Jerimoth, Hananiah, Hanani, Eliathah, Giddalti, Romamti-ezer, Joshbekashah, Hothir, Mahazioth.
H4413.f: Son of Heman, a musician in David's court.
H4413.significance: Son of Heman. Name (apparently from H4448 (מָלַל); I have talked (i.e. loquacious) Malloth...). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H4409.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H4409.s: A priest living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Neh.10.4; referred to as Malluch (מַלּוּךְ), or Mallichi (=Ketiv. Qere, KJV= Melicu, NIV= Malluk) (מְלִיכוּ).
H4409.f: Priest who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah.
H4409.significance: Returned priest. Name (or מַלּוּכִי; (Nehemiah 12:14), from H4427 (מָלַךְ); remnant Malluk, t...). Name fits cultic or priestly role.

G3127.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G3127.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Act.13.1; only referred to as Manaen (Μαναήν).
G3127.f: Prophet and teacher in the church at Antioch.
G3127.meaning: Greek Μαναήν (Manaen); from Hebrew מְנַחֵם (Menachem), comforter. Manaen = comforter. Foster brother of Herod the tetrarch (Acts 13:1). Hitchcock: a comforter; a leader
G3127.significance: Prophet or teacher in Antioch (Acts 13:1); in the circle that sent Paul and Barnabas. Name (comforter) in the ministry of the word.

H4506.d: Edomite living at the time of the Patriarchs
H4506.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.23; referred to as Manahath (מָנַ֫חַת), or Manahathite (מָנַ֫חַת), or  "half the Manahathites" (חֲצִי הַמְּנַחְתִּי );  son of Shobal; a brother of Alvan, Ebal, Shepho and Onam.
H4506.meaning: from H5117 (נוּחַ); rest Manachath, the name of an Edomite and of a place in Moab
H4506.significance: Son of Shobal. Name (from H5117 (נוּחַ); rest Manachath, the name of an Edomite and of a pl...). Name in lineage or family context.

H4519.d: Joseph's son living at the time of the Patriarchs
H4519.s: A man who founded the tribe of Manasseh  living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.41.51; referred to as Manasseh or Manassite (מְנַשֶּׁה), or Manassite (KJV, NIV= Manasseh) or Manassite (מְנַשִּׁי), or Manasseh (KJV= Manasses) (Μανασσῆς);  son of Joseph and Asenath; a brother of Ephraim; had an Aramitess concubine;  father of Machir and Asriel.
H4519.meaning: Hitchcock: forgetfulness; he that is forgotten. BehindTheName: From Hebrew מְנַשֶּׁה meaning 'causing to forget'.
H4519.significance: joseph's son living at the time of the patriarchs. Name (from H5382 (נָשָׁה); causing to forget Menashsheh, a grandson of Jacob...). Name in lineage or family context.

H4495.d: Samson's father living before Israel's Monarchy
H4495.s: A man living before Israel's Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.13.2; only referred to as Manoah (מָנוֹחַ);  father of Samson.
H4495.f: Father of Samson, from the tribe of Dan.
H4495.significance: Samson's father. Name meaning: the same as H4494 (מָנוֹחַ); rest Manoach, an Israelite

H4582.d: Man living at the time of United Monarchy
H4582.s: A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.27.2; referred to as Maoch (מָעוֹךְ), or Maacah (KJV= Maachah, NIV= Maakah)  (מַעֲכָה);  father of Achish.
H4582.f: Father of Achish, king of Gath.
H4582.meaning: from H4600 (מָעַךְ); oppressed Maok, a Philistine
H4582.significance: King of Gath. Name (from H4600 (מָעַךְ); oppressed Maok, a Philistine). Name in royal or ruling context.

H4584.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H4584.s: A man from the tribe of Judah  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.2.45; only referred to as Maon (מָעוֹן); a son of Shammai; founder of Beth-zur.
H4584.f: Son of Shammai, a descendant of Caleb.
H4584.significance: Son of Shammai. Name (the same as H4583 (מָעוֹן); a residence Maon, the name of an Israelite...). Name in lineage or family context.

H4762.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H4762.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.42; only referred to as Mareshah (מָרֵשָׁה);  son of Mesha;  father and re-founder of Hebron.
H4762.f: Son of Mesha, re-founder of Hebron.
H4762.meaning: Hitchcock: from the beginning; an inheritance
H4762.significance: Minor figure; name: or מַרֵשָׁה; formed like H4761 (מַרְאָשָׁה); summit Mareshah, the name of two Israelites and of...

G3138.d: Levite living at the time of the New Testament
G3138.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.12.12; referred to as Mark (Μάρκος), or John (Ἰωάννης); his mother was Mary.
G3138.f: Cousin of Barnabas, companion of Paul, author of Gospel.
G3138.meaning: Greek Μάρκος (Markos); Latin Marcus. Mark = from Mars, or hammer. John Mark (Acts 12:12). Hitchcock: same as Marcus. BehindTheName: From Latin Marcus, possibly from Mars.
G3138.significance: Companion of Paul and Peter; author of the second Gospel. Deserted (Acts 15:38) but later useful (2 Tim 4:11). Name in the writing of the gospel of the suffering Son.

H4826.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H4826.s: A prince of Persia living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Est.1.14; only referred to as Marsena (מַרְסְנָא).
H4826.f: One of the seven princes of Persia and Media.
H4826.significance: Minor figure; name: of foreign derivation Marsena, a Persian

G3136.d: Woman living at the time of the New Testament
G3136.s: A woman living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Luk.10.38; only referred to as Martha (Μάρθα); a sister of Mary and Lazarus.
G3136.f: Sister of Mary and Lazarus, hosted Jesus.
G3136.meaning: Greek Μάρθα (Martha); Aramaic מַרְתָּא (Marta), lady, mistress. Martha = lady. Hitchcock: who becomes bitter; provoking. BehindTheName: From Aramaic מַרְתָּא (Marta) meaning 'the lady, the mistress'.
G3136.significance: Sister of Mary and Lazarus; “anxious and troubled about many things” (Luke 10:41). Served; confessed “You are the Christ” (John 11:27). Name (lady) as the one who served—and was called to the one thing needful.

H4851.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H4851.s: A man of the Syrians living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.23; referred to as Mash (מַשׁ), or Meshech (מֶ֫שֶׁךְ);  son of Aram; a brother of Uz, Hul and Gether.
H4851.f: Son of Aram, grandson of Shem.
H4851.significance: Grandson of Shem. Name (of foreign derivation Mash, a son of Aram, and the people descended fr...). Name in lineage or family context.

H4854.d: Arabian living at the time of the Patriarchs
H4854.s: A man of the Arabs living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.25.14; only referred to as Massa (מַשָּׂא);  son of Ishmael; a brother of Nebaioth, Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam, Mishma, Dumah, Hadad, Tema, Jetur, Naphish, Kedemah and Mahalath.
H4854.f: Son of Ishmael, grandson of Abraham.
H4854.significance: Son of Ishmael. Name (the same as H4853 (מַשָּׂא); burden Massa, a son of Ishmael). Name in lineage or family context.

H4309.d: Man living at the time of United Monarchy
H4309.s: A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Sa.10.21; only referred to as Matri or a Matrite (מַטְרִי).
H4309.f: Saul's ancestral clan from the tribe of Benjamin.
H4309.significance: Minor figure; name: from H4305 (מָטַר); rainy Matri, an Israelite

H4977.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H4977.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Jer.38.1; only referred to as Mattan (מַתָּן);  father of Shephatiah.
H4977.f: Father of Shephatiah, an opponent of Jeremiah.
H4977.significance: Father of Shephatiah. Name (the same as H4976 (מַתָּן) Mattan, the name of a priest of Baal, and o...). Name in lineage or family context.

H4983.d: Levite living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H4983.s: A musician from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.25.4; only referred to as Mattaniah (מַתַּנְיָ֫הוּ);  son of Heman; a brother of Bukkiah, Uzziel, Shebuel, Jerimoth, Hananiah, Hanani, Eliathah, Giddalti, Romamti-ezer, Joshbekashah, Mallothi, Hothir, Mahazioth.
H4983.f: Son of Heman, a musician in David's court.
H4983.meaning: Hitchcock: gift, or hope, of the Lord
H4983.significance: Son of Heman. Name (or מַתַּנְיָהוּ; from H4976 (מַתָּן) and H3050 (יָהּ); gift of Jah Mat...). Name in Levitical or temple service.

G3160.d: Man living at the time of United Monarchy
G3160.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at Luk.3.31; only referred to as Mattatha (Ματταθά); a son of Nathan;  father of Menna.
G3160.significance: Son of Nathan. Name (probably a shortened form of G3161 (Ματταθίας) (compare G4992 (σωτήριο...). Name in lineage or family context.

G3161.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
G3161.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Luk.3.26; only referred to as Mattathias (Ματταθίας); a son of Semein;  father of Maath.
G3161.meaning: Hitchcock: the gift of the Lord
G3161.significance: Son of Semein. Name (of Hebrew origin (H04993) Mattathias (i.e. Mattithjah), an Israelite a...). Name in lineage or family context.

H4992.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H4992.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.10.33; only referred to as Mattattah (מַתַּתָּה).
H4992.f: Descendant of Hashum, who divorced his foreign wife.
H4992.meaning: for H4993 (מַתִּתְיָה); gift of Jah Mattattah, an Israelite
H4992.significance: Minor figure; name: for H4993 (מַתִּתְיָה); gift of Jah Mattattah, an Israelite

H4982.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H4982.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.10.33; only referred to as Mattenai (מַתְּנַי).
H4982.f: Descendant of Hashum, who divorced his foreign wife.
H4982.meaning: from H4976 (מַתָּן); liberal Mattenai, the name of three Israelites
H4982.significance: Minor figure; name: from H4976 (מַתָּן); liberal Mattenai, the name of three Israelites

G3157.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
G3157.f: Ancestor of Joseph, the husband of Mary.
G3157.significance: Son of Eleazar. Name meaning: of Hebrew origin (H04977) Matthan (i.e. Mattan), an Israelite

G3158.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
G3158.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Luk.3.29; only referred to as Matthat (Ματθάτ, Μαθθάτ); a son of Levi;  father of Jorim.
G3158.meaning: probably a shortened form of G3161 (Ματταθίας) Matthat (i.e. Mattithjah), the name of two Israelites
G3158.significance: Son of Levi. Name (probably a shortened form of G3161 (Ματταθίας) Matthat (i.e. Mattithja...). Name in lineage or family context.

G3156.d: Apostle living at the time of the New Testament
G3156.s: An apostle living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.9.9; referred to as Matthew (Ματθαῖος), or Levi (Λευΐ), or Levi (=Alt tag) (Λευΐ); a son of Alphaeus and possibly Mary; possibly brother of James and Joses.
G3156.meaning: Greek Μαθθαῖος (Matthaios); from Hebrew מַתִּתְיָהוּ (Mattityahu), gift of Yah. Matthew = gift of Yah. Apostle; tax collector (Matt 9:9). BehindTheName: From Greek Ματθαῖος (Matthaios), from Hebrew מַתִּתְיָהוּ (Mattityahu) meaning 'gift of Yahweh'.
G3156.significance: Author of the first Gospel; from tax collector to disciple. Name (gift of Yah) as the one given to record the gift of the King.

G3159.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G3159.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.1.23; only referred to as Matthias (Ματθίας, Μαθθίας).
G3159.f: Apostle chosen to replace Judas Iscariot.
G3159.significance: man living at the time of the new testament. Name meaning: apparently a shortened form of G3161 (Ματταθίας) Matthias (i.e. Mattit...

H4993.d: Singer living at the time of United Monarchy
H4993.s: A musician from the tribe of Levi living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.15.18; only referred to as Mattithiah (מַתִּתְיָ֫הוּ);  son of Jeduthun; a brother of Obed-edom, Gedaliah, Zeri, Jeshaiah, Hashabiah.
H4993.f: Levite musician during the time of David.
H4993.meaning: or מַתִּתְיָהוּ; from H4991 (מַתָּת) and H3050 (יָהּ); gift of Jah Mattithjah, the name of four...
H4993.significance: A Singer. Name (or מַתִּתְיָהוּ; from H4991 (מַתָּת) and H3050 (יָהּ); gift of Jah Mat...). Name in lineage or family context.

H4382.s: A group of warriors from Mecherath(?), only mentioned at 1Ch.11.36; only referred to as Mecherathites (מְכֵרָתִי).
H4382.f: Clan or inhabitants of an unknown place called Mecherah.
H4382.meaning: patrial from an unused name (the same as H4380 (מְכֵרָה)) of a place in Palestine a Mekerathite,...
H4382.significance: Minor figure; name: patrial from an unused name (the same as H4380 (מְכֵרָה)) of a place in Palestine a Mekerathite,...

H4312.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H4312.s: A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.11.26; only referred to as Medad (מֵידָד).
H4312.f: Eldad's companion who prophesied in the Israelite camp.
H4312.meaning: Hitchcock: he that measures; water of love
H4312.significance: man living at the time of egypt and wilderness. Name meaning: from H3032 (יָדַד) in the sense of loving; affectionate Medad, an Isra...

H4091.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
