H7472.meaning: Hitchcock: my shepherd; my companion; my friend
H7472.significance: Minor figure; name: from H7453 (רֵעַ); social Rei, an Israelite

H7425.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H7425.s: A man of the Kingdom of Israel, living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.15.25; only referred to as Remaliah (רְמַלְיָ֜הוּ);  father of Pekah.
H7425.f: Father of Pekah, king of Israel
H7425.meaning: Hitchcock: the exaltation of the Lord
H7425.significance: Father of Pekah. Name (from an unused root and H3050 (יָהּ) (perhaps meaning to deck); Jah ha...). Name in lineage or family context.

H7501.d: Levite living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H7501.s: A man from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.26.7; only referred to as Rephael (רְפָאֵל);  son of Shemaiah; a brother of Othni, Obed, Elzabad, Elihu and Semachiah.
H7501.f: A gatekeeper of the temple during David's reign
H7501.meaning: Hitchcock: the physic or medicine of God
H7501.significance: Minor figure; name: from H7495 (רָפָא) and H410 (אֵל); God has cured Rephael, an Israelite

H7506.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H7506.s: A man from the tribe of Ephraim living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.25; only referred to as Rephah (רֶ֫פַח);  son of Beriah; a brother of Sheerah and Resheph.
H7506.f: Son of Beriah, of the tribe of Asher
H7506.meaning: from an unused root apparently meaning to sustain; support Rephach, an Israelite
H7506.significance: Minor figure; name: from an unused root apparently meaning to sustain; support Rephach, an Israelite

H7509.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H7509.s: A warrior from the tribe of Issachar living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.2; only referred to as Rephaiah (רְפָיָה);  son of Tola; a brother of Uzzi, Jeriel, Jahmai, Ibsam and Shemuel.
H7509.f: Son of Tola, of the tribe of Issachar
H7509.meaning: Hitchcock: medicine or refreshment of the Lord
H7509.significance: Minor figure; name: from H7495 (רָפָא) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah has cured Rephajah, the name of five Israelites

H7566.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H7566.s: A man from the tribe of Ephraim living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.25; only referred to as Resheph (רֶ֫שֶׁף);  son of Beriah; a brother of Sheerah and Rephah;  father of Telah.
H7566.f: Son of Beriah, of the tribe of Asher
H7566.meaning: the same as H7565 (רֶשֶׁף) Resheph, an Israelite
H7566.significance: Son of Beriah. Name (the same as H7565 (רֶשֶׁף) Resheph, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H7466.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H7466.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.11.18; referred to as Reu (רְעוּ), or Reu (KJV= Ragau)  (Ῥαγαῦ); a son of Peleg;  father of Serug.
H7466.f: Son of Peleg, ancestor of Abraham
H7466.significance: Son of Peleg. Name (for H7471 (רְעִי) in the sense of H7453 (רֵעַ); friend Reu, a postdilu...). Name in lineage or family context.

H7205.d: Jacob's son living at the time of the Patriarchs
H7205.s: A man who founded the tribe of Reuben  living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.29.32; referred to as Reuben or Reubenite (רְאוּבֵן), or Reubenite or Reuben (רְאוּבֵנִי), or Reuben (Ῥουβήν);  son of Israel and Leah; a brother of Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issachar, Zebulun and Dinah;  half-brother of: Dan, Naphtali, Gad, Asher, Joseph and Benjamin;  father of Hanoch, Pallu, Hezron an
H7205.meaning: Hitchcock: who sees the son; the vision of the son. BehindTheName: From Hebrew רְאוּבֵן meaning 'behold, a son'.
H7205.significance: jacob's son living at the time of the patriarchs. Name (from the imperative of H7200 (רָאָה) and H1121 (בֵּן); see ye a son Re...). Name in lineage or family context.

H7467.d: Edomite living at the time of the Patriarchs
H7467.s: A man of the Edomites living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.4; only referred to as Reuel (רְעוּאֵל); a son of Esau and Mahalath;  half-brother of: Eliphaz, Jeush, Jalam and Korah;  father of Nahath, Zerah, Shammah and Mizzah.
H7467.f: Son of Esau and Basemath, a chief of Edom
H7467.meaning: Hitchcock: the shepherd or friend of God
H7467.significance: Son of Esau. Name (from the same as H7466 (רְעוּ) and H410 (אֵל); friend of God Reuel, th...). Name in lineage or family context.

H7208.d: Woman living at the time of the Patriarchs
H7208.s: A concubine living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.22.24; only referred to as Reumah (רְאוּמָה); ; concubine of Nahor mother of Tebah, Gaham, Tahash and Maacah.
H7208.significance: Minor figure; name: feminine passive participle of H7213 (רָאַם); raised Reumah, a Syrian woman

H7526.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H7526.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.48; only referred to as Rezin (רְצִין).
H7526.f: Ancestor of a family of temple servants (Nethinim)
H7526.significance: Returned from exile. Name meaning: probably for H7522 (רָצוֹן) Retsin, the name of a Syrian and of an Isr...

H7331.d: Man living at the time of United Monarchy
H7331.s: A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.11.23; only referred to as Rezon (רְזוֹן); a son of Eliada.
H7331.f: Son of Eliada, adversary of Solomon
H7331.significance: Minor figure; name: from H7336 (רָזַן); prince Rezon, a Syrian

G4488.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
G4488.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Luk.3.27; only referred to as Rhesa (Ῥησά); a son of Zerubbabel;  father of Joanan.
G4488.f: Son of Zerubbabel, ancestor of Jesus
G4488.significance: Son of Zerubbabel. Name (probably of Hebrew origin (apparently for H07509) Resa (i.e. Rephajah)...). Name in lineage or family context.

G4498.d: Woman living at the time of the New Testament
G4498.s: A woman living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Act.12.13; only referred to as Rhoda (Ῥόδη).
G4498.f: Servant girl in the house of Mary
G4498.significance: Minor figure; name: probably for rhode (a rose) Rode, a servant girl

H7380.d: Warrior living at the time of United Monarchy
H7380.s: A warrior living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.23.29; only referred to as Ribai (רִיבַי);  father of Ittai.
H7380.f: Father of Ittai, one of David's mighty men
H7380.significance: Father of warrior. Name (from H7378 (רִיב); contentious Ribai, an Israelite). Name fits martial or military role.

H7417.d: Man living at the time of United Monarchy
H7417.s: A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.4.2; only referred to as Rimmon (רִמּוֹן);  father of Baanah, Rechab.
H7417.f: Father of Baanah and Rechab, murderers of Ish-bosheth
H7417.significance: Saul's family. Name meaning: or (shorter) (רִמֹּן; or רִמּוֹנוֹ; (1 Chronicles 6:62 (H77 (אֶבֶץ))),...

H7441.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H7441.s: A man from the tribe of Judah(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.20; only referred to as Rinnah (רִנָּה);  son of Shimon; a brother of Amnon, Ben-hanan, Tilon.
H7441.f: Son of Shimon, of the tribe of Judah
H7441.significance: Minor figure; name: the same as H7440 (רִנָּה) Rinnah, an Israelite

H7384.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H7384.s: A man of the Gomerians living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.3; referred to as Riphath (רִיפַת), or Riphath (דִּיפַת);  son of Gomer; a brother of Ashkenaz and Togarmah.
H7384.f: Son of Gomer, grandson of Japheth
H7384.significance: Early Patriarch. Name (or (probably by orthographical error) דִּיפַת; of foreign origin Ripha...). Name in lineage or family context.

H7525.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H7525.s: A man from the tribe of Asher living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.39; only referred to as Rizia (רִצְיָא);  son of Shual; a brother of Arah and Hanniel.
H7525.f: Son of Ulla, of the tribe of Asher
H7525.meaning: from H7521 (רָצָה); delight Ritsjah, an Israelite
H7525.significance: Minor figure; name: from H7521 (רָצָה); delight Ritsjah, an Israelite

H7532.d: Woman living at the time of United Monarchy
H7532.s: A concubine living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.3.7; only referred to as Rizpah (רִצְפָּה); a daughter of Aiah; concubine of Saul;  mother of Armoni and Mephibosheth.
H7532.f: Concubine of Saul; mother of Armoni and Mephibosheth
H7532.significance: Saul's concubine. Name meaning: the same as H7531 (רִצְפָּה) Ritspah, an Israelitess

H7303.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H7303.s: A man from the tribe of Asher living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.34; only referred to as Rohgah (רָהְגָּה);  son of Shomer; a brother of Ahi, Jehubbah and Aram.
H7303.f: Son of Shomer, of the tribe of Asher
H7303.meaning: Hitchcock: filled or drunk with talk
H7303.significance: Minor figure; name: from an unused root probably meaning to cry out; outcry Rohagah, an Israelite

H7320.d: Levite living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H7320.s: A musician from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.25.4; only referred to as Romamti-ezer (רֹמַ֫מְתִּי עֶ֫זֶר);  son of Heman; a brother of Bukkiah, Mattaniah, Uzziel, Shebuel, Jerimoth, Hananiah, Hanani, Eliathah, Giddalti, Joshbekashah, Mallothi, Hothir and Mahazioth.
H7320.f: Son of Heman, a Levitical singer
H7320.significance: Son of Heman. Name ((or Romam from H7311 (רוּם) and H5828 (עֵזֶר); I have raised up a help...). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H7220.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H7220.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.21; referred to as Rosh (רֹאשׁ), or Rapha (רָפָא);  son of Benjamin; a brother of Bela, Becher, Ashbel, Gera, Naaman, Ahiram, Muppim, Huppim, Ard, Ahiram and Jediael.
H7220.f: Son of Benjamin, grandson of Jacob
H7220.meaning: Hitchcock: the head; top, or beginning
H7220.significance: Son of Benjamin. Name (probably the same as H7218 (רֹאשׁ) Rosh, the name of an Israelite and ...). Name in lineage or family context.

G4504.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G4504.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Mrk.15.21; only referred to as Rufus (Ῥοῦφος);  son of Simon; a brother of Alexander.
G4504.f: Son of Simon of Cyrene, who carried Jesus' cross
G4504.significance: Minor figure; name: of Latin origin red; Rufus, a Christian

H7327.s: A woman of the Moabites living before Israel's Monarchy, first mentioned at Rut.1.4; referred to as Ruth (רוּת), or Ruth (Ῥούθ); wife of Mahlon and Boaz;  mother of Obed.
H7327.f: Moabite woman, ancestor of David and Jesus
H7327.meaning: From רֵעַ (rea), friend, companion. Ruth = friend, companion. Moabitess (Ruth 1:4). Hitchcock: drunk; satisfied. BehindTheName: From Hebrew רוּת (Rut) possibly meaning 'friend'.
H7327.significance: Covenant loyalty (ḥesed); “your people shall be my people” (Ruth 1:16). Ancestress of David; type of the Gentile bride and the kinsman-redeemer (Boaz).

H5454.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H5454.s: A man of the Cushites living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.7; referred to as Sabtah or Sabta (סַבְתָּה);  son of Cush; a brother of Seba, Havilah, Raamah, Sabteca and Nimrod.
H5454.f: Son of Cush, grandson of Ham
H5454.meaning: Hitchcock: a going about or circuiting; old age
H5454.significance: Son of Cush. Name (or סַבְתָּה; probably of foreign derivation Sabta or Sabtah, the name ...). Name in lineage or family context.

H5455.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H5455.s: A man of the Cushites living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.7; only referred to as Sabteca (סַבְתְּכָא);  son of Cush; a brother of Seba, Havilah, Sabtah, Raamah and Nimrod.
H5455.f: Son of Cush, grandson of Ham
H5455.meaning: probably of foreign derivation Sabteca, the name of a son of Cush, and the region settled by him
H5455.significance: Son of Cush. Name (probably of foreign derivation Sabteca, the name of a son of Cush, and...). Name in lineage or family context.

H7940.d: Levite living at the time of United Monarchy
H7940.s: A man from the tribe of Levi living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.26.4; only referred to as Sachar (שָׂכָר);  son of Obed-edom; a brother of Shemaiah, Jehozabad, Joah, Nethanel, Ammiel, Issachar and Peullethai.
H7940.f: Son of Obed-edom, a Levitical gatekeeper
H7940.meaning: the same as H7939 (שָׂכָר); recompense Sakar, the name of two Israelites
H7940.significance: Minor figure; name: the same as H7939 (שָׂכָר); recompense Sakar, the name of two Israelites

H7634.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H7634.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.10; only referred to as Sachia (שָֽׂכְיָה);  son of Shaharaim and Hodesh; a brother of Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malcam, Jeuz, Mirmah, Abitub and Elpaal.
H7634.meaning: feminine of the same as H7629 (שֹׁבִי); captivation Shobjah, an Israelite
H7634.significance: Minor figure; name: feminine of the same as H7629 (שֹׁבִי); captivation Shobjah, an Israelite

H5543.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H5543.s: A priest living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Neh.12.7; referred to as Sallu (סַלּוּ), or Sallai (NIV= Sallu)  (סַלַּי).
H5543.f: Priest who returned from Babylonian exile with Zerubbabel
H5543.meaning: or סַלּוּא; or סָלוּא; or סַלַּי; from H5541 (סָלָה); weighed Sallu or Sallai, the name of two...
H5543.significance: Returned priest. Name (or סַלּוּא; or סָלוּא; or סַלַּי; from H5541 (סָלָה); weighed Sallu or...). Name fits cultic or priestly role.

H8007.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H8007.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at 1Ch.2.51; only referred to as Salma (שַׂלְמָא);  son of Hur; a brother of Uri, Shobal, Hareph, Jezreel, Ishma, Idbash, Hazzelelponi, Penuel, and Ezer; father of Elimelech (probably); founder of Bethlehem.
H8007.f: Son of Hur, founder of Bethlehem
H8007.significance: Son of Hur. Name (probably for H8008 (שַׂלְמָה); clothing Salma, the name of two Israeli...). Name in lineage or family context.

G4539.d: Woman living at the time of the New Testament
G4539.s: A woman living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mrk.15.40; only referred to as Salome (Σαλώμη);  daughter of Heli (?); a sister of Mary@Mat.1.16-Act  (?)G3137G).
G4539.f: Witness of Jesus' crucifixion and resurrection
G4539.significance: Sister of Mary.. Name meaning: probably of Hebrew origin (feminine from H07965) Salome (i.e. Shelomah...

H5562.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H5562.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Jer.39.3; only referred to as Samgar (סַמְגַּר נְבוֹ).
H5562.f: Babylonian official present at the fall of Jerusalem
H5562.meaning: of foreign origin Samgar-Nebo, a Babylonian general
H5562.significance: Minor figure; name: of foreign origin Samgar-Nebo, a Babylonian general

H8072.d: King living at the time of the Patriarchs
H8072.s: A king of Edom living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.36; only referred to as Samlah (שַׂמְלָה).
H8072.f: King of Edom before Israel had kings
H8072.meaning: Hitchcock: his raiment; his left hand; his astonishment
H8072.significance: Edomite king. Name (probably for the same as H8071 (שִׂמְלָה) Samlah, an Edomite). Name in royal or ruling context.

H8123.s: A Judge living before Israel's Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.13.24; referred to as Samson (שִׁמְשׁוֹן), or Samson (Σαμψών); a son of Manoah; husband of Delilah.
H8123.f: Israelite judge with great strength from God
H8123.meaning: From שֶׁמֶשׁ (shemesh), sun. Samson = sun man, or of the sun. Judge (Judg 13:24). Hitchcock: his sun; his service; there the second time. BehindTheName: From Hebrew שִׁמְשׁוֹן (Shimshon) possibly meaning 'sun', from שֶׁמֶשׁ (shemesh).
H8123.significance: Nazirite; strength in his hair (Judg 16:17). Betrayed by Delilah; died with the Philistines (Judg 16:30). Name (sun) as the one whose strength was the Lord’s—and whose fall was his own.

H8050.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H8050.s: A warrior from the tribe of Issachar living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.2; only referred to as Shemuel (שְׁמוּאֵל);  son of Tola; a brother of Uzzi, Rephaiah, Jeriel, Jahmai and Ibsam.
H8050.f: Son of Tola, a leader of Issachar
H8050.significance: Minor figure; name: from the passive participle of H8085 (שָׁמַע) and H410 (אֵל); heard of God Shemuel, the name of...

H5593.d: Giant living at the time of United Monarchy
H5593.s: A gigantic man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.21.18; referred to as Saph (סַף), or Sippai (סִפַּי);  son of Rapha; a brother of Goliath, Ishbi-benob , Lahmi, huge man.
H5593.f: Philistine giant killed by Sibbechai the Hushathite
H5593.significance: A gigantic man. Name (the same as H5592 (סַף) Saph, a Philistine). Name in lineage or family context.

G4551.d: Woman living at the time of the New Testament
G4551.s: A woman living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Act.5.1; only referred to as Sapphira (Σαπφείρη); wife of Ananias.
G4551.f: Wife of Ananias, lied to the apostles, died
G4551.significance: Minor figure; name: feminine of G4552 (σάπφειρος) Sapphire, an Israelitess

H8283.d: Woman living at the time of the Patriarchs
H8283.s: A woman living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.11.29; referred to as Sarah (שָׂרָה), or Sarai (שָׂרַי), or Sarah (KJV= Sara)  (Σάρρα);  daughter of Terah; a sister of Abraham, Nahor and Haran; wife of Abraham;  mother of Isaac.
H8283.meaning: Hitchcock: lady; princess; princess of the multitude. BehindTheName: From Hebrew שָׂרָה (Sara) meaning 'lady, princess, noblewoman'.
H8283.significance: Sister of Abraham. Name meaning: the same as H8282 (שָׂרָה) Sarah, Abraham's wife

H8315.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H8315.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.22; only referred to as Saraph (שָׂרָף);  son of Shelah; a brother of Er, Laadah, Jokim and Joash.
H8315.f: Son of Shelah, descendant of Judah
H8315.meaning: the same as H8314 (שָׂרָף) Saraph, an Israelite
H8315.significance: Minor figure; name: the same as H8314 (שָׂרָף) Saraph, an Israelite

H7586.d: King living at the time of United Monarchy
H7586.s: A king of Israel, from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.9.2; referred to as Saul (שָׁאוּל), or Saul (Σαούλ); a son of Kish; husband of Ahinoam and Rizpah;  father of Jonathan, Abinadab, Malchi-shua, Merab, Michal, Ish-bosheth, Armoni, Mephibosheth.
H7586.f: First king of Israel, anointed by Samuel
H7586.meaning: From שָׁאַל (shaal), ask. Saul = asked (of God). First king of Israel (1 Sam 9:2). Hitchcock: demanded; lent; ditch; death. BehindTheName: From Hebrew שָׁאוּל (Shaʾul) meaning 'asked for, prayed for'.
H7586.significance: Asked for by the people (1 Sam 8:5); rejected by the Lord (1 Sam 15:26). Name (asked) as the one given and then taken away—type of the king who did not obey.

G4630.d: Priest living at the time of the New Testament
G4630.s: A priest living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Act.19.14; called Sceva (Σκευᾶς)
G4630.f: Jewish chief priest whose seven sons attempted to exorcise demons
G4630.significance: From  Levi. Name (apparently of Latin origin left-handed; Scevas (i.e. Scævus), an Israe...). Name fits cultic or priestly role.

G4658.s: People living in Scythia, only mentioned at Col.3.11; only referred to as Scythians (Σκύθης).
G4658.f: Nomadic people group mentioned by Paul
G4658.meaning: probably of foreign origin a Scythene or Scythian, i.e. (by implication) a savage
G4658.significance: Minor figure; name: probably of foreign origin a Scythene or Scythian, i.e. (by implication) a savage

H5434.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H5434.s: A man of the Cushites living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.7; only referred to as Seba (סְבָא);  son of Cush; a brother of Havilah, Sabtah, Raamah, Sabteca and Nimrod.
H5434.f: Son of Cush, brother of Raamah
H5434.significance: Son of Cush. Name (of foreign origin Seba, a son of Cush, and the country settled by him). Name in lineage or family context.

G4580.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G4580.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Act.20.4; only referred to as Secundus (Σεκοῦνδος).
G4580.significance: Minor figure; name: of Latin origin "second"; Secundus, a Christian

H7687.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living before Israel's Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.2.21; only referred to as Segub (שְׂגוּב); a son of Hezron and the daughter of Machir;  half-brother of: Ram, Jerahmeel, Caleb and Ashhur;  father of Jair.
H7687.f: Son of Hezron; father of Jair
H7687.significance: Son of Hezron. Name (from H7682 (שָׂגַב); aloft Segub, the name of two Israelites). Name in lineage or family context.

H8165.d: Edomite living at the time of the Patriarchs
H8165.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.20; only referred to as Seir (שֵׂעִיר);  father of Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Dishon, Ezer, Dishan, Timna.
H8165.f: Horite chief, ancestor of the Horites of Seir
H8165.meaning: Hitchcock: Seirath, hairy; goat; demon; tempest
H8165.significance: Father of Lotan. Name (formed like H8163 (שָׂעִיר); rough Seir, a mountain of Idumaea and its...). Name in lineage or family context.

H5540.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H5540.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.2.30; only referred to as Seled (סֶ֫לֶד);  son of Nadab; a brother of Appaim.
H5540.f: Son of Nadab, died without children
H5540.significance: Son of Nadab. Name (from H5539 (סָלַד); exultation Seled, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H5565.d: Levite living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H5565.s: A man from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.26.7; only referred to as Semachiah (סְמַכְיָהוּ);  son of Shemaiah; a brother of Othni, Rephael, Obed, Elzabad and Elihu.
H5565.f: Son of Shemaiah, gatekeeper of the temple
H5565.significance: Minor figure; name: from H5564 (סָמַךְ) and H3050 (יָהּ); supported of Jah Semakjah, an Israelite

G4584.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
G4584.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Luk.3.26; only referred to as Semein (Σεμεΐ); a son of Josech;  father of Mattathias.
G4584.meaning: of Hebrew origin (H08096) Semei (i.e. Shimi), an Israelite
G4584.significance: Son of Josech. Name (of Hebrew origin (H08096) Semei (i.e. Shimi), an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H5576.d: Emperor living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H5576.s: An emperor of Assyria living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.18.13; referred to as Sennacherib (סַנְחֵרִיב), or Sargon (סַרְגוֹן);  father of Adrammelech, Sharezer and Esarhaddon.
H5576.significance: Emperor of Assyria. Name meaning: of foreign origin Sancherib, an Assyrian king

H8188.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8188.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.24.8; only referred to as Seorim (שְׂעֹרִים).
H8188.f: Priest during David's reign, head of the fourth division
H8188.significance: Minor figure; name: masculine plural of H8184 (שְׂעֹרָה); barley grains Seorim, an Israelite

H8294.d: Woman living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H8294.s: A woman from the tribe of Asher living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.17; referred to as Serah (KJV= Sarah)  (שֶׂ֫רַח, שָׂ֫רַח);  daughter of Asher; a sister of Imnah, Ishvah, Ishvi and Beriah.
H8294.f: Daughter of Asher, sister of Asher's sons
H8294.meaning: Hitchcock: lady of scent; song; the morning star
H8294.significance: Sister of Imnah. Name meaning: by permutation for H5629 (סֶרַח); superfluity Serach, an Israelitess

H8304.d: High Priest living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8304.s: A High Priest from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.25.18; only referred to as Seraiah (שְׂרָיָהוּ); a son of Azariah;  father of Jehozadak and Ezra.
H8304.f: High priest during the reign of Zedekiah
H8304.significance: A High Priest. Name (or שְׂרָיָהוּ; from H8280 (שָׂרָה) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah has prevailed...). Name fits cultic or priestly role.

H5624.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H5624.s: A man from the tribe of Zebulun living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.14; referred to as Sered (סֶ֫רֶד), or Seredite (סַרְדִּי);  son of Zebulun; a brother of Elon and Jahleel.
H5624.f: Son of Zebulun, ancestor of the Seredites
H5624.significance: Son of Zebulun. Name (from a primitive root meaning to tremble; trembling Sered, an Israelit...). Name in lineage or family context.

G4588.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G4588.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Act.13.7; only referred to as Sergius Paulus (Σέργιος Παῦλος).
G4588.f: Proconsul of Cyprus, converted under Paul's ministry
G4588.meaning: of Latin origin Sergius, a Roman
G4588.significance: Minor figure; name: of Latin origin Sergius, a Roman

H8286.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H8286.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.11.20; referred to as Serug (שְׂרוּג), or Serug (KJV= Saruch)  (Σαρούχ); a son of Reu;  father of Nahor.
H8286.f: Son of Reu; father of Nahor, ancestor of Abraham
H8286.significance: Son of Reu. Name (from H8276 (שָׂרַג); tendril Serug, a postdiluvian patriarch). Name in lineage or family context.

H8352.d: Man living at the time before the Flood
H8352.s: A man living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.4.25; referred to as Seth (שֵׁת), or Sheth (=Qere. Ketiv= "buttock") (שֵׁת), or Seth (KJV= Sheth)  (Σήθ);  son of Adam and Eve; a brother of Cain and Abel;  father of Enosh.
H8352.meaning: From שִׁית (shit), set, appoint. Seth = appointed, substitute. Third son of Adam (Gen 4:25). Hitchcock: put; who puts; fixed. BehindTheName: From Hebrew שֵׁת (Shet) meaning 'placed, appointed'.
H8352.significance: Given in place of Abel (Gen 4:25); line of the promise (Gen 5:3). Name (appointed) as the seed appointed to carry the hope—type of the line that leads to the Seed.

H5639.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H5639.s: A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.13.13; only referred to as Sethur (סְתוּר); a son of Michael.
H5639.f: Son of Michael, spy from the tribe of Asher
H5639.significance: Minor figure; name: from H5641 (סָתַר); hidden Sethur, an Israelite

H8174.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8174.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.47; only referred to as Shaaph (שַׁ֫עַף);  son of Caleb and Jahdai; a brother of Regem, Jotham, Geshan, Pelet and Ephah, Hur(?), Jesher(?), Shobab(?), Ardon(?), Mesha(?), Haran(?), Moza(?), Gazez(?), Sheber(?), Tirhanah(?), Shaaph(?), Sheva(?) and Achsah(?).
H8174.meaning: from H5586 (סָעַף); fluctuation Shaaph, the name of two Israelites
H8174.significance: Minor figure; name: from H5586 (סָעַף); fluctuation Shaaph, the name of two Israelites

H8190.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H8190.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Est.2.14; only referred to as Shaashgaz (שַׁעַשְׁגַּז).
H8190.f: Eunuch in charge of King Ahasuerus' concubines
H8190.meaning: Hitchcock: he that presses the fleece; that shears the sheep
H8190.significance: Minor figure; name: of Persian derivation Shaashgaz, a eunuch of Xerxes

H7678.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H7678.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.11.16; only referred to as Shabbethai (שַׁבְּתַי).
H7678.f: Levite in charge of external affairs in Jerusalem
H7678.significance: Minor figure; name: from H7676 (שַׁבָּת); restful Shabbethai, the name of three Israelites

H7842.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H7842.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.8; only referred to as Shaharaim (שַׁחֲרַ֫יִם); husband of Hushim, Baara and Hodesh;  father of Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malcam, Jeuz, Sachia, Mirmah, Abitub, Elpaal.
H7842.f: Benjamite who had wives Hushim and Baara
H7842.meaning: dual of H7837 (שַׁחַר); double dawn Shacharajim, an Israelite
H7842.significance: Father of Jobab. Name (dual of H7837 (שַׁחַר); double dawn Shacharajim, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H7967.d: Priest living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H7967.s: A High Priest from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.6.12; referred to as Shallum (שַׁלּוּם), or Meshullam (מְשֻׁלָּם); a son of Zadok;  father of Hilkiah.
H7967.f: High priest, son of Zadok and father of Hilkiah
H7967.significance: High Priest. Name (or (shorter) שַׁלֻּם; the same as H7966 (שִׁלּוּם) Shallum, the name o...). Name fits cultic or priestly role.

H7968.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H7968.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.3.15; only referred to as Shallum (שַׁלּוּן); a son of Col-hozeh.
H7968.f: Son of Col-hozeh, repaired the Fountain Gate
H7968.significance: Minor figure; name: probably for H7967 (שַׁלּוּם) Shallun, an Israelite

H8014.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H8014.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.46; referred to as Shalmai (שַׂלְמַי), or Shamlai (=Ketiv. Qere, KJV, NIV= Shalmai) (שַׁמְלַי).
H8014.f: Nethinim ancestor whose descendants returned from Babylonian exile
H8014.significance: Returned from exile. Name meaning: from H8008 (שַׂלְמָה); clothed Salmai, an Israelite

H8022.d: King living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8022.s: A king of Assyria living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.17.3; referred to as Shalmaneser (שַׁלְמַנְאֶ֫סֶר), or Shalman (שַׁלְמַן).
H8022.f: Assyrian king who conquered Samaria and exiled Israelites
H8022.meaning: Hitchcock: peace; tied; chained; perfection; retribution
H8022.significance: king living at the time of divided monarchy. Name (of foreign derivation Shalmaneser, an Assyrian king). Name in royal or ruling context.

H8091.d: Warrior living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8091.s: A warrior living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.11.44; only referred to as Shama (שָׁמָע);  son of Hotham; a brother of Jeiel.
H8091.f: Mighty man in David's army, a Harodite
H8091.meaning: from H8085 (שָׁמַע); obedient Shama, an Israelite
H8091.significance: Minor figure; name: from H8085 (שָׁמַע); obedient Shama, an Israelite

H8044.s: A Judge living before Israel's Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.3.31; only referred to as Shamgar (שַׁמְגַּר); a son of Anath.
H8044.f: Judge of Israel who killed 600 Philistines
H8044.meaning: Hitchcock: named a stranger; he is here a stranger
H8044.significance: A Judge. Name (of uncertain derivation Shamgar, an Israelite judge). Name in judicial or deliverer context.

H8049.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8049.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.27.8; only referred to as Shamhuth (שַׁמְהוּת).
H8049.f: Fifth division commander in David's army
H8049.significance: Minor figure; name: for H8048 (שַׁמָּה); desolation Shamhuth, an Israelite

H8069.d: Levite living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8069.s: A man from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.24.24; referred to as Shamir (שָׁמִיר), or Shamur (=Ketiv) (שָׁמוּר); a son of Micah.
H8069.meaning: Hitchcock: Shamer, prison; bush; lees; thorn
H8069.significance: Son of Micah. Name (the same as H8068 (שָׁמִיר) Shamir, the name of two places in Palestin...). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H8037.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8037.s: A man from the tribe of Asher living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.37; only referred to as Shamma (שַׁמָּא);  son of Zophah; a brother of Suah, Harnepher, Shual, Beri, Imrah, Bezer, Hod, Shilshah, Ithran and Beera.
H8037.f: Son of Zophah, descendant of Asher
H8037.meaning: from H8074 (שָׁמֵם); desolation Shamma, an Israelite
H8037.significance: Minor figure; name: from H8074 (שָׁמֵם); desolation Shamma, an Israelite

H8048.d: Warrior living at the time of United Monarchy
H8048.s: A warrior living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.23.33; referred to as Shammah (שַׁמָּה), or Shagee (KJV= Shage)  (שָׁגֵה);  father of Jonathan.
H8048.f: Mighty man in David's army, son of Agee the Hararite
H8048.significance: David's warrior. Name (the same as H8047 (שַׁמָּה) Shammah, the name of an Edomite and four I...). Name fits martial or military role.

H8060.s: A man from the tribe of Judah(?) living before Israel's Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.17; only referred to as Shammai (שַׁמַּי);  son of Mered(?) and Bithiah; a brother of Miriam and Ishbah;  half-brother of: Jered(?), Heber(?) and Jekuthiel(?).
H8060.significance: Minor figure; name: from H8073 (שַׁמְלַי); destructive Shammai, the name of three Israelites

H8051.d: David's son living at the time of United Monarchy
H8051.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.5.14; referred to as Shammua (שַׁמּוּעַ), or Shimea (שִׁמְעָא, שִׁמְעָה);  son of David and Bathsheba; a brother of Shobab, Nathan and Solomon;  half-brother of: Amnon, Chileab, Absalom, Adonijah, Shephatiah, Ithream, Ibhar, Elishua, Nepheg, Japhia, Elishama, Eliada, Eliphelet, Tamar, Elpelet, Nogah and Jer
H8051.meaning: from H8074 (שָׁמֵם); renowned Shammua, the name of four Israelites
H8051.significance: David's son. Name (from H8074 (שָׁמֵם); renowned Shammua, the name of four Israelites). Name in lineage or family context.

H8125.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8125.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.26; only referred to as Shamsherai (שַׁמְשְׁרַי);  son of Jeroham; a brother of Shehariah, Athaliah, Jaareshiah, Elijah and Zichri.
H8125.meaning: Hitchcock: there a singer or conqueror
H8125.significance: Minor figure; name: apparently from H8121 (שֶׁמֶשׁ); sunlike Shamsherai, an Israelite

H8223.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8223.s: A man from the tribe of Gad  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.5.12; only referred to as Shapham (שָׁפָם).
H8223.f: Gadite leader during the reign of Jotham
H8223.meaning: Hitchcock: Shaphan, rabbit; wild rat; their lip; their brink
H8223.significance: Minor figure; name: formed like H8221 (שְׁפָם); baldly Shapham, an Israelite

H8227.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8227.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.22.3; only referred to as Shaphan (שָׁפָן); a son of Azaliah;  father of Ahikam, Elasah, Gemariah.
H8227.f: Scribe during the reign of King Josiah
H8227.meaning: from H8226 (שָׂפַן) a species of rockrabbit (from its hiding), i.e. probably the hyrax
H8227.significance: Son of Azaliah. Name (from H8226 (שָׂפַן) a species of rockrabbit (from its hiding), i.e. pr...). Name in lineage or family context.

H8202.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8202.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.3.22; only referred to as Shaphat (שָׁפָט);  son of Shemaiah; a brother of Hattush, Igal, Bariah and Neariah.
H8202.f: Descendant of David during the postexilic period
H8202.significance: Minor figure; name: from H8199 (שָׁפַט); judge Shaphat, the name of four Israelites

H8298.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H8298.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.10.40; only referred to as Sharai (שָׁרָ֑י).
H8298.f: Israelite who divorced his foreign wife
H8298.meaning: Hitchcock: my lord; my prince; my song
H8298.significance: Minor figure; name: probably from H8324 (שָׁרַר); hostile Sharay, an Israelite

H8325.d: Man living at the time of United Monarchy
H8325.s: A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.23.33; referred to as Sharar (שָׁרָר), or Sachar (KJV= Sacar, NIV= Sakar)  (שָׂכָר);  father of Ahiam.
H8325.f: Father of Ahiam, one of David's mighty men
H8325.significance: Father of warrior. Name (from H8324 (שָׁרַר); hostile Sharar, an Israelite). Name fits martial or military role.

H8272.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8272.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.19.37; only referred to as Sharezer (שַׁרְאֶ֫צֶר);  son of Sennacherib; a brother of Adrammelech and Esarhaddon.
H8272.f: Assyrian prince who assassinated his father Sennacherib
H8272.meaning: Hitchcock: overseer of the treasury, or of the storehouse
H8272.significance: Son of Sennacherib. Name (of foreign derivation Sharetser, the name of an Assyrian and an Israel...). Name in lineage or family context.

H8343.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H8343.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.10.40; only referred to as Shashai (שָׁשַׁי).
H8343.f: Israelite who divorced his foreign wife
H8343.significance: Minor figure; name: perhaps from H8336 (שֵׁשׁ); whitish Shashai, an Israelite

H8349.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H8349.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin  living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at 1Ch.8.14; only referred to as Shashak (שָׁשָׁק);  son of Beriah; a brother of Arad, Ahio, Jeremoth, Zebadiah, Eder, Michael, Ishpah and Joha;  father of Ishpan, Eber, Eliel, Abdon, Zichri, Hanan, Hananiah, Elam, Anthothijah, Iphdeiah, Penuel.
H8349.f: Benjamite leader and descendant of Elpaal
H8349.meaning: Hitchcock: a bag of linen; the sixth bag
H8349.significance: Son of Beriah. Name (probably from the base of H7785 (שׁוֹק); pedestrian Shashak, an Israel...). Name in lineage or family context.

H7594.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H7594.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.10.29; only referred to as Sheal (שְׁאָל).
H7594.f: Israelite who divorced his foreign wife
H7594.meaning: from H7592 (שָׁאַל); request Sheal, an Israelite
H7594.significance: Minor figure; name: from H7592 (שָׁאַל); request Sheal, an Israelite

H7597.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H7597.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at 1Ch.3.17; referred to as Shealtiel (שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל), or Shealtiel (שַׁלְתִּיאֵל), or Shealtiel (Aramiac שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל), or Shealtiel (Σαλαθιήλ);  son of Jehoiachin; a brother of Zedekiah(?); father(?) of Malchiram, Pedaiah, Shenazzar, Jekamiah, Hoshama and Nedabiah.
H7597.significance: man living at the time of exile and return. Name (or שַׁלְתִּיאֵל; from H7592 (שָׁאַל) and H410 (אֵל); I have asked God ...). Name in lineage or family context.

G4528.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
G4528.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Luk.3.27; only referred to as Shealtiel (Σαλαθιήλ); a son of Neri;  father of Zerubbabel.
G4528.f: Ancestor of Jesus in Luke's genealogy
G4528.significance: Son of Neri. Name (of Hebrew origin (H07597) Salathiel (i.e. Shealtiel), an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H8187.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8187.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.8.38; only referred to as Sheariah (שְׁעַרְיָה);  son of Azel; a brother of Azrikam, Bocheru, Ishmael, Obadiah and Hanan.
H8187.meaning: Hitchcock: gate of the Lord; tempest of the Lord
H8187.significance: Saul's family. Name (from H8176 (שָׁעַר) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah has stormed Shearjah, an Isr...). Name in lineage or family context.

H7610.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H7610.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Isa.7.3; only referred to as Shear-jashub (שְׁאָר יָשׁוּב);  son of Isaiah; a brother of Maher-shalal-hash-baz.
H7610.significance: Minor figure; name: from H7605 (שְׁאָר) and H7725 (שׁוּב); a remnant will return Shear-Jashub, the symbolic name of...

H7652.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H7652.s: A man from the tribe of Gad  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.5.13; only referred to as Sheba (שֶׁ֫בַע);  son of Abihail; a brother of Michael, Meshullam, Jorai, Jacan, Zia and Eber.
H7652.f: Gadite leader during the reign of Jotham
H7652.meaning: Hitchcock: captivity; old man; repose; oath
H7652.significance: Minor figure; name: the same as H7651 (שֶׁבַע); seven Sheba, the name of a place in Palestine, and of two Israelites

H7614.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H7614.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.28; only referred to as Sheba (שְׁבָא);  son of Joktan; a brother of Almodad, Sheleph, Hazarmaveth, Jerah, Hadoram, Uzal, Diklah, Obal, Abimael, Ophir, Havilah and Jobab.
H7614.f: Descendant of Joktan, settling in southern Arabia
H7614.meaning: Hitchcock: captivity; old man; repose; oath
H7614.significance: Son of Joktan. Name (of foreign origin Sheba, the name of three early progenitors of tribes...). Name in lineage or family context.

H7645.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H7645.s: A priest living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Neh.10.4; referred to as Shebaniah (שְׁבַנְיָהוּ), or Shecaniah (NIV= Shekaniah)  (שְׁכַנְיָהוּ).
H7645.f: Priest during the time of Nehemiah
H7645.meaning: Hitchcock: the Lord that converts, or recalls from captivity
H7645.significance: Returned priest. Name (or שְׁבַנְיָהוּ; from the same as H7644 (שֶׁבְנָא) and H3050 (יָהּ); J...). Name fits cultic or priestly role.

H7669.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H7669.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.48; only referred to as Sheber (שֶׁ֫בֶר);  son of Caleb and Maacah; a brother of Tirhanah, Regem(?), Jotham(?), Geshan(?), Pelet(?), Ephah(?), Shaaph(?), Shaaph and Sheva;  half-brother of: Hur, Jesher, Shobab, Ardon, Mesha, Haran, Moza, Gazez and Achsah.
H7669.f: Son of Caleb and his concubine Maacah
H7669.significance: Minor figure; name: the same as H7667 (שֶׁבֶר) Sheber, an Israelite

H7644.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H7644.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.18.18; referred to as Shebna or Shebnah (KJV= Shebna)  (שֶׁבְנָא).
H7644.f: Steward of the palace during Hezekiah's reign
H7644.meaning: Hitchcock: who rests himself; who is now captive
H7644.significance: man living at the time of divided monarchy. Name meaning: or שֶׁבְנָה; from an unused root meaning to grow; growth Shebna or She...

H7619.d: Levite living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H7619.s: A musician from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.25.4; referred to as Shebuel or Shubael (שְׁבוּאֵל);  son of Heman; a brother of Bukkiah, Mattaniah, Uzziel, Jerimoth, Hananiah, Hanani, Eliathah, Giddalti, Romamti-ezer, Joshbekashah, Mallothi, Hothir and Mahazioth.
H7619.meaning: Hitchcock: turning, or captivity, or seat, of God
H7619.significance: Son of Heman. Name (or שׁוּבָאֵל; from H7617 (שָׁבָה) (abbreviated form) or H7725 (שׁוּב) ...). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H7928.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H7928.s: A man from the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.26.31; referred to as Shechem (שֶׁ֫כֶם), or Shechemite (שִׁכְמִי);  son of Gilead; a brother of Abiezer, Helek, Asriel, Shemida and Hepher.
H7928.f: Son of Gilead and Manassite clan
H7928.meaning: Hitchcock: part; portion; back early in the morning
H7928.significance: Son of Gilead. Name (for H7926 (שְׁכֶם) Shekem, the name of a Hivite and two Israelites). Name in lineage or family context.

H7927.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H7927.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.33.19; only referred to as Shechem (שְׁכֶם); a son of Hamor.
H7927.f: Founded the city where Dinah was raped
H7927.meaning: Hitchcock: part; portion; back early in the morning
H7927.significance: Son of Hamor. Name (the same as H7926 (שְׁכֶם); ridge Shekem, a place in Palestine). Name in lineage or family context.

H7707.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H7707.s: A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.1.5; only referred to as Shedeur (שְׁדֵיאוּר);  father of Elizur.
H7707.f: Father of Elizur, a leader of Reuben
H7707.meaning: Hitchcock: field of light; light of the Almighty
H7707.significance: Father of Elizur. Name (from the same as H7704 (שָׂדֶה) and H217 (אוּר); spreader of light She...). Name in lineage or family context.

H7609.d: Woman living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H7609.s: A woman from the tribe of Ephraim living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.24; only referred to as Sheerah (שֶׁאֱרָה);  daughter of Beriah; a sister of Rephah and Resheph.
H7609.f: Ephraim's granddaughter who built three towns
H7609.meaning: the same as H7608 (שַׁאֲרָה) Sheerah, an Israelitess
H7609.significance: Minor figure; name: the same as H7608 (שַׁאֲרָה) Sheerah, an Israelitess

H7841.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H7841.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.26; only referred to as Shehariah (שְׁחַרְיָה);  son of Jeroham; a brother of Shamsherai, Athaliah, Jaareshiah, Elijah and Zichri.
H7841.meaning: Hitchcock: mourning or blackness of the Lord
H7841.significance: Minor figure; name: from H7836 (שָׁחַר) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah has sought Shecharjah, an Israelite

H7974.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H7974.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.24; referred to as Shelah (שֶׁ֫לַח), or Shelah (KJV= Sala)  (Σαλά); a son of Cainan;  father of Eber.
H7974.f: Son of Arpachshad and ancestor of Abraham
H7974.meaning: Hitchcock: that breaks; that unties; that undresses
H7974.significance: Son of Cainan. Name (the same as H7973 (שֶׁלַח) Shelach, a postdiluvian patriarch). Name in lineage or family context.

H7956.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H7956.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.38.5; referred to as Shelah (שֵׁלָה), or Shelanite (שֵׁלָנִי);  son of Judah and Bath-shua; a brother of Er and Onan;  half-brother of: Perez and Zerah;  father of Er, Laadah, Jokim, Joash and Saraph.
H7956.f: Judah's youngest son and his descendants
H7956.meaning: Hitchcock: that breaks; that unties; that undresses
H7956.significance: Son of Judah. Name (the same as H7596 (שְׁאֵלָה) (shortened); request Shelah, the name of ...). Name in lineage or family context.

H8018.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8018.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Jer.36.14; only referred to as Shelemiah (שֶׁלֶמְיָהוּ); a son of Cushi;  father of Nethaniah.
H8018.f: Grandfather of Jehudi, who read Jeremiah's scroll
H8018.meaning: Hitchcock: God is my perfection; my happiness; my peace
H8018.significance: Son of Cushi. Name (or שֶׁלֶמְיָהוּ; from H8002 (שֶׁלֶם) and H3050 (יָהּ); thankoffering o...). Name in lineage or family context.

H8026.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H8026.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.26; only referred to as Sheleph (שֶׁ֫לֶף);  son of Joktan; a brother of Almodad, Hazarmaveth, Jerah, Hadoram, Uzal, Diklah, Obal, Abimael, Sheba, Ophir, Havilah and Jobab.
H8026.f: Son of Joktan, descendant of Shem
H8026.significance: Son of Joktan. Name (from H8025 (שָׁלַף); extract Sheleph, a son of Jokthan). Name in lineage or family context.

H8028.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8028.s: A man from the tribe of Asher living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.35; only referred to as Shelesh (שֶׁ֫לֶשׁ);  son of Hotham; a brother of Zophah, Imna and Amal.
H8028.significance: Minor figure; name: from H8027 (שָׁלַשׁ); triplet Shelesh, an Israelite

H8015.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H8015.s: A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.34.27; only referred to as Shelomi (שְׁלֹמִי);  father of Ahihud.
H8015.f: Father of Ahihud, a leader from Asher
H8015.meaning: Hitchcock: Shelomith, my peace; my happiness; my recompense
H8015.significance: Father of Ahihud. Name (from H7965 (שָׁלוֹם); peaceable Shelomi, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H8019.d: Woman living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8019.s: A woman from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.11.20; only referred to as Shelomith (שְׁלֹמִית);  daughter of Rehoboam and Maacah; a sister of Abijah, Attai and Ziza;  half-sister of: Jeush, Shemariah and Zaham.
H8019.f: Daughter of Rehoboam with Absolom's daughter
H8019.meaning: or שׁלוֹמִית; (Ezra 8:10), from H7965 (שָׁלוֹם); peaceableness Shelomith, the name of five...
H8019.significance: Minor figure; name: or שׁלוֹמִית; (Ezra 8:10), from H7965 (שָׁלוֹם); peaceableness Shelomith, the name of five...

H8013.d: Woman living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8013.s: A woman from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.26.25; referred to as Shelomoth (KJV= Shelomith)  (שְׁלֹמוֹת), or Shelomoth (KJV= Shelomith)  (שְׁלֹמִית); a daughter of Zichri.
H8013.meaning: feminine plural of H7965 (שָׁלוֹם); pacifications Shelomoth, the name of two Israelites
H8013.significance: Daughter of Zichri. Name meaning: feminine plural of H7965 (שָׁלוֹם); pacifications Shelomoth, the name ...

H8017.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H8017.s: A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.1.6; only referred to as Shelumiel (שְׁלֻמִיאֵל); a son of Zurishaddai.
H8017.f: Leader of the tribe of Simeon
H8017.significance: Son of Zurishaddai. Name (from H7965 (שָׁלוֹם) and H410 (אֵל); peace of God Shelumiel, an Israel...). Name in lineage or family context.

H8035.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H8035.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.5.32; referred to as Shem (שֵׁם), or Shem (KJV= Sem)  (Σήμ);  son of Noah; a brother of Ham and Japheth;  father of Asshur, Elam, Arpachshad, Lud and Aram.
H8035.f: Noah's son, ancestor of Semitic peoples
H8035.meaning: From שֵׁם (shem), name. Shem = name. Son of Noah (Gen 5:32); brother of Ham and Japheth. Hitchcock: name; renown. BehindTheName: From Hebrew שֵׁם (Shem) meaning 'name'.
H8035.significance: Line of the covenant (Gen 9:26–27); blessed of the Lord. Father of the Semitic peoples; in his line comes Abraham and the promise.

H8087.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8087.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.13; only referred to as Shema (שֶׁ֫מַע);  son of Elpaal; a brother of Eber, Misham, Shemed, Beriah, Zebadiah, Meshullam, Hizki, Heber, Ishmerai, Izliah and Jobab.
H8087.significance: Minor figure; name: for the same as H8088 (שֵׁמַע) Shema, the name of a place in Palestine and of four Israelites

H8094.d: Warrior living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8094.s: A warrior living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.12.3; only referred to as Shemaah (שְׁמָעָה);  father of Ahiezer, Joash.
H8094.significance: David's warrior. Name (for H8093 (שִׁמְעָה) Shemaah, an Israelite). Name fits martial or military role.

H8098.d: Levite living at the time of United Monarchy
H8098.s: A man from the tribe of Levi living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.26.4; only referred to as Shemaiah (שְׁמַעְיָ֫הוּ);  son of Obed-edom; a brother of Jehozabad, Joah, Sachar, Nethanel, Ammiel, Issachar and Peullethai;  father of Othni, Rephael, Obed, Elzabad, Elihu and Semachiah.
H8098.meaning: Hitchcock: that hears or obeys the Lord
H8098.significance: Son of Obed-edom. Name (or שְׁמַעְיָהוּ; from H8085 (שָׁמַע) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah has heard S...). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H8114.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8114.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.11.19; only referred to as Shemariah (שְׁמַרְיָ֫הוּ);  son of Rehoboam and Mahalath; a brother of Jeush and Zaham;  half-brother of: Abijah, Attai, Ziza and Shelomith.
H8114.significance: Minor figure; name: or שְׁמַרְיָהוּ; from H8104 (שָׁמַר) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah has guarded Shemarjah, the name of...

H8038.d: King living at the time of the Patriarchs
H8038.s: A king in Canaan living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.14.2; only referred to as Shemeber (שֶׁמְאֵ֫בֶר).
H8038.meaning: Hitchcock: name of force; name of the strong
H8038.significance: Minor figure; name: apparently from H8034 (שֵׁם) and H83 (אֵבֶר); name of pinion, i.e. illustrious Shemeber, a king...

H8106.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8106.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.12; only referred to as Shemed (שָׁ֫מֶד);  son of Elpaal; a brother of Eber, Misham, Beriah, Shema, Zebadiah, Meshullam, Hizki, Heber, Ishmerai, Izliah and Jobab.
H8106.meaning: the same as H8105 (שֶׁמֶר) Shemer, the name of three Israelites
H8106.significance: Minor figure; name: the same as H8105 (שֶׁמֶר) Shemer, the name of three Israelites

H8061.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H8061.s: A man from the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.26.32; referred to as Shemida (שְׁמִידָ֑ע), or Shemidaite (שְׁמִידָעִי);  son of Gilead; a brother of Abiezer, Helek, Asriel, Shechem and Hepher;  father of Ahian, Shechem, Likhi and Aniam.
H8061.f: Son of Gilead, great-grandson of Manasseh
H8061.meaning: Hitchcock: name of knowledge; that puts knowledge
H8061.significance: Son of Gilead. Name (apparently from H8034 (שֵׁם) and H3045 (יָדַע); name of knowing Shemid...). Name in lineage or family context.

H8070.d: Singer living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8070.s: A musician living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.15.18; only referred to as Shemiramoth (שְׁמִירָמוֹת).
H8070.meaning: Hitchcock: the height of the heavens
H8070.significance: A singer. Name meaning: or שְׁמָרִימוֹת; probably from H8034 (שֵׁם) and plural of H7413 (רָמָה...

H8137.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8137.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.3.18; only referred to as Shenazzar (שֶׁנְאַצַּ֑ר);  son of Shealtiel(?); a brother of Malchiram, Pedaiah, Jekamiah, Hoshama and Nedabiah.
H8137.f: Descendant of King Jeconiah (Jehoiachin) of Judah
H8137.meaning: apparently of Babylonian origin Shenatstsar, an Israelite
H8137.significance: Minor figure; name: apparently of Babylonian origin Shenatstsar, an Israelite

H8203.d: David's son living at the time of United Monarchy
H8203.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.3.4; only referred to as Shephatiah (שְׁפַטְיָהוּ); a son of David and Abital;  half-brother of: Amnon, Chileab, Absalom, Adonijah, Ithream, Shammua, Shobab, Nathan, Solomon, Ibhar, Elishua, Nepheg, Japhia, Elishama, Eliada, Eliphelet, Tamar, Elpelet, Nogah and Jerimoth.
H8203.significance: David's son. Name (or שְׁפַטְיָהוּ; from H8199 (שָׁפַט) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah has judged ...). Name in lineage or family context.

H8195.d: Edomite living at the time of the Patriarchs
H8195.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.23; referred to as Shepho (שְׁפוֹ, שְׁפִי);  son of Shobal; a brother of Alvan, Manahath, Ebal and Onam.
H8195.significance: Son of Shobal. Name (or שְׁפִי; from H8192 (שָׁפָה); baldness (compare H8205 (שְׁפִי)) Shep...). Name in lineage or family context.

H8274.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H8274.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Neh.10.12; only referred to as Sherebiah (שֵׁרֵֽבְיָה).
H8274.f: Levite who sealed the covenant and led worship
H8274.significance: Returned leader. Name meaning: from H8273 (שָׁרָב) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah has brought heat Sherebjah, ...

H8329.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H8329.s: A man from the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.16; only referred to as Sheresh (שָׁ֑רֶשׁ);  son of Machir and Maacah; a brother of Gilead, Peresh and Hammolecheth;  father of Ulam and Rakem.
H8329.meaning: the same as H8328 (שֶׁרֶשׁ) Sheresh, an Israelite
H8329.significance: Son of Machir. Name (the same as H8328 (שֶׁרֶשׁ) Sheresh, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H8344.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H8344.s: A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.13.22; only referred to as Sheshai (שֵׁשַׁי);  son of Anak; a brother of Ahiman and Talmai.
H8344.significance: Son of Anak. Name (probably for H8343 (שָׁשַׁי) Sheshai, a Canaanite). Name in lineage or family context.

H8348.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8348.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.2.31; only referred to as Sheshan (שֵׁשָׁן); a son of Ishi;  father of Ahlai.
H8348.f: Jerahmeelite whose daughter married his Egyptian servant
H8348.significance: Son of Ishi. Name (perhaps for H7799 (שׁוּשַׁן); lily Sheshan, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H8369.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H8369.s: A prince of Persia living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Est.1.14; only referred to as Shethar (שֵׁתָר).
H8369.f: Persian noble in King Ahasuerus's court
H8369.significance: Minor figure; name: of foreign derivation Shethar, a Persian satrap

H8370.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H8370.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.5.3; only referred to as Shethar-bozenai (שְׁתַר בּוֹזְנַי).
H8370.f: Persian official who questioned the Jews' temple rebuilding
H8370.meaning: of foreign derivation Shethar-Bozenai, a Persian officer
H8370.significance: Persian official. Name meaning: of foreign derivation Shethar-Bozenai, a Persian officer

H7724.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H7724.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.49; only referred to as Sheva (שְׁוָא);  son of Caleb and Maacah; a brother of Sheber, Tirhanah and Regem(?), Jotham(?), Geshan(?), Pelet(?), Ephah(?), Shaaph(?), Shaaph;  half-brother of: Hur, Jesher, Shobab, Ardon, Mesha, Haran, Moza, Gazez and Achsah;  father or founder of Machbenah and Gibea.
H7724.significance: Minor figure; name: from the same as H7723 (שָׁוְא); false Sheva, an Israelite

H7977.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H7977.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ki.22.42; only referred to as Shilhi (שִׁלְחִי);  father of Azubah.
H7977.significance: Father of Azubah. Name (from H7973 (שֶׁלַח); missive, i.e. armed Shilchi, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H8006.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H8006.s: A man from the tribe of Naphtali living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.24; referred to as Shillem (שִׁלֵּם), or Shallum (שַׁלּוּם), or Shillemite (שִׁלֵּמִי);  son of Naphtali; a brother of Jahzeel, Guni and Jezer.
H8006.significance: Son of Naphtali. Name (the same as H8005 (שִׁלֵּם) Shillem, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H7886.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H7886.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.49.10; only referred to as Shiloh (שִׁילֹה).
H7886.f: A name in Jacob's blessing on Judah
H7886.significance: Minor figure; name: from H7951 (שָׁלָה); tranquil Shiloh, an epithet of the Messiah

H8023.s: People living at Shiloh or descended from Shelah(?), only mentioned at Neh.11.5; only referred to as Shilonites (שִׁלֹנִי); progenitors of Zechariah.
H8023.f: Descendants of Judah living in Jerusalem after the exile.
H8023.meaning: the same as H7888 (שִׁילוֹנִי) Shiloni, an Israelite
H8023.significance: Minor figure; name: the same as H7888 (שִׁילוֹנִי) Shiloni, an Israelite

H8030.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8030.s: A man from the tribe of Asher living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.37; only referred to as Shilshah (שִׁלְשָׁה);  son of Zophah; a brother of Suah, Harnepher, Shual, Beri, Imrah, Bezer, Hod, Shamma, Ithran and Beera.
H8030.f: Son of Zophah, a descendant of Asher.
H8030.significance: Minor figure; name: feminine from the same as H8028 (שֶׁלֶשׁ); triplication Shilshah, an Israelite

H8092.d: Levite living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8092.s: A musician from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.6.39; only referred to as Shimea (שִׁמְעָא, שִׁמְעָה); a son of Michael;  father of Berechiah.
H8092.f: Levite singer appointed by David for temple worship.
H8092.meaning: for H8093 (שִׁמְעָה) Shima, the name of four Israelites
H8092.significance: Son of Michael. Name (for H8093 (שִׁמְעָה) Shima, the name of four Israelites). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H8039.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8039.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.8.32; referred to as Shimeah (שִׁמְאָה), or Shimeam (שִׁמְאָם); a son of Mikloth.
H8039.f: Son of Mikloth and nephew of Ner in Benjamin's genealogy.
H8039.meaning: Hitchcock: Shimeath, that hears, or obeys; perdition
H8039.significance: Saul's family. Name (perhaps for H8093 (שִׁמְעָה) Shimah, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H8093.d: David's brother living at the time of United Monarchy
H8093.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.16.9; referred to as Shimeah (שִׁמְעָה), or Shimei (=Ketiv. Qere, NIV= Shimeah, KJV= Shimea) (שִׁמְעִי), or Shammah (שַׁמָּה), or Shimea (שִׁמְעָא);  son of Jesse; a brother of David, Eliab, Abinadab, Nethanel, Raddai, Ozem, Zeruiah, Abigail(?) and Elihu;  father of Jonadab.
H8093.meaning: Hitchcock: Shimeath, that hears, or obeys; perdition
H8093.significance: david's brother living at the time of united monarchy. Name (feminine of H8088 (שֵׁמַע); annunciation Shimah, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H8096.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8096.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.21; only referred to as Shimei (שִׁמְעִי);  father of Jakim, Zichri, Zabdi, Elienai, Zillethai, Eliel, Adaiah, Beraiah and Shimrath.
H8096.f: Benjamite descendant of Shimei, son of Elpaal.
H8096.meaning: Hitchcock: Shimi, that hears or obeys; my reputation; my fame
H8096.significance: Father of Jakim. Name (from H8088 (שֵׁמַע); famous Shimi, the name of twenty Israelites). Name in lineage or family context.

H8095.d: Jacob's son living at the time of the Patriarchs
H8095.s: A man who founded the tribe of Simeon  living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.29.33; referred to as Simeon or Simeonite (שִׁמְעוֹן), or Simeon or Simeonite (שִׁמְעֹנִי), or Simeon (Συμεών);  son of Israel and Leah; a brother of Reuben, Levi, Judah, Issachar, Zebulun and Dinah;  half-brother of: Dan, Naphtali, Gad, Asher, Joseph and Benjamin; husband of Canaanite woman;  fathe

H5476.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H5476.s: A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.13.10; only referred to as Sodi (סוֹדִי);  father of Gaddiel.
H5476.f: Father of the Zebulunite spy Gaddiel.
H5476.significance: Father of Gaddiel. Name (from H5475 (סוֹד); a confidant Sodi, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H8010.d: King living at the time of United Monarchy
H8010.s: A king of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.5.14; referred to as Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה), or Jedidiah (יְדִידְיָה), or Solomon (Σολομών, Σαλωμών);  son of David and Bathsheba; a brother of Shammua, Shobab and Nathan;  half-brother of: Amnon, Chileab, Absalom, Adonijah, Shephatiah, Ithream, Ibhar, Elishua, Nepheg, Japhia, Elishama, Eliada, Eliphelet, Tamar, Elpelet, Nog
H8010.meaning: From שָׁלוֹם (shalom), peace. Solomon = peaceable. Son of David; king of Israel (1 Ki 1:39). Hitchcock: peaceable; perfect; one who recompenses. BehindTheName: From Hebrew שְׁלֹמֹה (Shelomo) meaning 'peace', from שָׁלוֹם (shalom).
H8010.significance: Builder of the temple; wisdom and peace (1 Ki 4:24–25). Type of the peaceful reign; his fall (1 Ki 11) shows the need for a greater Son of David.

G4986.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G4986.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.20.4; referred to as Sopater (Σώπατρος), or Sosipater (Σωσίπατρος); a son of Pyrrhus.
G4986.f: Companion of Paul from Berea, greeted the Roman church.
G4986.meaning: Hitchcock: Sosipater, who defends the father
G4986.significance: Son of Pyrrhus. Name (from the base of G4982 (σώζω) and G3962 (πατήρ) of a safe father; Sopa...). Name in lineage or family context.

H5618.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H5618.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.55; referred to as Sophereth or Hassophereth (סֹפֶ֫רֶת).
H5618.f: Ancestor of a family of Solomon's servants who returned from exile.
H5618.significance: Returned from exile. Name meaning: feminine active participle of H5608 (סָפַר); a scribe (properly, femal...

G4988.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G4988.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.18.17; only referred to as Sosthenes (Σωσθένης).
G4988.f: Synagogue ruler in Corinth, co-sender of 1 Corinthians.
G4988.significance: man living at the time of the new testament. Name meaning: from the base of G4982 (σώζω) and that of G4599 (σθενόω) of safe stren...

H5479.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H5479.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.55; only referred to as Sotai (סוֹטַי).
H5479.f: Ancestor of a family of Solomon's servants who returned from exile.
H5479.significance: Returned from exile. Name meaning: from H7750 (שׂוּט); roving Sotai, one of the Nethinim

G4720.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G4720.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Rom.16.9; only referred to as Stachys (Στάχυς).
G4720.f: Believer in Rome, greeted by Paul as a beloved friend.
G4720.meaning: Hitchcock: spike or ear of corn
G4720.significance: Minor figure; name: the same as G4719 (στάχυς) Stachys, a Christian

G4734.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G4734.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at 1Co.1.16; referred to as Stephanas (Στεφανᾶς).
G4734.f: Corinthian believer, baptized by Paul, sent to visit him.
G4734.significance: man living at the time of the new testament. Name meaning: probably contraction for (crowned from G4737 (στεφανόω)); Stephanas, a...

G4736.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G4736.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.6.5; only referred to as Stephen (Στέφανος).
G4736.f: One of seven deacons, full of faith, performed miracles, martyred.
G4736.meaning: Greek Στέφανος (Stephanos); from στέφανος (stephanos), crown. Stephen = crown. Deacon (Acts 6:5). Hitchcock: same as Stephanas. BehindTheName: From Greek Στέφανος (Stephanos) meaning 'crown'.
G4736.significance: First martyr (Acts 7:59); “full of the Spirit” (Acts 6:5). Saw the Son of Man standing (Acts 7:56). Name (crown) as the one who received the crown of life (James 1:12).

H5477.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H5477.s: A man from the tribe of Asher living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.36; only referred to as Suah (סוּחַ);  son of Zophah; a brother of Harnepher, Shual, Beri, Imrah, Bezer, Hod, Shamma, Shilshah, Ithran and Beera.
H5477.f: Son of Zophah, from the tribe of Asher
H5477.significance: Minor figure; name: from an unused root meaning to wipe away; sweeping Suach, an Israelite

H5525.s: People from Sukki(?), only mentioned at 2Ch.12.3; only referred to as Sukkiim (סֻכִּיִּים).
H5525.f: African people who invaded Judah under Shishak
H5525.meaning: patrial from an unknown name (perhaps H5520 (סֹךְ)) a Sukkite, or inhabitant of some place near...
H5525.significance: Minor figure; name: patrial from an unknown name (perhaps H5520 (סֹךְ)) a Sukkite, or inhabitant of some place near...

G4677.d: Woman living at the time of the New Testament
G4677.s: A woman living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Luk.8.3; only referred to as Susanna (Σουσάννα).
G4677.f: Woman who helped support Jesus and his disciples
G4677.meaning: Hitchcock: lily; rose; joy. BehindTheName: From Hebrew שׁוֹשַׁנָּה (Shoshanna) meaning 'lily, rose'.
G4677.significance: Minor figure; name: of Hebrew origin (H07799 feminine) lily; Susannah (i.e. Shoshannah), an Israelitess

H5485.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H5485.s: A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.13.11; only referred to as Susi (סוּסִי);  father of Gaddi.
H5485.f: Father of the Manassite spy Gaddi
H5485.significance: Father of Gaddi. Name (from H5483 (סוּס); horse-like Susi, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

G4941.d: Woman living at the time of the New Testament
G4941.s: A woman living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Php.4.2; only referred to as Syntyche (Συντύχη).
G4941.f: Woman in the Philippian church whom Paul exhorted
G4941.significance: Minor figure; name: from G4940 (συντυγχάνω) an accident; Syntyche, a Christian female

H2884.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H2884.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.43; only referred to as Tabbaoth (טַבָּעוֹת).
H2884.f: Family of temple servants who returned from exile
H2884.meaning: plural of H2885 (טַבַּעַת); rings Tabbaoth, one of the Nethinim
H2884.significance: Returned from exile. Name meaning: plural of H2885 (טַבַּעַת); rings Tabbaoth, one of the Nethinim

H2870.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H2870.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.4.7; only referred to as Tabeel (טָֽבְאֵל).
H2870.f: Persian official involved in accusing the Jews to Artaxerxes
H2870.meaning: from H2895 (טוֹב) and H410 (אֵל); pleasing (to) God Tabeel, the name of a Syrian and of a Persian
H2870.significance: Minor figure; name: from H2895 (טוֹב) and H410 (אֵל); pleasing (to) God Tabeel, the name of a Syrian and of a Persian

G5000.d: Woman living at the time of the New Testament
G5000.s: A woman living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.9.36; referred to as Tabitha (Ταβιθά), or Dorcas (Δορκάς).
G5000.f: Charitable woman in Joppa whom Peter raised from the dead
G5000.meaning: Hitchcock: clear-sighted; a roe-deer. BehindTheName: From Aramaic טְבִיתָא (Ṭevita) meaning 'gazelle'.
G5000.significance: woman living at the time of the new testament. Name meaning: of Chaldee origin (compare H06646) the gazelle; Tabitha (i.e. Tabjetha...

H2886.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2886.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.15.18; only referred to as Tabrimmon (טַבְרִמּוֹן); a son of Hezion;  father of Ben-hadad.
H2886.f: Father of Ben-hadad, king of Syria
H2886.meaning: from H2895 (טוֹב) and H7417 (רִמּוֹן); pleasing (to) Rimmon Tabrimmon, a Syrian
H2886.significance: Son of Hezion. Name (from H2895 (טוֹב) and H7417 (רִמּוֹן); pleasing (to) Rimmon Tabrimmon,...). Name in lineage or family context.

H8465.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H8465.s: A man from the tribe of Ephraim living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.26.35; referred to as Tahan (תַּ֫חַן), or Tahanite (תַּחֲנִי);  son of Ephraim; a brother of Shuthelah, Becher, Ezer, Elead and Beriah.
H8465.f: Son of Ephraim, ancestor of the Tahanites clan
H8465.significance: Son of Ephraim. Name (probably from H2583 (חָנָה); station Tachan, the name of two Israelite...). Name in lineage or family context.

H8477.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H8477.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.22.24; only referred to as Tahash (תַּ֫חַשׁ);  son of Nahor and Reumah; a brother of Tebah, Gaham and Maacah;  half-brother of: Uz, Buz, Kemuel, Chesed, Hazo, Pildash, Jidlaph, Bethuel.
H8477.meaning: the same as H8476 (תַּחַשׁ) Tachash, a relative of Abraham
H8477.significance: Minor figure; name: the same as H8476 (תַּחַשׁ) Tachash, a relative of Abraham

H8480.d: Levite living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8480.s: A man from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.6.24; only referred to as Tahath (תַּ֫חַת); a son of Assir;  father of Uriel.
H8480.f: Levite of the Kohathite clan, son of Assir
H8480.significance: Son of Assir. Name (the same as H8478 (תַּחַת) Tachath, the name of a place in the Desert,...). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H8526.d: King living at the time of United Monarchy
H8526.s: A king of the Ammonites living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.3.3; only referred to as Talmai (תַּלְמַי); a son of Ammihud;  father of Maacah.
H8526.f: King of Geshur; father of David's wife Maacah
H8526.meaning: Hitchcock: my furrow; that suspends the waters; heap of waters
H8526.significance: Ammonite king. Name (from H8525 (תֶּלֶם); ridged Talmai, the name of a Canaanite and a Syri...). Name in royal or ruling context.

H2929.d: Levite living at the time of Exile and Return
H2929.s: A man from the tribe of Levi  living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at 1Ch.9.17; only referred to as Talmon (טַלְמוֹן).
H2929.f: Levite gatekeeper who returned from Babylonian exile
H2929.meaning: from the same as H2728 (חָרְגֹּל); oppressive Talmon, a temple doorkeeper
H2929.significance: Returned from exile. Name (from the same as H2728 (חָרְגֹּל); oppressive Talmon, a temple doorkee...). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H8559.d: David's daughter living at the time of United Monarchy
H8559.s: A woman from the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.13.1; only referred to as Tamar (תָּמָר);  daughter of David and Maacah; a sister of Amnon, Chileab, Absalom, Adonijah, Shephatiah, Ithream, Shammua, Shobab, Nathan, Solomon, Ibhar, Elishua, Nepheg, Japhia, Elishama, Eliada, Eliphelet, Elpelet, Nogah and Jerimoth.
H8559.f: David's daughter, raped by her half-brother Amnon
H8559.significance: David's daughter. Name meaning: the same as H8558 (תָּמָר) Tamar, the name of three women and a place

H8576.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8576.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.25.23; only referred to as Tanhumeth (תַּנְחֻ֫מֶת);  father of Seraiah.
