H8576.significance: Father of Seraiah. Name (for H8575 (תַּנְחוּם) (feminine) Tanchumeth, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H2955.d: Woman living at the time of United Monarchy
H2955.s: A woman from the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.4.11; only referred to as Taphath (טָפַת);  daughter of Solomon; a sister of Basemath and Rehoboam; wife of Ben-abinadab.
H2955.f: Daughter of Solomon; wife of Ben-abinadab
H2955.significance: Minor figure; name: probably from H5197 (נָטַף); a dropping (of ointment) Taphath, an Israelitess

H8599.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8599.s: A man from the tribe of Judah  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.43; only referred to as Tappuah (תַּפֻּחַ);  son of Hebron; a brother of Korah, Rekem and Shema.
H8599.f: Son of Hebron from the tribe of Judah
H8599.significance: Minor figure; name: the same as H8598 (תַּפּוּחַ) Tappuach, the name of two places in Palestine, also of an Israelite

H8390.d: Man living at the time of United Monarchy
H8390.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.8.35; referred to as Tarea (תַּאֲרֵעַ), or Tahrea (תַּחֲרֵעַ);  son of Micah; a brother of Pithon, Melech and Ahaz.
H8390.f: Son of Micah and grandson of Mephibosheth
H8390.significance: Saul's family. Name (perhaps from H772 (אֲרַע) Taarea, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H8659.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8659.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.10; only referred to as Tarshish (תַּרְשִׁישׁ);  son of Bilhan; a brother of Jeush, Benjamin, Ehud, Chenaanah, Zethan and Ahishahar.
H8659.f: Son of Bilhan from the tribe of Benjamin
H8659.significance: Minor figure; name: probably the same as H8658 (תַּרְשִׁישׁ) (as the region of the stone, or the reverse) Tarshish,...

H8661.s: Title of a leader, first mentioned at 2Ki.18.17; referred to as Tartan or "chief" (KJV= Tartan, NIV= "supreme commander")  (תַּרְתָּן).
H8661.f: Title of an Assyrian military commander
H8661.significance: Title of a leader. Name meaning: of foreign derivation Tartan, an Assyrian

H8674.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H8674.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.5.3; only referred to as Tattenai (תַּתְּנַי).
H8674.f: Persian governor who questioned the Jews' authority to rebuild
H8674.meaning: of foreign derivation Tattenai, a Persian
H8674.significance: Persian official. Name meaning: of foreign derivation Tattenai, a Persian

H2875.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H2875.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.22.24; only referred to as Tebah (טֶ֫בַח);  son of Nahor and Reumah; a brother of Gaham, Tahash and Maacah;  half-brother of: Uz, Buz, Kemuel, Chesed, Hazo, Pildash, Jidlaph and Bethuel.
H2875.meaning: Hitchcock: murder; butchery; guarding of the body; a cook
H2875.significance: Minor figure; name: the same as H2874 (טֶבַח); massacre Tebach, the name of a Mesopotamian and of an Israelite

H2882.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2882.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.26.11; only referred to as Tebaliah (טְבַלְיָ֫הוּ);  son of Hosah; a brother of Shimri, Hilkiah and Zechariah.
H2882.meaning: Hitchcock: baptism, or goodness, of the Lord
H2882.significance: Minor figure; name: from H2881 (טָבַל) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah has dipped Tebaljah, an Israelite

H8468.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8468.s: A man from the tribe of Judah  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.12; only referred to as Tehinnah (תְּחִנָּה);  son of Eshton; a brother of Beth-rapha and Paseah;  father or founder of Ir-nahash.
H8468.f: Father of Ir-nahash from the tribe of Judah
H8468.significance: Minor figure; name: the same as H8467 (תְּחִנָּה) Techinnah, an Israelite

H8520.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8520.s: A man from the tribe of Ephraim living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.25; only referred to as Telah (תֶּ֫לַח); a son of Resheph;  father of Tahan.
H8520.f: Son of Resheph from the tribe of Ephraim
H8520.significance: Son of Resheph. Name (probably from an unused root meaning to dissever; breach Telach, an Is...). Name in lineage or family context.

H2928.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H2928.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.10.24; only referred to as Telem (טֶ֫לֶם).
H2928.f: Temple servant who married a foreign wife
H2928.significance: Minor figure; name: from an unused root meaning to break up or treat violently; oppression Telem, the name of a...

H8485.d: Arabian living at the time of the Patriarchs
H8485.s: A man of the Arabs living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.25.15; only referred to as Tema (תֵּימָא);  son of Ishmael; a brother of Nebaioth, Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam, Mishma, Dumah, Massa, Hadad, Jetur, Naphish, Kedemah and Mahalath.
H8485.f: Son of Ishmael, associated with an Arabian city
H8485.significance: Son of Ishmael. Name (or תֵּמָא; probably of foreign derivation Tema, a son of Ishmael, and ...). Name in lineage or family context.

H8547.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H8547.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.53; only referred to as Temah (תָּ֑מַח).
H8547.f: Ancestor of a family of temple servants
H8547.meaning: of uncertain derivation Temach, one of the Nethinim
H8547.significance: Returned from exile. Name meaning: of uncertain derivation Temach, one of the Nethinim

H8487.d: Edomite living at the time of the Patriarchs
H8487.s: A man of the Edomites living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.11; referred to as Teman (תֵּימָן), or Temanite (תֵּימָנִי);  son of Eliphaz; a brother of Omar, Zepho, Gatam, Kenaz, Amalek and Korah.
H8487.f: Grandson of Esau, associated with an Edomite clan
H8487.meaning: Hitchcock: Temani, the south; Africa; perfect
H8487.significance: Grandson of Esau. Name (or תֵּמָן; the same as H8486 (תֵּימָן) Teman, the name of two Edomites...). Name in lineage or family context.

H8488.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H8488.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.6; only referred to as Temeni (תֵּימְנִי);  son of Ashhur and Naarah; a brother of Ahuzzam, Hepher and Haahashtari;  half-brother of: Zereth, Izhar, Ethnan and Koz.
H8488.f: Son of Ashhur (or 'Ashur') from the tribe of Judah
H8488.meaning: probably for H8489 (תֵּימָנִי) Temeni, an Israelite
H8488.significance: Minor figure; name: probably for H8489 (תֵּימָנִי) Temeni, an Israelite

H8646.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H8646.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.11.24; referred to as Terah (תֶּ֫רַח), or Terah (KJV= Thara)  (Θάρα); a son of Nahor;  father of Abraham, Nahor, Haran and Sarah.
H8646.f: Abraham's father who settled in Haran
H8646.significance: Son of Nahor. Name (of uncertain derivation Terach, the father of Abraham; also a place in...). Name in lineage or family context.

H8657.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H8657.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Est.2.21; only referred to as Teresh (תֶּ֫רֶשׁ).
H8657.f: Persian official who plotted against King Ahasuerus
H8657.meaning: of foreign derivation Teresh, a eunuch of Xerxes
H8657.significance: man living at the time of exile and return. Name meaning: of foreign derivation Teresh, a eunuch of Xerxes

G5060.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G5060.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Rom.16.22; only referred to as Tertius (Τέρτιος).
G5060.f: Paul's scribe who wrote the Epistle to the Romans
G5060.significance: Minor figure; name: of Latin origin third; Tertius, a Christian

G5061.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G5061.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.24.1; only referred to as Tertullus (Τέρτυλλος).
G5061.f: Lawyer who accused Paul before Governor Felix
G5061.significance: man living at the time of the new testament. Name meaning: of uncertain derivation Tertullus, a Roman

G2321.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G2321.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Luk.1.3; only referred to as Theophilus (Θεόφιλος).
G2321.f: Recipient of Luke's Gospel and Acts
G2321.meaning: Greek Θεόφιλος (Theophilus); from θεός (theos), God, + φίλος (philos), friend. Theophilus = friend of God, or loved by God.
G2321.significance: Addressee of Luke and Acts (Luke 1:3; Acts 1:1). Name (loved by God) as the one for whom the orderly account is written—and every reader who seeks certainty.

G2333.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G2333.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Act.5.36; only referred to as Theudas (Θευδᾶς).
G2333.f: Jewish rebel leader killed by Roman authorities
G2333.meaning: Greek Θευδᾶς (Theudas); from θεός (theos), God, + δίδωμι (didomi), give. Theudas = God-given. Rebel (Acts 5:36). Hitchcock: flowing with water
G2333.significance: Mentioned by Gamaliel (Acts 5:36); “rose up, claiming to be somebody.” Name (God-given) as the one who was not—contrast with the true God-given King.

G2381.d: Apostle living at the time of the New Testament
G2381.s: An apostle living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.10.3; referred to as Thomas (Θωμᾶς), or Twin (KJV= Didymus) (Δίδυμος).
G2381.meaning: Greek Θωμᾶς (Thomas); Aramaic תְּאוֹמָא (te’oma), twin. Thomas = twin. Hitchcock: a twin. BehindTheName: From Aramaic תְּאוֹמָא (Teʾoma) meaning 'twin'.
G2381.significance: One of the Twelve; “Unless I see…” (John 20:25). Doubting Thomas who confesses “My Lord and my God” (John 20:28). Type of faith that moves from sight to confession.

G5086.d: Emperor living at the time of the New Testament
G5086.s: An emperor of Rome living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.22.17; referred to as Tiberius (Τιβέριος), or Caesar (Καῖσαρ).
G5086.f: Roman emperor during Jesus' ministry and death

H0223.significance: Faithful soldier; David had him killed to take Bathsheba (2 Sam 11). Name (Yah is my light) vs. death in darkness—innocent blood; type of the faithful one betrayed by the king.

H5780.significance: Minor figure; name: apparently from H5779 (עוּץ); consultation Uts, a son of Aram, also a Seirite, and the regions...

H2055.significance: Minor figure; name: of foreign origin Vajezatha, a son of Haman

H2057.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H2057.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.10.36; only referred to as Vaniah (וַנְיָה).
H2057.f: Israelite who married a foreign wife
H2057.meaning: Hitchcock: nourishment, or weapons, of the Lord
H2057.significance: Minor figure; name: perhaps for H6043 (עֲנָיָה) Vanjah, an Israelite

H2060.d: Woman living at the time of Exile and Return
H2060.s: A woman living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Est.1.9; only referred to as Vashti (וַשְׁתִּי); wife of Ahasuerus; mother of Darius and Artaxerxes.
H2060.f: Queen of Persia, deposed by King Ahasuerus (Xerxes)
H2060.significance: woman living at the time of exile and return. Name meaning: of Persian origin Vashti, the queen of Xerxes

H2058.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H2058.s: A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.13.14; only referred to as Vophsi (וׇפְסִי);  father of Nahbi.
H2058.f: Father of Nahbi, the Naphtalite spy
H2058.significance: Father of Nahbi. Name (probably from H3254 (יָסַף); additional Vophsi, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H2190.d: Edomite living at the time of the Patriarchs
H2190.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.27; only referred to as Zaavan (זַעֲוָן);  son of Ezer; a brother of Bilhan and Akan.
H2190.f: Horite chief, descendant of Seir the Horite
H2190.significance: Son of Ezer. Name (from H2111 (זוּעַ); disquiet Zaavan, an Idumaean). Name in lineage or family context.

H2066.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2066.s: A man from the tribe of Ephraim living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.21; only referred to as Zabad (זָבָד); a son of Tahath;  father of Shuthelah.
H2066.f: Son of Ephraim, killed by men of Gath
H2066.significance: Son of Tahath. Name (from H2064 (זָבַד); giver Zabad, the name of seven Israelites). Name in lineage or family context.

H2079.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H2079.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.3.20; only referred to as Zabbai (זַבַּי);  father of Baruch.
H2079.significance: Returned builder. Name meaning: probably by orthographical error for H2140 (זַכַּי) Zabbai (or Zaccai)...

H2067.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2067.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.19; only referred to as Zabdi (זַבְדִּי);  son of Shimei; a brother of Jakim, Zichri, Elienai, Zillethai, Eliel, Adaiah, Beraiah and Shimrath.
H2067.significance: Minor figure; name: from H2065 (זֶבֶד); giving Zabdi, the name of four Israelites

H2068.d: Man living at the time of United Monarchy
H2068.s: A warrior living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.27.2; only referred to as Zabdiel (זַבְדִּיאֵל);  father of Jashobeam.
H2068.f: Father of Jashobeam, commander of David's army

H2068.significance: David's commander. Name meaning: from H2065 (זֶבֶד) and H410 (אֵל) gift of God; zabdiel, the name of tw...

H2071.d: Man living at the time of United Monarchy
H2071.s: A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.4.5; only referred to as Zabud (זָבוּד);  son of Nathan; a brother of Azariah.
H2071.f: Son of Nathan, priest and king's friend
H2071.meaning: from H2064 (זָבַד) given, Zabud, an Israelite
H2071.significance: Minor figure; name: from H2064 (זָבַד) given, Zabud, an Israelite

H2140.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H2140.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.9; only referred to as Zaccai (זַכַּי).
H2140.significance: Returned from exile. Name meaning: from H2141 (זָכַךְ); pure Zakkai, an Israelite

G2195.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G2195.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Luk.19.2; only referred to as Zacchaeus (Ζακχαῖος).
G2195.f: Tax collector who hosted Jesus in Jericho
G2195.meaning: of Hebrew origin (compare H02140) Zacchæus, an Israelite
G2195.significance: man living at the time of the new testament. Name meaning: of Hebrew origin (compare H02140) Zacchæus, an Israelite

H2139.d: Levite living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2139.s: A musician from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.25.2; only referred to as Zaccur (זַכּוּר);  son of Asaph; a brother of Joseph, Nethaniah and Asharelah.
H2139.f: Son of Asaph, a musician in David's time
H2139.meaning: Hitchcock: of the male kind; mindful
H2139.significance: Returned musician. Name (from H2142 (זָכַר); mindful Zakkur, the name of seven Israelites). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H6659.d: High Priest living at the time of United Monarchy
H6659.s: A High Priest from the tribe of Levi living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.8.17; only referred to as Zadok (צָדוֹק); a son of Ahitub;  father of Ahimaaz.
H6659.f: High priest during the reigns of David and Solomon
H6659.significance: A High Priest. Name (from H6663 (צָדַק); just Tsadok, the name of eight or nine Israelites). Name fits cultic or priestly role.

G4524.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
G4524.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Mat.1.14; only referred to as Zadok (Σαδώκ); a son of Azor;  father of Achim.
G4524.significance: Son of Azor. Name (of Hebrew origin (H06659) Sadoc (i.e. Tsadok), an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H2093.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2093.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.11.19; only referred to as Zaham (זָ֑הַם);  son of Rehoboam and Mahalath; a brother of Jeush and Shemariah;  half-brother of: Abijah, Attai, Ziza and Shelomith.
H2093.significance: Minor figure; name: from H2092 (זָהַם); loathing Zaham, an Israelite

H6764.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H6764.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.3.30; only referred to as Zalaph (צָלָף);  father of Hanun.
H6764.f: Father of Hanun, who repaired Jerusalem's wall
H6764.significance: Returned builder. Name meaning: from an unused root of unknown meaning Tsalaph, an Israelite

H6756.d: Warrior living at the time of United Monarchy
H6756.s: A warrior living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.23.28; referred to as Zalmon (צַלְמוֹן), or Ilai (עִילַי).
H6756.significance: David's warrior. Name (from H6754 (צֶלֶם); shady Tsalmon, the name of a place in Palestine an...). Name fits martial or military role.

H6759.s: A man living before Israel's Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.8.5; only referred to as Zalmunna (צַלְמֻנָּע).
H6759.significance: man living before israel's monarchy. Name meaning: from H6738 (צֵל) and H4513 (מָנַע); shade has been denied Tsalmunna, a...

H2240.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H2240.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.10.14; only referred to as Zattu (זַתּוּא).
H2240.f: Israelite leader who sealed Nehemiah's covenant
H2240.meaning: of uncertain derivation Zattu, an Israelite
H2240.significance: Minor figure; name: of uncertain derivation Zattu, an Israelite

H2117.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2117.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.33; only referred to as Zaza (זָזָא);  son of Jonathan; a brother of Peleth.
H2117.f: Son of Jonathan, descendant of Jerahmeel
H2117.significance: Minor figure; name: probably from the root of H2123 (זִיז); prominent Zaza, an Israelite

H2069.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2069.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.17; only referred to as Zebadiah (זְבַדְיָהוּ);  son of Elpaal; a brother of Eber, Misham, Shemed, Beriah, Shema, Meshullam, Hizki, Heber, Ishmerai, Izliah and Jobab.
H2069.meaning: Hitchcock: portion of the Lord; the Lord is my portion
H2069.significance: Minor figure; name: or זְבַדְיָהוּ; from H2064 (זָבַד) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah has given Zebadjah, the name of nine...

H2078.s: A king of Midia living before Israel's Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.8.5; only referred to as Zebah (זֶ֫בַח).
H2078.significance: king living before israel's monarchy. Name (the same as H2077 (זֶבַח); sacrifice Zebach, a Midianitish prince). Name in royal or ruling context.

G2199.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G2199.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.4.21; only referred to as Zebedee (Ζεβεδαῖος);  father of James, John.
G2199.f: Father of the apostles James and John
G2199.meaning: Greek Ζεβεδαῖος (Zebedaios); from Hebrew זְבַדְיָה (Zevadyah), Yah has given. Zebedee = Yah has given. Father of James and John (Matt 4:21). Hitchcock: abundant; portion
G2199.significance: Fisherman; sons left him to follow Jesus (Matt 4:22). Name (Yah has given) as the one whose sons were given to the gospel—and asked for the right and left hand (Matt 20:21).

H2080.d: Woman living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2080.s: A woman living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ki.23.36; only referred to as Zebidah (זְבוּדָה); a daughter of Pedaiah; wife of Josiah;  mother of Jehoiakim.
H2080.f: Mother of King Jehoiakim of Judah
H2080.meaning: feminine from H2064 (זָבַד); giving Zebidah, an Israelitess
H2080.significance: Minor figure; name: feminine from H2064 (זָבַד); giving Zebidah, an Israelitess

H2081.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H2081.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.10.43; only referred to as Zebina (זְבִינָא).
H2081.f: Israelite who married a foreign woman
H2081.significance: Minor figure; name: from an unused root (meaning to purchase); gainfulness Zebina, an Israelite

H2083.s: A man living before Israel's Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.9.28; only referred to as Zebul (זְבֻל).
H2083.significance: man living before israel's monarchy. Name meaning: the same as H2073 (זְבוּל); dwelling Zebul, an Israelite

H2074.d: Jacob's son living at the time of the Patriarchs
H2074.s: A man who founded the tribe of Zebulun  living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.30.20; referred to as Zebulun (זְבוּלֻן), or Zebulunite (זְבוּלֹנִי), or Zebulun (KJV= Zabulon)  (Ζαβουλών);  son of Israel and Leah; a brother of Reuben, Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issachar and Dinah;  half-brother of: Dan, Naphtali, Gad, Asher, Joseph and Benjamin;  father of Sered, Elon and Jahleel.
H2074.significance: Son of Israel. Name (or זְבֻלוּן; or זְבוּלֻן; from H2082 (זָבַל); habitation Zebulon, a so...). Name in lineage or family context.

H2148.d: Singer living at the time of Exile and Return
H2148.s: A musician from the tribe of Levi  living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at 1Ch.9.21; only referred to as Zechariah (זְכַרְיָהוּ);  son of Meshelemiah; a brother of Jediael, Zebadiah, Jathniel, Elam, Jehohanan and Eliehoenai.
H2148.f: Levite gatekeeper and musician during David's reign
H2148.meaning: From זָכַר (zachar), remember, + יָהּ (Yah). Zechariah = Yah has remembered. Prophet (Zech 1:1). Hitchcock: same as Zachariah. BehindTheName: From Hebrew זְכַרְיָה meaning 'Yahweh remembers'.
H2148.significance: Visions of the lampstand and the Branch (Zech 3–4); “behold, your king is coming” (Zech 9:9). Name (Yah has remembered) as the prophet of the covenant and the coming King.

G2197.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G2197.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Luk.1.5; only referred to as Zechariah (Ζαχαρίας); husband of Elizabeth;  father of John.
G2197.f: Priest, father of John the Baptist
G2197.meaning: Greek Ζαχαρίας (Zacharias); from Hebrew זְכַרְיָה (Zechariah), Yah has remembered. Zechariah = Yah has remembered. Father of John the Baptist (Luke 1:5). Hitchcock: same as Zachariah. BehindTheName: From Hebrew זְכַרְיָה meaning 'Yahweh remembers'.
G2197.significance: Priest; struck mute until John’s birth (Luke 1:20, 64). Sang the Benedictus (Luke 1:68–79). Name (Yah has remembered) as the one who announced the dawn from on high.

H2144.d: Man living at the time of United Monarchy
H2144.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.8.31; referred to as Zecher (זֶ֫כֶר), or Zechariah (זְכַרְיָהוּ);  son of Abiel and Maacah; a brother of Kish, Ner, Abdon, Zur, Baal, Nadab, Gedor, Ahio and Mikloth.
H2144.f: Son of Abiel, founder of Gibeon
H2144.meaning: the same as H2143 (זֵכֶר) Zeker, an Israelite
H2144.significance: Saul's family. Name (the same as H2143 (זֵכֶר) Zeker, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H6667.d: King living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H6667.s: A king of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.24.17; referred to as Zedekiah (צִדְקִיָּ֫הוּ), or Mattaniah (מַתַּנְיָ֫הוּ);  son of Josiah and Hamutal; a brother of Jehoahaz;  half-brother of: Jehoiakim and Shallum.
H6667.f: Last king of Judah before the Babylonian exile
H6667.meaning: Hitchcock: the Lord is my justice; the justice of the Lord
H6667.significance: King of Judah. Name (or צִדְקִיָּהוּ; from H6664 (צֶדֶק) and H3050 (יָהּ); right of Jah Tsi...). Name in royal or ruling context.

H2062.s: A man living before Israel's Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.7.25; only referred to as Zeeb (זְאֵב).
H2062.significance: man living before israel's monarchy. Name meaning: the same as H2061 (זְאֵב) Zeeb, a Midianitish prince

H6768.d: Warrior Ammonite living at the time of United Monarchy
H6768.s: A warrior of the Ammonites living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.23.37; only referred to as Zelek (צֶ֫לֶק).
H6768.f: Ammonite, one of David's mighty men
H6768.meaning: Hitchcock: the shadow or noise of him that licks or laps
H6768.significance: David's warrior. Name (from an unused root meaning to split; fissure Tselek, an Israelite). Name fits martial or military role.

H6765.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H6765.s: A man from the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.26.33; only referred to as Zelophehad (צְלׇפְחָד); a son of Hepher;  father of Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milcah and Tirzah.

H6765.meaning: Hitchcock: the shade or tingling of fear
H6765.significance: Son of Hepher. Name (from the same as H6764 (צָלָף) and H259 (אֶחָד) Tselophchad, an Israel...). Name in lineage or family context.

H6786.s: People from Zemar(?) of the Canaanites, first mentioned at Gen.10.18; only referred to as Zemarites (צְמָרִי); descended from Canaan along with Sidon, Heth, Jebusites, Amorites, Girgashites, Hivites, Arkites, Sinites, Arvadites and Hamathites.
H6786.meaning: patrial from an unused name of a place in Palestine a Tsemarite or branch of the Canaanites
H6786.significance: Canaanites. Name meaning: patrial from an unused name of a place in Palestine a Tsemarite or bra...

H2160.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H2160.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.8; only referred to as Zemirah (זְמִירָה);  son of Becher; a brother of Joash, Eliezer, Elioenai, Omri, Jeremoth, Abijah, Anathoth and Alemeth.
H2160.meaning: feminine of H2158 (זָמִיר); song Zemirah, an Israelite
H2160.significance: Minor figure; name: feminine of H2158 (זָמִיר); song Zemirah, an Israelite

G2211.d: Man living at the time of the New Testament
G2211.s: A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Tit.3.13; only referred to as Zenas (Ζηνᾶς).
G2211.significance: Minor figure; name: probably contracted from a poetic form of G2203 (Ζεύς) and G1435 (δῶρον) Jove-given; Zenas, a...

H6846.d: Prophet living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H6846.s: A prophet living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Zep.1.1; only referred to as Zephaniah (צְפַנְיָהוּ); a son of Cushi.
H6846.f: Prophet, son of Cushi, descendant of Hezekiah
H6846.meaning: From צָפַן (tsaphan), hide. Zephaniah = Yah has hidden. Prophet (Zeph 1:1). Hitchcock: the Lord is my secret. BehindTheName: From Hebrew צְפַנְיָה meaning 'Yahweh has hidden'.
H6846.significance: “The day of the Lord is near” (Zeph 1:7); “seek the Lord, all you humble” (Zeph 2:3). Name (Yah has hidden) as the one who spoke of the remnant hidden in the day of wrath.

H6825.d: Edomite living at the time of the Patriarchs
H6825.s: A man of the Edomites living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.11; referred to as Zepho (KJV= Zephi)  (צְפוֹ, צְפִי);  son of Eliphaz; a brother of Teman, Omar, Gatam, Kenaz, Amalek and Korah.
H6825.f: Son of Eliphaz, grandson of Esau
H6825.meaning: Hitchcock: Zephon, that sees and observes; that expects or covers
H6825.significance: Grandson of Esau. Name (or צְפִי; from H6822 (צָפָה); observant Tsepho or Tsephi, an Idumaean). Name in lineage or family context.

H2226.d: Judah's son living at the timfather_of_Elizabethe of Egypt and Wilderness
H2226.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.38.30; referred to as Zerah (זֶ֫רַח), or Izrahite (יִזְרָ֑ח), or Zerah (KJV= Zarah)  (Ζαρά);  son of Judah and Tamar; a brother of Perez;  half-brother of: Er, Onan and Shelah;  father of Zabdi, Ethan, Heman, Calcol and Dara.
H2226.significance: judah's son living at the timfather_of_elizabethe of egypt a. Name (the same as H2225 (זֶרַח) Zerach, the name of three Israelites, also o...). Name in lineage or family context.

H2228.d: Priest living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2228.s: A priest from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.6.6; referred to as Zerahiah (זְרַחְיָה), or Ahitub (אֲחִיטוּב); a son of Uzzi;  father of Meraioth.
H2228.meaning: Hitchcock: the Lord rising; brightness of the Lord
H2228.significance: Returned priest. Name (from H2225 (זֶרַח) and H3050 (יָהּ); Jah has risen Zerachjah, the name...). Name fits cultic or priestly role.

H2238.d: Woman living at the time of Exile and Return
H2238.s: A woman living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Est.5.10; only referred to as Zeresh (זֶ֫רֶשׁ); wife of Haman;  mother of Vaizatha, Parshandatha, Dalphon, Aspatha, Poratha, Adalia, Aridatha, Parmashta, Arisai and Aridai.
H2238.f: Wife of Haman, enemy of the Jews
H2238.significance: woman living at the time of exile and return. Name meaning: of Persian origin Zeresh, Haman's wife

H6889.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H6889.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.7; only referred to as Zereth (צֶ֫רֶת);  son of Ashhur and Helah; a brother of Haahashtari, Izhar, Ethnan and Koz;  half-brother of: Ahuzzam, Hepher and Temeni.
H6889.f: Son of Ashhur, founder of Tekoa
H6889.significance: Minor figure; name: perhaps from H6671 (צָהַר); splendor Tsereth, an Israelite

H6874.d: Levite living at the time of United Monarchy
H6874.s: A man from the tribe of Levi living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.25.3; referred to as Zeri (צְרִי), or Izri (יִצְרִי);  son of Jeduthun; a brother of Obed-edom, Mattithiah, Gedaliah, Jeshaiah and Hashabiah.
H6874.f: Son of Jeduthun, a temple musician
H6874.meaning: the same as H6875 (צְרִי) Tseri, an Israelite
H6874.significance: Son of Jeduthun. Name (the same as H6875 (צְרִי) Tseri, an Israelite). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H6872.d: Man living at the time of United Monarchy
H6872.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Sa.9.1; only referred to as Zeror (צְרוֹר); a son of Becorath;  father of Abiel.
H6872.meaning: Hitchcock: root; that straitens or binds; that keeps tight
H6872.significance: Saul's family. Name (or (shorter) צְרֹר; from H6887 (צָרַר) a parcel (as packed up); also a...). Name in lineage or family context.

H6871.d: Woman living at the time of United Monarchy
H6871.s: A woman of the Kingdom of Israel, living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.11.26; only referred to as Zeruah (צְרוּעָה); wife of Nebat;  mother of Jeroboam.
H6871.f: Mother of Jeroboam, first king of Israel
H6871.significance: Minor figure; name: feminine passive participle of H6879 (צָרַע); leprous Tseruah, an Israelitess

H2216.d: Governor living at the time of Exile and Return
H2216.s: Governor from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at 1Ch.3.19; referred to as Zerubbabel (זְרֻבָּבֶ֫ל), or Zerubbabel (Aramiac זְרֻבָּבֶ֫ל), or Sheshbazzar (שֵׁשְׁבַּצַּר), or Sheshbazzar (Aramiac שֵׁשְׁבַּצַּר), or Zerubbabel (KJV= Zorobabel)  (Ζοροβάβελ);  son of Pedaiah; a brother of Shimei;  father of Meshullam, Hananiah, Shelomith, Hashubah, Ohel, Berech
H2216.meaning: Hitchcock: a stranger at Babylon; dispersion of confusion. BehindTheName: From Hebrew זְרֻבָּבֶל possibly meaning 'seed of Babylon'.
H2216.significance: governor living at the time of exile and return. Name (from H2215 (זָרַב) and H894 (בָּבֶל); descended of (i.e. from) Babylon...). Name in lineage or family context.

G2216.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
G2216.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Luk.3.27; only referred to as Zerubbabel (Ζοροβάβελ); a son of Shealtiel;  father of Rhesa.
G2216.meaning: Hebrew זְרֻבָּבֶל (Zerubbabel); from זֶרַע (zera), seed, + בָּבֶל (Babel). Zerubbabel = seed of Babylon. Governor of Judah (Ezra 2:2; Hag 1:1). Hitchcock: a stranger at Babylon; dispersion of confusion. BehindTheName: From Hebrew זְרֻבָּבֶל possibly meaning 'seed of Babylon'.
G2216.significance: Led the return; laid the foundation of the second temple (Ezra 3:8). In the line of David (Matt 1:12); name (seed of Babylon) as the one who came out of exile to rebuild.

H2241.d: Levite living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2241.s: A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.23.8; only referred to as Zetham (זֵתָם);  son of Libni ; a brother of Joel and Jehiel.
H2241.f: Son of Laadan, a Gershonite Levite
H2241.meaning: apparently a variation for H2133 (זֵיתָן) Zetham, an Israelite
H2241.significance: Son of Libni. Name (apparently a variation for H2133 (זֵיתָן) Zetham, an Israelite). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H2133.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2133.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.10; only referred to as Zethan (זֵיתָן);  son of Bilhan; a brother of Jeush, Benjamin, Ehud, Chenaanah, Tarshish and Ahishahar.
H2133.meaning: from H2132 (זַיִת); olive grove Zethan, an Israelite
H2133.significance: Minor figure; name: from H2132 (זַיִת); olive grove Zethan, an Israelite

H2242.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H2242.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Est.1.10; only referred to as Zethar (זֵתַר).
H2242.f: One of the seven eunuchs of King Ahasuerus
H2242.meaning: Hitchcock: he that examines or beholds
H2242.significance: Minor figure; name: of Persian origin Zethar, a eunuch of Xerxes

H2127.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2127.s: A man from the tribe of Gad  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.5.13; only referred to as Zia (זִיעַ);  son of Abihail; a brother of Michael, Meshullam, Sheba, Jorai, Jacan and Eber.
H2127.f: Gadite clan leader during the reign of Jotham
H2127.significance: Minor figure; name: from H2111 (זוּעַ); agitation Zia, an Israelite

H6717.d: David's compatriot living at the time of United Monarchy
H6717.s: A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.9.2; only referred to as Ziba (צִיבָא).
H6717.f: Servant of Saul's household, later served David
H6717.significance: David's compatriot. Name meaning: from the same as H6678 (צוֹבָא); station Tsiba, an Israelite

H6649.d: Edomite living at the time of the Patriarchs
H6649.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.2; only referred to as Zibeon (צִבְעוֹן); son of Seir  father of Anah and Aiah; brother of Timna, Lotan, Shobal, Dishon, Ezer and Dishan.
H6649.f: Hivite grandfather of Esau's wife Oholibamah
H6649.significance: Father of Anah. Name (from the same as H6648 (צֶבַע); variegated Tsibon, an Idumaean). Name in lineage or family context.

H6644.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H6644.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.9; only referred to as Zibia (צִבְיָא);  son of Shaharaim and Hodesh; a brother of Jobab, Mesha, Malcam, Jeuz, Sachia, Mirmah, Abitub and Elpaal.
H6644.significance: Minor figure; name: for H6645 (צִבְיָּה) Tsibja, an Israelite

H6645.d: Woman living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H6645.s: A woman living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.12.1; only referred to as Zibiah (צִבְיָה); wife of Ahaziah;  mother of Joash.
H6645.f: Mother of King Joash (or 'Jehoash') of Judah from Beersheba
H6645.meaning: Hitchcock: the Lord dwells; deer; goat
H6645.significance: woman living at the time of divided monarchy. Name meaning: for H6646 (צְבִיָּה) Tsibjah, an Israelite

H2147.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2147.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.23; only referred to as Zichri (זִכְרִי);  son of Shashak; a brother of Ishpan, Eber, Eliel, Abdon, Hanan, Hananiah, Elam, Anthothijah, Iphdeiah and Penuel.
H2147.meaning: Hitchcock: that remembers; that is a man
H2147.significance: Minor figure; name: from H2142 (זָכַר); memorable Zicri, the name of twelve Israelites

H6727.d: Man living at the time of Exile and Return
H6727.s: A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.43; only referred to as Ziha (צִיחָא).
H6727.f: Family of temple servants who returned from exile
H6727.significance: Returned from exile. Name meaning: or צִחָא; as if feminine of H6704 (צִחֶה); drought Tsicha, the name of...

H6741.d: Woman living at the time before the Flood
H6741.s: A woman living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.4.19; only referred to as Zillah (צִלָּה); wife of Lamech;  mother of Tubal-cain and Naamah.
H6741.f: Wife of Lamech; mother of Tubal-Cain and Naamah
H6741.meaning: Hitchcock: shadow; the tingling of the ear
H6741.significance: woman living at the time before the flood. Name meaning: feminine of H6738 (צֵל) Tsillah, an antediluvian woman

H6769.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H6769.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.20; only referred to as Zillethai (צִלְּתַי);  son of Shimei; a brother of Jakim, Zichri, Zabdi, Elienai, Eliel, Adaiah, Beraiah and Shimrath.
H6769.meaning: from the feminine of H6738 (צֵל); shady Tsillethai, the name of two Israelites
H6769.significance: Minor figure; name: from the feminine of H6738 (צֵל); shady Tsillethai, the name of two Israelites

H2153.d: Woman living at the time of the Patriarchs
H2153.s: A concubine living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.29.24; only referred to as Zilpah (זִלְפָּה); concubine of Israel;  mother of Gad and Asher.
H2153.f: Leah's maidservant; mother of Gad and Asher
H2153.significance: woman living at the time of the patriarchs. Name meaning: from an unused root apparently meaning to trickle, as myrrh; fragrant ...

H2155.d: Levite living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2155.s: A man from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.6.20; only referred to as Zimmah (זִמָּה);  son of Shimei;  father of Joah; a brother of Shelomoth, Haziel, and Haran.
H2155.f: Levite, son of Shimei, descendant of Gershon
H2155.significance: Son of Shimei. Name (the same as H2154 (זִמָּה) Zimmah, the name of two Israelites). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H2175.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H2175.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.25.2; only referred to as Zimran (זִמְרָן);  son of Abraham and Keturah;  half-brother of: Ishmael and Isaac; a brother of Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak and Shuah.
H2175.significance: Son of Abraham. Name (from H2167 (זָמַר); musical Zimran, a son of Abraham by Keturah). Name in lineage or family context.

H2174.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2174.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.8.36; only referred to as Zimri (זִמְרִי);  son of Jehoaddah; a brother of Alemeth and Azmaveth;  father of Moza.
H2174.meaning: from H2167 (זָמַר); musical Zimri, the name of five Israelites, and of an Arabian tribe
H2174.significance: Saul's family. Name (from H2167 (זָמַר); musical Zimri, the name of five Israelites, and of...). Name in lineage or family context.

H2128.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2128.s: A man from the tribe of Judah  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.16; only referred to as Ziph (זִיף);  son of Jehallelel; a brother of Ziphah, Tiria and Asarel.
H2128.meaning: Hitchcock: this mouth or mouthful; falsehood
H2128.significance: Minor figure; name: from the same as H2203 (זֶפֶת); flowing Ziph, the name of a place in Palestine; also of an Israelite

H2129.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2129.s: A man from the tribe of Judah  living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.16; only referred to as Ziphah (זִיפָה);  son of Jehallelel; a brother of Ziph, Tiria and Asarel.
H2129.meaning: feminine of H2128 (זִיף); a flowing Ziphah, an Israelite
H2129.significance: Minor figure; name: feminine of H2128 (זִיף); a flowing Ziphah, an Israelite

H6837.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H6837.s: A man from the tribe of Gad living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.16; referred to as Ziphion (צִפְיוֹן), or Zephon (צְפוֹן), or Zephonite (צְפוֹנִי);  son of Gad; a brother of Haggi, Shuni, Ezbon, Eri, Arod and Areli.
H6837.meaning: from H6822 (צָפָה); watch-tower Tsiphjon, an Israelite
H6837.significance: Son of Gad. Name (from H6822 (צָפָה); watch-tower Tsiphjon, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H6834.d: Moabite living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H6834.s: A man of the Moabites living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.22.2; only referred to as Zippor (צִפּוֹר);  father of Balak.
H6834.f: Father of Balak, king of Moab
H6834.significance: Moabite king. Name (the same as H6833 (צִפּוֹר) Tsippor, a Moabite). Name in royal or ruling context.

H6855.d: Woman living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H6855.s: A woman living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Exo.2.21; only referred to as Zipporah (צִפֹּרָה);  daughter of Jethro; a sister of Hobab; wife of Moses;  mother of Gershom and Eliezer.
H6855.f: Wife of Moses, daughter of Jethro
H6855.meaning: Hitchcock: beauty; trumpet; mourning. BehindTheName: From Hebrew צִפֹּרָה (Tsippora) meaning 'bird'.
H6855.significance: Sister of Hobab. Name meaning: feminine of H6833 (צִפּוֹר); bird Tsipporah, Moses' wife

H2124.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2124.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.11.20; only referred to as Ziza (זִיזָא);  son of Rehoboam and Maacah; a brother of Abijah, Attai and Shelomith;  half-brother of: Jeush, Shemariah and Zaham.
H2124.f: Son of King Rehoboam and Maacah
H2124.significance: Minor figure; name: apparently from the same as H2123 (זִיז); prominence Ziza, the name of two Israelites

H2125.d: Levite living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H2125.s: A man from the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at 1Ch.23.10; referred to as Zizah (זִיזָה), or Zina (NIV= Ziza)  (זִינָא);  son of Shimei; a brother of Jahath, Jeush and Beriah.
H2125.meaning: another form for H2124 (זִיזָא) Zizah, an Israelite
H2125.significance: Son of Shimei. Name (another form for H2124 (זִיזָא) Zizah, an Israelite). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H6637.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H6637.s: A man from the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.8; only referred to as Zobebah (צֹבֵבָה);  son of Koz; a brother of Anub and Harum.
H6637.meaning: feminine active participle of the same as H6632 (צָב); the canopier (with the article) Tsobebah,...
H6637.significance: Minor figure; name: feminine active participle of the same as H6632 (צָב); the canopier (with the article) Tsobebah,...

H6714.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H6714.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.23.8; only referred to as Zohar (צֹ֫חַר);  father of Ephron.
H6714.significance: Father of Ephron. Name (from the same as H6713 (צַחַר); whiteness Tsochar, the name of a Hitti...). Name in lineage or family context.

H2105.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H2105.s: A man from the tribe of Judah(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.20; only referred to as Zoheth (זוֹחֵת);  son of Ishi; a brother of Ben-zoheth.
H2105.significance: Minor figure; name: of uncertain origin Zocheth, an Israelite

H6690.d: Man living at the time of Divided Monarchy
H6690.s: A man from the tribe of Asher living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.7.35; only referred to as Zophah (צוֹפַח);  son of Hotham; a brother of Imna, Shelesh and Amal;  father of Suah, Harnepher, Shual, Beri, Imrah, Bezer, Hod, Shamma, Shilshah, Ithran and Beera.
H6690.significance: Son of Hotham. Name (from an unused root meaning to expand, breadth Tsophach, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H6691.d: Man living at the time of the Patriarchs
H6691.s: A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Job.2.11; only referred to as Zophar (צוֹפַר).
H6691.f: One of Job's three friends, the Naamathite
H6691.significance: man living at the time of the patriarchs. Name meaning: from H6852 (צָפַר); departing Tsophar, a friend of Job

H6882.s: People from Zorath(?), first mentioned at 1Ch.2.53; referred to as Zorathites or Zorite (צׇרְעָתִי); founders of Etam.
H6882.meaning: or צׇרְעָתִי; patrial from H6881 (צׇרְעָה) a Tsorite or Tsorathite, i.e. inhabitants of Tsorah
H6882.significance: people from shobal(?). Name meaning: or צׇרְעָתִי; patrial from H6881 (צׇרְעָה) a Tsorite or Tsorathite, i....

H6686.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H6686.s: A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.1.8; only referred to as Zuar (צוּעָר);  father of Nethanel.
H6686.f: Father of Nethanel, leader of Issachar
H6686.significance: Father of Nethanel. Name (from H6819 (צָעַר); small Tsuar, an Israelite). Name in lineage or family context.

H6689.d: Levite living at the time of United Monarchy
H6689.s: A man from the tribe of Levi living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.1.1; referred to as Zuph or Zuph (=Qere. Ketiv= Ziph) or Zophai (צוּף); a son of Elkanah;  father of Tohu.
H6689.meaning: Hitchcock: that beholds, observes, watches; roof; covering
H6689.significance: Son of Elkanah. Name (or צוֹפַי; or צִיף; from H6688 (צוּף); honey-comb Tsuph or Tsophai or ...). Name in Levitical or temple service.

H6698.d: Man living at the time of United Monarchy
H6698.s: A man from the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.8.30; only referred to as Zur (צוּר);  son of Abiel and Maacah; a brother of Kish, Ner, Abdon, Baal, Nadab, Gedor, Ahio, Zecher and Mikloth.
H6698.significance: Saul's family. Name (the same as H6697 (צוּר); rock Tsur, the name of a Midianite and of an...). Name in lineage or family context.

H6700.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H6700.s: A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.3.35; only referred to as Zuriel (צוּרִיאֵל); a son of Abihail.
H6700.meaning: Hitchcock: rock or strength of God
H6700.significance: Minor figure; name: from H6697 (צוּר) and H410 (אֵל); rock of God Tsuriel, an Israelite

H6701.d: Man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness
H6701.s: A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.1.6; only referred to as Zurishaddai (צוּרִישַׁדָּ֑י);  father of Shelumiel.
H6701.f: Father of Shelumiel, leader of Simeon
H6701.meaning: Hitchcock: the Almighty is my rock and strength
H6701.significance: Father of Shelumiel. Name (from H6697 (צוּר) and H7706 (שַׁדַּי); rock of (the) Almighty Tsurisha...). Name in lineage or family context.

H2104.s: People from Zuz(?), only mentioned at Gen.14.5; only referred to as Zuzim (זוּזִים).
H2104.meaning: plural probably from the same as H2123 (זִיז); prominent Zuzites, an aboriginal tribe of Palestine
H2104.significance: Minor figure; name: plural probably from the same as H2123 (זִיז); prominent Zuzites, an aboriginal tribe of Palestine

H0071.s: A location only mentioned at 2Ki.5.12; referred to as Abana (אֲבָנָה), or Amana (=Qere) (אֲמָנָה).
H0071.f: A river of Damascus, preferred by Naaman over the Jordan.
H0071.meaning: Hitchcock: made of stone; a building
H0071.significance: abana. Name meaning: perhaps feminine of H68 (אֶבֶן); stony;  Compare H549 (אֲמָנָה). Abana...

H0059.s: A location only mentioned at 1Sa.6.18; only referred to as Abel (אָבֵל).
H0059.f: A large stone in the field of Joshua of Beth-shemesh.
H0059.meaning: Hitchcock: vanity; breath; vapor | a city; mourning. BehindTheName: From Hebrew הֶבֶל (Hevel) meaning 'breath'.
H0059.significance: Minor figure; name: from H58 (אָבֵל); a meadow Abel, the name of two places in Palestine.

H0062.s: A location first mentioned at 2Sa.20.14; referred to as Abel-beth-maacah (אָבֵל בֵּית מַעֲכָה), or Abel (אָבֵל), or Abel-maim (NIV= Abel Maim)  (אַבֵל מַיִם), or (אָבֵל בֵּית מַעֲכָה).
H0062.meaning: from H58 (אָבֵל) and H1004 (בַּיִת) and H4601 (מַעֲכָה); meadow of Beth-Maakah Abel of...
H0062.significance: abel-beth-maacah. Name meaning: from H58 (אָבֵל) and H1004 (בַּיִת) and H4601 (מַעֲכָה); meadow of Bet...

H0064.s: A location only mentioned at Jdg.11.33; only referred to as Abel-keramim (אָבֵל כְּרָמִים).
H0064.f: A place near Ammon, attacked by Jephthah.
H0064.meaning: from H58 (אָבֵל) and the plural of H3754 (כֶּרֶם); meadow of vineyards Abel-Keramim, a place in...
H0064.significance: Minor figure; name: from H58 (אָבֵל) and the plural of H3754 (כֶּרֶם); meadow of vineyards Abel-Keramim, a place in...

H0065.s: A location first mentioned at Jdg.7.22; only referred to as Abel-meholah (אָבֵל מְחוֹלָה).
H0065.f: A town in Israel, home of Elisha.
H0065.significance: abel-meholah. Name meaning: from H58 (אָבֵל) and H4246 (מְחֹלָה)xlit mᵉchôwlâh corrected to mᵉchôl...

G0009.s: A location only mentioned at Luk.3.1; only referred to as Abilene (Ἀβιληνή). Abilene, a district of the Syrian Decapolis; from Abila, the chief town, Lk. 3:1*
G0009.f: A region ruled by Lysanias when John began preaching.
G0009.significance: Minor figure; name: of foreign origin (compare H058) Abilene, a region of Syria

H5684.s: A location near Ezion-geber first mentioned at Num.33.34; only referred to as Abronah (עַבְרֹנָה).
H5684.f: A desert campsite during Israel's wilderness wanderings.
H5684.meaning: feminine of H5683 (עֶבְרֹן) Ebronah, place in the Desert
H5684.significance: abronah= near ezion-geber (ezion-geber@num.33.35-2ch=h6100). Name meaning: feminine of H5683 (עֶבְרֹן) Ebronah, place in the Desert

H0390.s: A location only mentioned at Gen.10.10; only referred to as Accad (אַכַּד).
H0390.f: An ancient city in Nimrod's kingdom, probably Akkad.
H0390.significance: Minor figure; name: from an unused root probably meaning to strengthen; a fortress Accad, a place in Babylon

H5910.s: A location first mentioned at Jdg.1.31; referred to as Acco (עַכּוֹ), or Ptolemais (Πτολεμαΐς).
H5910.f: A seaport in Asher, also called Ptolemais.
H5910.meaning: apparently from an unused root meaning to hem in Akko (from its situation on a bay)
H5910.significance: ptolemais. Name meaning: apparently from an unused root meaning to hem in Akko (from its situat...

G0882.s: A location first mentioned at Act.18.12; only referred to as Achaia (Ἀχαΐα).
G0882.f: A Roman province in southern Greece, including Corinth.
G0882.significance: achaia. Name meaning: of uncertain derivation Achaia (i.e. Greece), a country of Europe

H5911.s: A location first mentioned at Jos.7.24; only referred to as Achor Valley (עָכוֹר עֵ֫מֶק).
H5911.f: A valley near Jericho, where Achan was stoned.
H5911.meaning: from H5916 (עָכַר); troubled Akor, the name of a place in Palestine
H5911.significance: valley of achor. Name meaning: from H5916 (עָכַר); troubled Akor, the name of a place in Palestine

H0407.s: A location first mentioned at Jos.11.1; only referred to as Achshaph (אַכְשָׁף).
H0407.f: A Canaanite city-state conquered by Joshua.
H0407.significance: achshaph. Name meaning: from H3784 (כָּשַׁף); fascination Acshaph, a place in Palestine

H0392.s: A location first mentioned at Jos.15.44; referred to as Achzib (אַכְזִיב), or Chezib (כְּזִיב), or Cozeba (KJV= Chozeba, NIV= Kozeba)  (כֹּֽזֵבָ֗א).
H0392.meaning: Hitchcock: liar; lying; one that runs
H0392.significance: achzib_1. Name meaning: from H391 (אַכְזָב); deceitful (in the sense of a winter-torrent which...

H5735.s: A location only mentioned at Jos.15.22; only referred to as Adadah (עֲדְעָדָה).
H5735.f: A town in the Negev region of Judah.
H5735.significance: Minor figure; name: from H5712 (עֵדָה); festival Adadah, a place in Palestine

H0128.s: A location only mentioned at Jos.19.36; only referred to as Adamah (אֲדָמָה).
H0128.f: A fortified city allotted to Naphtali.
H0128.significance: Minor figure; name: the same as H127 (אֲדָמָה) Adamah, a place in Palestine
